Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added by saket as on 16-11-2018 against the SCR no. 12450
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR');
ELSE
 IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 1 THEN --PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD check added by Kanav on 01-May-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD');
 ELSE
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME');
 END IF;
 
END IF;
--end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 V_COUNT NUMBER := 0;
 lv_etype_cd varchar2(50);--DMSSAL-12294
BEGIN
 
 IF :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL THEN
 SELECT COUNT(1) 
 INTO V_COUNT 
 FROM RH_ENQ
 WHERE PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER 
 AND LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :GLOBAL.COMP_FA 
 AND ENQ_NUM = :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO;
 
 begin
 SELECT etype_cd INTO lv_etype_cd
 FROM RH_ENQ
 WHERE PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER 
 AND LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :GLOBAL.COMP_FA 
 AND ENQ_NUM = :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO;
 exception
 when others then
 lv_etype_cd:=null;
 end;
 
 IF V_COUNT = 0 THEN
 :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO := '';
 :PARAMETER.P_ENQ_NUM := 'N';
 ELSE
 
 /*added by Dp Swain against DMSSAL-12294*/
 IF lv_etype_cd='EBK' then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_CD',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.MIDDLE_NAME',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.LAST_NAME',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COMMOR',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 else
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_CD',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.MIDDLE_NAME',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.LAST_NAME',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COMMOR',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
 --Added by saket as on 13-04-2023(start)
 IF lv_etype_cd='CRM' then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
 --Added by saket as on 13-04-2023(end)
 
 :PARAMETER.P_ENQ_NUM := 'Q';
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 BEGIN
 select remarks into :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.REMARKS from RD_ENQFOLLOW WHERE parent_group = :global.parent_group 
 and dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer 
 AND loc_cd =:global.loc_cd 
 and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa 
 AND enq_num = :cb_enquiry.NB_SRL_NO
 AND ENQ_FOLLOWSLNO=1
 and ENQ_VAR_SRL=1;
 EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.REMARKS:=NULL;
 END; 
 END IF;
 
 END IF;
 
 
/*Added by Priya on 13-MAR-19 for DMSSAL(S)-13301 */ 


 DECLARE
 rg_name VARCHAR2(40);
 rg_id RecordGroup;
 errcode NUMBER;
 BEGIN
 rg_name := 'ENQ_FOLLOWACTNACTL';
 rg_id := Find_Group(rg_name);
 IF Id_Null(rg_id) THEN
 rg_id := Create_Group_From_Query(rg_name,
 'SELECT LIST_DESC, LIST_CODE
 FROM(
 SELECT X.LIST_DESC, X.LIST_CODE
 FROM AM_LIST X
 WHERE X.LIST_NAME = ''ENQ_FOLLOWACTNACTL''
 AND X.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND X.LIST_FLAG IS NULL
 AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NULL
 UNION
 SELECT X.LIST_DESC, X.LIST_CODE
 FROM AM_LIST X
 WHERE X.LIST_NAME = ''ENQ_FOLLOWACTNACTL''
 AND X.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL 
 )ORDER BY LIST_DESC' );
 END IF;
 errcode := Populate_Group(rg_id);
 POPULATE_LIST('B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE', RG_NAME); 
 END; 

/* Closed Added by Priya on 13-MAR-19 for DMSSAL(S)-13301 */ 

end;

Block.Name: B_SH_ENQUIRY
Block.WhereClause: parent_group = :global.parent_group and dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer AND loc_cd =:global.loc_cd and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa and enq_num = :cb_enquiry.NB_SRL_NO

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE > SYSDATE THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enquiry date cannot be greater than todays date', 'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF TRUNC(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE) < :GLOBAL.FIN_BEG OR TRUNC(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE) > :GLOBAL.FIN_END THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enquiry date should be within the current financial year','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM')<>TO_CHAR(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE,'MM') AND nvl(:PARAMETER.P_PRV_MTH_ALLOW,'N')='N' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Previous Month Transaction Blocked by MSIL','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
 --ELSIF TRUNC(SYSDATE)-TRUNC(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE)>30 THEN
 --ELSIF TRUNC(SYSDATE)-TRUNC(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE)>= 3 THEN
 ELSIF TRUNC(SYSDATE)-TRUNC(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE)-1>= NVL(:PARAMETER.P_NO_BAK_DAY,0) THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Transaction is allowed from ' ||TRUNC(SYSDATE-:PARAMETER.P_NO_BAK_DAY) ||' to ' ||TRUNC(SYSDATE)||' date','Error');
 --GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Transaction Date cannot be more than '||:PARAMETER.P_NO_BAK_DAY||' days old ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE := SYSDATE;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 V_ERRMSG VARCHAR2(100);
 V_ERROR_CD NUMBER := 0;
 LV_LEAVING_DATE DATE; --- Added By Shailendra on 14.10.14 ( According to BI Mail on 14.10.14)
BEGIN
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.start_timer;
 end if;
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD IS NOT NULL THEN
 
 sp_get_dse_name_enq(:GLOBAL.DEALER, :GLOBAL.LOC_CD, 
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD, :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_SALESMAN_NAME,:CB_ENQUIRY.MSPIN,
 V_errmsg, V_error_cd);
 END IF;
 IF V_ERROR_CD <> 0 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(v_errmsg,'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 end if;

--TO GET THE MSPIN
/*if :CB_ENQUIRY.MSPIN is null then
BEGIN
 SELECT MSPIN INTO :CB_ENQUIRY.MSPIN 
 FROM GM_EMP
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND EMP_CD =:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD
 AND LOC_CD=:GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
EXCEPTION 
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 null;
END;
end if; */
 
IF :CB_ENQUIRY.MSPIN IS NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD IS NOT NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Please Map MSPIN','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF; 

 
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.stop_timer('PSS','RT_ENQ','Enquiry Tracking','Fetch the Sales Executive name',:global.userid);
 end if;
END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM

IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER in ('01','04') then

else

 ELSE
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME'); 
 END IF;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 P_ERRMSG VARCHAR2(100);

begin
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.start_timer;
 end if;
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.CIN IS NOT NULL THEN
 SP_VALIDATE_CIN
 (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.CIN,
 :global.PARENT_GROUP,
 :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_CD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.MIDDLE_NAME,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.LAST_NAME,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RADDRESS1,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RADDRESS2,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RADDRESS3,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RCITYCD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_RCITY_DESC,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.RES_PIN,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_OADDRESS1,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_OADDRESS2,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_OADDRESS3,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_OCITYCD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_OCITY_DESC,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.OFF_PIN,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PRE_RES_PHONE,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PRE_MOBILE_PHONE,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PRE_OFF_PHONE,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PRE_FAX,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RTEL1,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_OTEL1,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_FAX1,
 :PARAMETER.P_DOB,
 :PARAMETER.P_DOA,
 P_ERRMSG);
 IF P_ERRMSG IS NOT NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(P_ERRMSG,'ERROR');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.CIN := '';
 END IF;
 END IF;
 
--------Added by Shailendra 09.05.12
begin
 select gm.state_cd,gm.district,gm.tehsil_cd,gm.village_cd
 into :b_sh_enquiry.state_cd,:b_sh_enquiry.district,:b_sh_enquiry.tehsil_cd,:b_sh_enquiry.village_cd
 from gm_cin gm
 where gm.cust_cd =:b_sh_enquiry.cin 
 and gm.principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
exception when others then
 null;
end;

begin
 select st.state_desc
 into :b_sh_enquiry.state_desc
 from gm_state st
 where st.state_Cd =:b_sh_enquiry.state_cd
 and st.principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
exception when others then
 null;
end;
--DMSSAL_12276
begin
 select st.state_desc
 into :b_sh_enquiry.OFF_STATE_DESC
 from gm_state st
 where st.state_Cd =:b_sh_enquiry.OFF_STATE_CD
 and st.principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL;
exception when others then
 null;
end;
 
begin
 select th.tehsil_desc
 into :b_sh_enquiry.tehsil_name
 from gm_tehsil th
 where th.tehsil_cd =:b_sh_enquiry.tehsil_cd
 and th.principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
exception when others then 
 null;
end;

begin
 select vl.village_name
 into :b_sh_enquiry.village_name
 from gm_village vl
 where vl.village_Cd =:b_sh_enquiry.village_cd
 and vl.principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes 
exception when others then 
 null;
end;
----------end

--Added by Dinker Against DMSSAL-12339 on 16-11-17-Start
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_CD IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT LIST_DESC INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_DESC FROM AM_LIST
 WHERE LIST_NAME='TITLE_CD'
 AND LIST_CODE=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_CD
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_DESC:=NULL;
 END ;
END IF;
--Added by Dinker Against DMSSAL-12339 on 16-11-17-Stop
 
 
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.stop_timer('PSS','RT_ENQ','Enquiry Tracking','Validation of CIN',:global.userid);
 end if;
 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC ='I' THEN
 -- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_COMPANY',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 -- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_INDIVIDUAL',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_INDIVIDUAL',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('b_sd_enquiry.qty',enabled,PROPERTY_falsE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_INDIVIDUAL',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');---SHAILENDRA 06.03.12
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRYIND.ENQ_INDACCCATEG_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME',PROMPT_TEXT , 'First Name');
 
 if :global.principal = 2 then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 end if;
 

ELSE
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_INDIVIDUAL',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_COMPANY',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_COMPANY',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('b_sd_enquiry.qty',enabled,PROPERTY_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('b_sd_enquiry.qty',navigable,PROPERTY_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('b_sd_enquiry.qty',update_allowed,PROPERTY_truE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_INDIVIDUAL',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');---SHAILENDRA 06.03.12
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRYIND.ENQ_INDACCCATEG_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME',PROMPT_TEXT , 'Firm Name'); 
 
 if :global.principal = 2 then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 end if;
 
 
-- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_HOBBIES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHENLISTCHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cnt varchar2(10);
 --t_count number;
begin 

/*
SELECT count(1) into t_count FROM AM_LIST WHERE LIST_NAME='TOUR_RANGE' and list_name_desc=:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD and principal_map_cd=1;

 If t_count>0 and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID='OT' 
 then general.disp_text('2Others cannot be chosen for this variant. Kindly choose a valid Company / Institution','Error');
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End if; --By Kanav for DMSSAL-12392
 */ 
 --Commented by Kanav on 23-Jul-2018 for past cases with corporate code='OT' AND TOUR_RANGE VEHICLES
 
 
select count(*) into cnt
 from gm_schem gs,gm_mod gd
 where trunc(sysdate) BETWEEN SCHEM_STAR_DT AND SCHEM_END_DT
 and SCHEM_TYPE='RL' 
 and (schem_corp_grp_Cd=(select grop_Code from gm_gropd gm 
 where gm.cp_code=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID
 and cp_Actv_yn='Y'
 and principal_map_cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL)
 or schem_corp_Cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID)
 and gs.schem_model_cd=gd.model_cd
 and gd.principal_map_cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; /*Changed by Dp Swain for multi org*/
 

if cnt > 0 then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 else
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');

end if;
end;

IF nvl(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID,'aa') = 'OT' THEN
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME',PROMPT_TEXT , 'First Name');
ELSE
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE := '';
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
END IF;

/*
IF(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC = 'C') THEN
 IF(NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID,'aa') NOT IN ('OT','NA') ) THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME:=SUBSTR(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.CORPRT_NAME,1,30);
 
 ELSE
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME := NULL;
 END IF;
END IF;
*/--Commented by Anand raj 14072015
 


POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM.delete;
GO_BLOCK('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
FIRST_RECORD;
LOOP
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.NB_TEMP_SCHEME_COM_YN := 'N';
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
END LOOP;

--GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
---to make email id mandatory for for those corporate id where relationship scheme is attached neha
declare
 cnt varchar2(10);
 -- cnt2 varchar2(10);
begin 
 /*select count(*) into cnt
 from gm_schem 
 where trunc(:B_Sh_Enquiry.Enq_Date) BETWEEN SCHEM_STAR_DT AND SCHEM_END_DT
 and SCHEM_TYPE='RL' 
 and (schem_corp_grp_Cd=(select grop_Code from gm_gropd gm 
 where gm.cp_code=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID 
 and cp_Actv_yn='Y'
 and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL) ---Added :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL By Amit on 02-May-2014 For Multi Company Changes 
 or schem_corp_Cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID);*/
 
 select count(*) into cnt
 from gm_schem gs,gm_mod gd
 where trunc(sysdate) BETWEEN SCHEM_STAR_DT AND SCHEM_END_DT
 and SCHEM_TYPE='RL' 
 and (schem_corp_grp_Cd=(select grop_Code from gm_gropd gm 
 where gm.cp_code=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID
 and cp_Actv_yn='Y'
 and principal_map_cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL)
 or schem_corp_Cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID)
 and gs.schem_model_cd=gd.model_cd
 and gd.principal_map_cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; /*Changed by Dp Swain for multi org*/


/*select count(*)
into cnt2
from gm_schem
where SCHEM_TYPE='RL' and schem_corp_Cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID ;*/



if cnt > 0 /*or cnt2 > 0*/ then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);--DMSSAL-12294
else
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);--DMSSAL-12294
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 -- dbms_output.put_line('hello');
end if;
end;


IF :PARAMETER.P_WORKPLACE_ID IS NULL AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID='NA' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Select a valid Company/Institution. "Not Available" is not Allowed','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
elsif :PARAMETER.P_WORKPLACE_ID<>'NA' AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID='NA' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Select a valid Company/Institution. "Not Available" is not Allowed','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF; 
/*Changed by Dp Swain against DMSSAL-12213*/

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME',PROMPT_TEXT , 'First Name');

ELSIF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 2 and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID <>'OT' then

/*ELSE

 ELSE

 END IF;
END IF;
*/--Commented by Anand raj 14072015

/* whenever a corp code changed it will delete all schemes attached to old corp code added on 15/09/2009 */ 
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID<>:PARAMETER.P_WORKPLACE_ID THEN
:PARAMETER.P_DEL_YN:='Y'; /* PASSING PARAMETER FOR DELETION added on 17/09/2009 */
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.NB_TEMP_SCHEME_YN:='N'; 
POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND.DELETE; 
END IF;

POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM.delete;
GO_BLOCK('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
FIRST_RECORD;
LOOP
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.NB_TEMP_SCHEME_COM_YN := 'N';

END LOOP;
*/

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 p_var1 varchar2(30);
p_var varchar2(30);
LEN NUMBER;
C CHAR ;
I NUMBER := 1;
BEGIN
--Added by Dinker Against DMSSAL-12339 on 16-11-17-Start
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.MIDDLE_NAME IS NOT NULL AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN
--DIVYA 16-nov-2017 SP_VALIDATE_NAME(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.MIDDLE_NAME);
--divya 16-Nov-2017 START
BEGIN
 P_VAR:=trim(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.MIDDLE_NAME);
 SELECT regexp_replace(P_VAR, '[[:space:]]{2,}', ' ') INTO P_VAR FROM dual;--DIVYA 12-DEC-2017
 SELECT LENGTH(P_VAR) INTO LEN FROM DUAL;
 p_var1 := p_var;
 WHILE (I <= LEN)
 LOOP
 SELECT SUBSTR(P_VAR,I,1) INTO C FROM DUAL;
 IF NOT (ASCII(C) >=65 AND ASCII(C) <= 90) AND NOT(ASCII(C)=32) THEN
 SELECT REPLACE(P_VAR1,C,NULL) INTO P_VAR1 FROM DUAL;
 END IF;
 I := I + 1;
 END LOOP;
 p_var := p_var1;
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.MIDDLE_NAME:=trim(p_var);
END;
--divya STOP

END IF ;
--Added by Dinker Against DMSSAL-12339 on 16-11-17-Stop
END;

DECLARE

BEGIN

 --sp_get_pin_desc(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.RES_PIN,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC,lv_err_msg,lv_err_cd);
 /* logic has been changed on call for Sudheer Reddy vide GSMC Call number 1411392 */
 pin_desc(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.RES_PIN,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RCITYCD,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC,lv_err_msg,lv_err_cd);
 IF LV_ERR_msg IS NOT NULL THEN

 END IF;
 --CHECK FOR PINCODE FROM MASTER
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC IS NULL THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_TEXT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ELSE

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;
 --POPULATE THE AREA
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COMMOR <> 'O' THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MAIN_ZONE_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC;
 END IF; 
 END IF;
END;

 :b_sh_enquiry.VILLAGE_NAME:=NULL;

 :b_sh_enquiry.TEHSIL_NAME:=NULL;

 END IF;

DECLARE

BEGIN

 IF 
 X=0 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Please Enter a valid Mobile Number','Error');
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF; 
END;
 END IF; 

--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (start) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1 IS NOT NULL AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN
DECLARE
 lv_bal_points gd_loyalty_enrol.bal_point%type;
 lv_card_num gd_loyalty_enrol.card_num%type;
 lv_tier varchar2(30); --Added by saket as on 17-04-2020
BEGIN
 select nvl(bal_point,0),card_num
 ,list_desc --Added by saket as on 17-04-2020
 into lv_bal_points,lv_card_num
 ,lv_tier --Added by saket as on 17-04-2020
 from gd_loyalty_enrol x, am_List y
 where reg_mobile=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1 and card_status<>'C' and channel=:GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE
 and y.list_name='LOYL_TIER_TYPE' --Added by saket as on 17-04-2020
 and y.principal_map_cd=1 and y.list_code=x.TIER; --Added by saket as on 17-04-2020
-- general.disp_text('Loyalty Card '||lv_card_num||' is available against the mobile no. and the balance points available in the card is '||lv_bal_points,'Info'); Commented by saket as on 17-04-2020
 general.disp_text('Loyalty Card '||lv_card_num||'(Tier: '||lv_tier||') is available against the mobile no. and the balance points available in the card is '||lv_bal_points,'Info'); --Added by saket as on 17-04-2020
EXCEPTION
 when No_data_found then
 null;
END;
END IF;
--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (end) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522

DECLARE

 lv_alert number;
 lv_al_id ALERT;
 lv_pro_yn varchar2(2) := 'Y';
 
BEGIN

 BEGIN
 select /*+index (rh IDX_RH_ENQ_M_PHONE) */
 rh.MOBILE
 INTO LV_ENQ_MOB
 from rh_enq rh, rd_enq rd
 where rh.MOBILE = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 and rd.parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and rd.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and rd.loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and rd.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_VAR_SRL = 1
 and rh.etype_cd not in ('CRM', 'MUL', 'MDS', 'WEB', 'EXM', 'TCL')
 and rd.PARENT_GROUP = rh.PARENT_GROUP
 and rd.DEALER_MAP_CD = rh.dealer_map_cd
 and rd.LOC_CD = rh.loc_cd
 and rd.COMP_FA = rh.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_NUM = rh.enq_num
 and nvl(rd.enq_status, 'P') in ('P', 'W', 'H', 'E');
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 BEGIN
 select /*+index (rh IDX_RH_ENQ_M_PHONE) */
 rh.MOBILE
 INTO LV_ENQ_MOB1
 from rh_enq rh, rd_enq rd
 where rh.MOBILE = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 and rd.parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and rd.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and rd.loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and rd.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_VAR_SRL = 1
 and rh.etype_cd in ('CRM', 'MUL', 'MDS', 'WEB', 'EXM', 'TCL')
 and rd.PARENT_GROUP = rh.PARENT_GROUP
 and rd.DEALER_MAP_CD = rh.dealer_map_cd
 and rd.LOC_CD = rh.loc_cd
 and rd.COMP_FA = rh.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_NUM = rh.enq_num
 and nvl(rd.enq_status, 'P') in ('P', 'W', 'H', 'E');
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;

 IF LV_ENQ_MOB IS NOT NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enquiry is already existing against Mobile No. ' ||:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1,'Note');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUMMY_CHECK:='1'; 
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUP_ENQ_CHK');
 ELSIF LV_ENQ_MOB1 IS NOT NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enquiry is already existing against Mobile No. ' ||:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1,'Note');
 lv_al_id := Find_Alert('AL_CONFIRM');
 set_alert_property(lv_al_id, TITLE, 'Note');
 set_alert_property(lv_al_id,alert_message_text,'Do you want to use existing enquiry ?');
 lv_alert := Show_Alert(lv_al_id);
 
 if lv_alert = ALERT_BUTTON2 then
 lv_pro_yn := 'N'; 
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUMMY_CHECK:='1'; 
 IF :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is null then
 BEGIN
 select enq_num, etype_cd, 'DUP'
 into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.D_ENQ_NUM,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.D_ETYPE_CD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.D_ENQ_TYPE
 from rh_enq he
 where he.parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and he.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and he.loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and he.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and he.enq_num in
 (select /*+index (rh IDX_RH_ENQ_M_PHONE) */
 max(rh.enq_num)
 from rh_enq rh, rd_enq rd
 where rh.MOBILE = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 and rd.parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and rd.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and rd.loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and rd.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_VAR_SRL = 1
 and rh.etype_cd in ('CRM', 'MUL', 'MDS', 'WEB', 'EXM', 'TCL')
 and rd.PARENT_GROUP = rh.PARENT_GROUP
 and rd.DEALER_MAP_CD = rh.dealer_map_cd
 and rd.LOC_CD = rh.loc_cd
 and rd.COMP_FA = rh.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_NUM = rh.enq_num
 and nvl(rd.enq_status, 'P') in ('P', 'W', 'H', 'E'));
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;
 end if;
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PRE_RES_PHONE');
 else
 lv_pro_yn := 'Y';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUMMY_CHECK:='1';
 check_header;
 GO_ITEM('B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.DUP_ENQ_CHK_OK');
 SHOW_VIEW('CN_DUPLICATE_ENQ');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_INSERT', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_DEL', 'D');
 end if;
 ELSE
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUP_ENQ_CHK'); 
 end if;
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PRE_RES_PHONE');
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Added by Shailendra 09.03.13'
DECLARE
 LV_ENQ_MOB VARCHAR2(30);
 LV_ENQ_MOB1 VARCHAR2(30);
 lv_alert number;
 lv_al_id ALERT;
 lv_pro_yn varchar2(2) := 'Y';
BEGIN

 BEGIN
 select /*+index (rh IDX_RH_ENQ_M_PHONE) */
 rh.MOBILE
 INTO LV_ENQ_MOB
 from rh_enq rh, rd_enq rd
 where rh.MOBILE = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 and rd.parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and rd.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and rd.loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and rd.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_VAR_SRL = 1
 and rh.etype_cd not in ('CRM', 'MUL', 'MDS', 'WEB', 'EXM', 'TCL')
 and rd.PARENT_GROUP = rh.PARENT_GROUP
 and rd.DEALER_MAP_CD = rh.dealer_map_cd
 and rd.LOC_CD = rh.loc_cd
 and rd.COMP_FA = rh.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_NUM = rh.enq_num
 and nvl(rd.enq_status, 'P') in ('P', 'W', 'H', 'E');
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 BEGIN
 select /*+index (rh IDX_RH_ENQ_M_PHONE) */
 rh.MOBILE
 INTO LV_ENQ_MOB1
 from rh_enq rh, rd_enq rd
 where rh.MOBILE = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 and rd.parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and rd.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and rd.loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and rd.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_VAR_SRL = 1
 and rh.etype_cd in ('CRM', 'MUL', 'MDS', 'WEB', 'EXM', 'TCL')
 and rd.PARENT_GROUP = rh.PARENT_GROUP
 and rd.DEALER_MAP_CD = rh.dealer_map_cd
 and rd.LOC_CD = rh.loc_cd
 and rd.COMP_FA = rh.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_NUM = rh.enq_num
 and nvl(rd.enq_status, 'P') in ('P', 'W', 'H', 'E');
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;

 IF LV_ENQ_MOB IS NOT NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enquiry is already existing against Mobile No. '||:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1,'Note');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUMMY_CHECK:='1'; 
 check_header;
 SHOW_VIEW('CN_DUPLICATE_ENQ');
 GO_ITEM('B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.DUP_ENQ_CHK_OK');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_INSERT', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_DEL', 'D');
 ELSIF LV_ENQ_MOB1 IS NOT NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enquiry is already existing against Mobile No. '||:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1,'Note');
 lv_al_id := Find_Alert('AL_CONFIRM');
 set_alert_property(lv_al_id, TITLE, 'Note');
 set_alert_property(lv_al_id,alert_message_text,'Do you want to use existing enquiry ?');
 lv_alert := Show_Alert(lv_al_id);
 
 if lv_alert = ALERT_BUTTON2 then
 lv_pro_yn := 'N';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUMMY_CHECK:='1'; 
 IF :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is null then
 BEGIN
 select enq_num, etype_cd, 'DUP'
 into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.D_ENQ_NUM,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.D_ETYPE_CD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.D_ENQ_TYPE
 from rh_enq he
 where he.parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and he.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and he.loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and he.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and he.enq_num in
 (select /*+index (rh IDX_RH_ENQ_M_PHONE) */
 max(rh.enq_num)
 from rh_enq rh, rd_enq rd
 where rh.MOBILE = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 and rd.parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and rd.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and rd.loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and rd.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_VAR_SRL = 1
 and rh.etype_cd in ('CRM', 'MUL', 'MDS', 'WEB', 'EXM', 'TCL')
 and rd.PARENT_GROUP = rh.PARENT_GROUP
 and rd.DEALER_MAP_CD = rh.dealer_map_cd
 and rd.LOC_CD = rh.loc_cd
 and rd.COMP_FA = rh.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_NUM = rh.enq_num
 and nvl(rd.enq_status, 'P') in ('P', 'W', 'H', 'E'));
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;
 end if;
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PRE_OFF_PHONE');
 else
 lv_pro_yn := 'Y';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUMMY_CHECK:='1'; 
 check_header;
 SHOW_VIEW('CN_DUPLICATE_ENQ');
 GO_ITEM('B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.DUP_ENQ_CHK_OK');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_INSERT', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_DEL', 'D');
 end if;
 ELSE
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUP_ENQ_CHK'); 
 end if;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
/*STarted by Kanav on 03-Apr-2021 for DMSSAL(S)-13394*/
DECLARE
 lv_error_cd number;
 lv_error_msg varchar2(500);
 lv_otp number;
 LV_TEXT_FORMAT varchar2(1000);
BEGIN
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1 is null THEN
 general.disp_text('Please enter mobile number to send OTP','Info');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF;
 
 BEGIN

 BEGIN
 SELECT otp --Resend same SMS
 INTO lv_otp
 FROM SMIPL_SMS_OTP_LOG
 WHERE mobile_num = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 and process_code='ENQUIRY_SMIPL'
 AND sysdate between sent_date_time and valid_upto_date_time;
 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 
 SELECT SUBSTR(ABS(DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM), 1, 4)
 INTO lv_otp
 FROM DUAL;

 INSERT INTO SMIPL_SMS_OTP_LOG
 (MOBILE_NUM,
 OTP,
 PROCESS_CODE,
 SENT_DATE_TIME,
 VALID_UPTO_DATE_TIME)
 VALUES
 (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1,
 lv_otp,
 'ENQUIRY_SMIPL',
 sysdate,
 sysdate + 1/288);
 
 END;
 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN others THEN
 lv_error_cd := 1;
 lv_error_msg := 'Error in generating OTP.';
 RETURN;
 RAISE form_trigger_failure; 
 
 END;
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT replace(PRM.TEXT_FORMAT, '<OTP>', lv_otp)
 INTO LV_TEXT_FORMAT
 FROM GM_PROCESS_MASTER PRM
 WHERE PRM.PROCESS_CODE = 'ENQUIRY_SMIPL';
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 LV_TEXT_FORMAT := NULL;
 END; 
 
 sp_send_sms_sales_smipl(p_mobile => :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 ,p_message => LV_TEXT_FORMAT
 ,p_process_code => 'ENQUIRY_SMIPL'
 ,p_dealer => :global.dealer
 ,p_loc_Cd => :global.loc_cd
 ,p_parent_group => :global.parent_group
 ,p_error_cd => lv_error_cd
 ,p_error_msg => lv_error_msg
 );
 FORMS_DDL('COMMIT');
 
 IF lv_error_cd = 0 THEN
 general.disp_text
 ('OTP Sent to '||:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1,'Note');
 ELSE
 general.disp_text
 ('Error in sending OTP: '||lv_error_msg,
 'Error'
 );
 RAISE form_trigger_failure; 
 END IF;
END;
/*Ended by Kanav on 03-Apr-2021 for DMSSAL(S)-13394*/

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- Added by Shailendra on 05.02.15 (DMSSAL-121)
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS IS NOT NULL THEN

 if nvl(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS,0) >= 0 then 
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDATE:= TRUNC(SYSDATE) + :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS;
 else
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Please enter data in proper format','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 end if; 
 

END IF;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
/*Added by Priya on 13-MAR-19 for DMSSAL(S)-13301 */ 
if :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is null and :global.principal = 2 then 
 go_block('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
 first_record ;
 loop
 IF ( NVL(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS,'X') IN ('P', 'H', 'W', 'E')) THEN 
 if nvl(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS,0) <= 7 then
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS :='H';
 elsif :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS > 7 and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS <= 20 then
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS := 'W';
 else 
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS := 'P';
 end if;
 END IF;
 exit when :system.last_record='TRUE';
 next_record;
 end loop;
END IF;


/* Close Added by Priya on 13-MAR-19 for DMSSAL(S)-13301 */ 
 

GO_ITEM('CB_ENQUIRY.MGA_BOOKING');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
--general.check_null(:b_sh_enquiry.enq_Type,'Enquiry Type');
NULL;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Checking Valid Source Form List.Hari on 07-11-06
Declare
 lv_Source RM_ETYPES.ETYPE_DESC%TYPE:=Null;
Begin
 --If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE Is Not Null Then
 If :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO Is Null And :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE Is Not Null Then
 SELECT NVL(RM.ETYPE_DESC,'NA') Into lv_Source FROM RM_ETYPES RM 
 Where RM.DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 --And RM.ETYPE_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE
 And UPPER(RM.ETYPE_DESC) = UPPER(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE)
 And RM.ETYPE_FLAG != 'D';
 If UPPER(lv_Source) != UPPER(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE) Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enter Valid Source','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 End If; 
 End If;
Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enter Valid Source','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 When Too_Many_Rows Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Too Many Rows For Source','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
End;

--Added by saket as on 18-10-2019 aginst the scr number DMSSAL-12587(start)
IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE = 'DSA' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.BUSS_ASSO_TYPE_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.BUSS_ASSO_TYPE_DESC',VISIBLE ,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.BUSS_ASSO_TYPE_DESC',ENABLED ,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC',VISIBLE , PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSE
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.BUSS_ASSO_TYPE_DESC:=null;
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.BUSS_ASSO_TYPE:=null;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.BUSS_ASSO_TYPE_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.BUSS_ASSO_TYPE_DESC',VISIBLE ,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC',VISIBLE , PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
END IF;
--Added by saket as on 18-10-2019 aginst the scr number DMSSAL-12587(end)


--Based on Condition Enabling & Disabling Fields
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE = 'EVE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO:=null;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 l_lov boolean; 
begin
 l_lov := show_lov('lv_source');
 if l_lov = TRUE then
 if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SFDC_FLAG <> 'Y' then --ENQ_SFDC_FLAG check added by Kanav on 16-Jan-2020 for SFDC ENQ_MODE
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE:=null;
 end if;
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Validating Entered Enquiry Modes
DECLARE
 lv_ListDesc AM_LIST.LIST_DESC%TYPE := Null;
begin
 If :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO Is Null And :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE Is Not Null Then
 BEGIN
 Select Nvl(AM.LIST_DESC, 'NA')
 Into lv_ListDesc
 FROM AM_LIST AM
 Where AM.LIST_NAME = 'ENQUIRY_SOURCE'
 And AM.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 And AM.LIST_FLAG != 'D'
 And UPPER(AM.LIST_DESC) = UPPER(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE);
 If UPPER(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE) != UPPER(lv_ListDesc) Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enter Valid Mode', 'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 End If;
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enter Valid Mode', 'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 When Too_Many_Rows Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Too Many Rows', 'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END;
 END IF;
end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Added By Shailendra 03.07.13

DECLARE
 LV_ERR_MSG VARCHAR2(1000);
 LN_ERR_CD NUMBER;
 lv_enq_num varchar2(12);

BEGIN
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO IS NOT NULL THEN 
 SP_REF_VEH_REG_NUM(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,
 :GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO,
 :B_VEH_REG_NUM.CUST_NAME,
 :B_VEH_REG_NUM.CUST_CD,
 :B_VEH_REG_NUM.MOBILE_NUM,
 LV_ERR_MSG,
 LN_ERR_CD); 
 IF LN_ERR_CD > 0 THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_MOBILE_NO:=NULL;
 declare
 l_lov boolean;
 begin
 l_lov := show_lov('LV_REFERRED_BY');
 end;
 END IF;
END IF; 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_MOBILE_NO IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT rh.enq_num
 INTO lv_enq_num
 FROM rh_enq rh
 WHERE dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 AND parent_group = :global.parent_group
 AND loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 AND comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 AND mobile = :b_sh_enquiry.ref_mobile_no;
 EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
 lv_enq_num:=NULL;
 END;
 IF lv_enq_num IS NULL THEN
 declare
 l_lov boolean;
 begin
 l_lov := show_lov('LV_REFERRED_BY');
 end;
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;

declare
 l_lov boolean;
begin
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO IS NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_MOBILE_NO IS NULL THEN
 l_lov := show_lov('LV_REFERRED_BY');
 END IF;
end;

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 --Added By Shailendra 03.07.13
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEH_REG_CHECK',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_MOBILE_NO',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.MOB_CHECK',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEH_REG_CHECK := 'N';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.MOB_CHECK := 'N';
 END IF;
--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (start) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY='ACC' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0');
elsif :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY='ACD' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then --Added by saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number 12522
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0');
else
--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (end) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD');
end if; --Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12522

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO IS NULL THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEH_REG_CHECK:='N';
END IF;


DECLARE
 LN_CNT1 NUMBER := 0;
BEGIN
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO IS NOT NULL THEN
 --To remove special characters
 sp_validate_alphanumeric(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO);
 BEGIN
 SELECT COUNT(1) 
 INTO LN_CNT1
 FROM GM_VIN 
 WHERE REG_NUM =:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; ---Added :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL By Amit on 02-May-2014 For Multi Company Changes
 END;
 IF LN_CNT1 <= 0 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Registration Number Not Found','Error');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO:=NULL;
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF; 
END IF; 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_MOBILE_NO IS NOT NULL
 THEN
DECLARE 
 X NUMBER := 0 ;

BEGIN
 X:=fnc_verif_mobile(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_MOBILE_NO);
 IF 
 X=0 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Please Enter a valid Mobile Number','Error');
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF; 
END;
END IF; 

IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_MOBILE_NO IS NULL THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.MOB_CHECK:='N';
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-CHECKBOX-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Added By Shailendra 26.06.13
DECLARE
 LV_ERR_MSG VARCHAR2(1000);
 LN_ERR_CD NUMBER;
 lv_count VARCHAR2(12);
BEGIN
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_MOBILE_NO IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.MOB_CHECK = 'Y' AND 
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO IS NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEH_REG_CHECK = 'N' THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT COUNT(ENQ_NUM) INTO lv_count
 FROM rh_enq rh
 WHERE dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 AND parent_group = :global.parent_group
 AND loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 AND comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 AND mobile = :b_sh_enquiry.ref_mobile_no;
 EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;
 IF lv_count=0 THEN
 general.disp_text('Enquiry details not found for the Mobile Num ' || :b_sh_enquiry.ref_mobile_no,'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 FETCH_CUSTOMER_DETAILS;
 SHOW_VIEW('CN_MOB_NUM');
 GO_ITEM('B_MOB_NUM.MOB_NUM_CHECK');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_INSERT', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_DEL', 'D');
 
ELSIF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEH_REG_CHECK = 'Y' AND 
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_MOBILE_NO IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.MOB_CHECK = 'Y' THEN
 
 SP_REF_VEH_REG_NUM(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,
 :GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO,
 :B_VEH_REG_NUM.CUST_NAME,
 :B_VEH_REG_NUM.CUST_CD,
 :B_VEH_REG_NUM.MOBILE_NUM,
 LV_ERR_MSG,
 LN_ERR_CD);
 
 IF LN_ERR_CD > 0 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(LV_ERR_MSG,'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 
 SHOW_VIEW('CN_REG_NUM');
 GO_ITEM('B_VEH_REG_NUM.VEH_REG_NUM_CHECK');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_INSERT', 'D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_DEL', 'D');
 :B_MOB_NUM.CUST_NAME:=NULL;
 :B_MOB_NUM.ENQ_NUMBER:=NULL;
 :B_MOB_NUM.MOB_NUM_CHECK:=NULL;
 /*ELSE
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_MOBILE_NO');*/
END IF;
END;

Item.Name: VEH_REG_CHECK

Item.Hint: Check For Reference Vehicle Registration Number

Trigger.TriggerText:
--Added By Shailendra 26.06.13

IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEH_REG_CHECK = 'Y' AND

 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_DEL', 'D');
 
 ELSIF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_VEH_REG_NO IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEH_REG_CHECK = 'Y' AND

 SP_REF_VEH_REG_NUM(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,

 IF LN_ERR_CD > 0 THEN

 SHOW_VIEW('CN_REG_NUM');

 :B_MOB_NUM.CUST_NAME:=NULL;

 ELSE

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY = 'CIN' THEN
 DECLARE
 V_ERRMSG VARCHAR2(100);
 V_ERROR_CD NUMBER;
 V_CUST_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
 BEGIN
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.start_timer;
 end if;
 
 sp_get_customer_name(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD,
 V_CUST_NAME,
 V_ERRMSG,
 V_ERROR_CD);
 
 IF V_ERRMSG IS NOT NULL THEN
 :b_sh_enquiry.nb_cust_name := '';
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(V_ERRMSG,'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 else
 :b_sh_enquiry.nb_cust_name := v_cust_name;
 END IF;
 
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.stop_timer('PSS','RT_ENQ','Enquiry Tracking','Fetch the Customer Name',:global.userid);
 end if;
 END;
END IF;


IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY = 'EE' THEN
 
 IF(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD = :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO ) THEN
 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT ('Existing Enquiry And Queried Enquiry Cannot Be Same','Error');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD := '';
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 
 END IF;
 
 
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Added by saket as on 27-11-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12522 (start)
--IF :b_sh_enquiry.ref_autocard_no is not null AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then Commneted by saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number 12522
IF :b_sh_enquiry.ref_autocard_no is not null AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY = 'ACC' then --Added by saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number 12522
 declare
 lv_check number;
 begin
 select distinct 1 into lv_check
 from gd_loyalty_enrol x
 where reg_mobile=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0 and card_status='P'
 and card_num=:b_sh_enquiry.ref_autocard_no;
 exception
 when no_data_found then
 general.disp_text('Wrong Loyalty Card Number.','Error');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end;
end if;
--Added by saket as on 27-11-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12522 (end)

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (start) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
--if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY='ACC' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE='REF' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then Commented by saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY in ('ACC','ACD') AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE='REF' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then --Added by saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0 THEN
 general.disp_text('Referrer Mobile number can not be same as Enquiry Mobile Number.','Error');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY='ACC' THEN --Added by saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
 BEGIN
 select card_num , cust_name
 into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO, :b_sh_enquiry.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD
 from gd_loyalty_enrol x
 where reg_mobile=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0 and card_status='P';
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 general.disp_text('No Card Exists against the referal mobile number.','Error');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 When others Then
 null;
 END;
 END IF; --Added by saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
end if;
--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (end) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522

Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (start) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522

if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY in ('ACC','ACD') AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then --Added by saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO');
else
 next_item;
end if;
--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (end) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_BEVERAGE_REMARK',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
end if;

if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.BEVERAGE_CHOICE = 'O' then

Item.Name: TEST_DRIVE_REQ
Item.Hint: Select Test Drive Given or not

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 V_errmsg VARCHAR2(100);
 V_error_cd NUMBER;
 cnt number := 0;
BEGIN

 IF NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ, 'N') = 'Y' THEN
 /* Added By anand Raj 09072015 */
 go_block('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
 first_record;
 if :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD is null then
 General.disp_text('Please select model first', 'Note');
 go_item('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ := 'N';
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 begin
 cnt := 0;
 select count(*)
 into cnt
 from muldms.gm_mod gm
 where gm.test_drive_yn = 'N'
 and gm.model_cd = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD
 and gm.principal_map_cd = :global.principal;
 exception
 when others then
 cnt := 0;
 end;
 
 if cnt > 0 then
 
 General.disp_text('This Model Is Not Available For Test Drive!!', 'Note');
 go_item('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ := 'N';
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 
 else
 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_DSE_CODE', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE.CUST_FEEDBACK', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE.REMARKS', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('B_TEST_DRIVE.PB_BACK', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_TEST_DRIVE', 'E');
 
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_DATE := SYSDATE;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_DSE_CODE := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD;
 
 end if;
 /* Added By anand Raj 09072015 */
 
 else
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_DSE_CODE', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE.CUST_FEEDBACK', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE.REMARKS', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('B_TEST_DRIVE.PB_BACK', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_TEST_DRIVE', 'D');
 END IF;

 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ = 'N' THEN
 GO_BLOCK('B_TEST_DRIVE');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 go_block('B_SH_ENQUIRY');
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ');
 END IF;

END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ,'N') = 'Y' THEN
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PB_TEST_DRIVE');
ELSIF NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ,'N') = 'N' THEN 
 --GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.CASH');
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER');

END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
-----Added by Shailendra 16.02.13
if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUMMY_TOB_CHK ='Y' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.POC_TV_OUTLET is null then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Please Enter TV Outlet', 'Note');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 l_ERROR_MSG VARCHAR2(500);
 l_ERROR_CD NUMBER := 0;
 L_NEXT_DATE DATE;
 L_ACTION_PLAN VARCHAR2(1);
 L_NEXT_STAGE VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN
 :PARAMETER.BUYER_CHANGE_ALLOWED := NULL;
 --principal_map_cd =2 added by divya on 11-Jan-2018 for poc Sales DMSSAL- 12353
 if :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NULL and :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL IN (1,2) then
 Buyer_type_check;
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUMMY_TOB_CHK := 'N';
 
 elsif :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL and :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL in (1,2) then
 
 PKG_ENQ_POC_DETAIL.SP_ENQ_BUYER_TYPE(:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,
 :GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD,
 :GLOBAL.COMP_FA,
 :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER,
 :PARAMETER.BUYER_CHANGE_ALLOWED,
 L_NEXT_DATE,
 L_ACTION_PLAN,
 L_NEXT_STAGE,
 l_ERROR_MSG,
 l_ERROR_CD);
 IF l_ERROR_CD = 1 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(l_ERROR_MSG, 'Error');
 --Raise form_trigger_failure;
 ELSIF l_ERROR_CD = 0 THEN
 IF l_ERROR_MSG = 'NEW' THEN
 GO_BLOCK('B_ENQ_FOLLOW');
 GO_ITEM('B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE := L_NEXT_DATE;
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN := L_ACTION_PLAN;
 if :global.principal = 1 then
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE := L_NEXT_STAGE;
 else
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE := '';
 end if;
 /*IF BLOCK ADDED BY KANAV ON 16-Mar-2020 for DMSSAL(S)-13338*/
 
 ELSIF l_ERROR_MSG = 'OLD' THEN
 GO_BLOCK('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW');
 GO_ITEM('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE := L_NEXT_DATE;
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN := L_ACTION_PLAN;
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE := L_NEXT_STAGE;
 END IF;
 BUYER_TYPE_CHANGE;
 end if;
 else
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE := sysdate + 1;
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN := 'T';
 
 IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 1 THEN
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE := 'T';
 ELSE
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE := '';
 END IF;
 /*IF BLOCK ADDED BY KANAV ON 16-Mar-2020 for DMSSAL(S)-13338*/
 
 END IF;

 /*Added by Dp Swain*/
 if :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NULL then
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER = '04' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_SALESMAN_NAME := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR_NAME := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVAL_DLR_MAP_CD := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVAL_LOC_CD := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_OUTLET := ''; --Added by saket as on 21-02-2019
 
 
 ELSIF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER IN ('02', '03') THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY'); --commented by Dp Swain against DMSSAL-12294
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_SALESMAN_NAME := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR_NAME := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVAL_DLR_MAP_CD := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVAL_LOC_CD := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_OUTLET := ''; --Added by saket as on 21-02-2019
 
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY'); --commented by Dp Swain against DMSSAL-12294
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_SALESMAN_NAME := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR_NAME := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVAL_DLR_MAP_CD := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVAL_LOC_CD := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_OUTLET := ''; --Added by saket as on 21-02-2019
 
 END IF;
 else
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER = '04' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 
 ELSIF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER IN ('02', '03') THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY'); --commented by Dp Swain against DMSSAL-12294
 
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY'); --commented by Dp Swain against DMSSAL-12294
 
 END IF;
 end if;
 
 /*Started by Kanav on 01-May-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311*/
 IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 2 THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_SALESMAN_NAME',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 END IF;
 /*Closed by Kanav on 01-May-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311*/
 

 if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER IN ('02', '03', '04') then
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN := 'N';
 else
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN := 'Y';
 end if;
 --Added by saket as on 16-11-2018 against scr no 12450(start)
 if :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR',visible,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR_NAME',visible,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_OUTLET',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_OUTLET', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_OUTLET',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); --Added as on 21-02-2019
 end if;
 if :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='04' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR',visible,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR_NAME',visible,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_OUTLET',VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); --Added as on 21-02-2019
 end if;
 --Added by saket as on 16-11-2018 against scr no 12450(end)
 /* Added by Priya on 13-MAR-19 for DMSSAL(S)-13301 */ 
 DECLARE
 rg_name VARCHAR2(40);
 rg_id RecordGroup;
 errcode NUMBER;
 BEGIN
 rg_name := 'ENQ_FOLLOWACTNACTL';
 rg_id := Find_Group(rg_name);
 IF Id_Null(rg_id) THEN
 rg_id := Create_Group_From_Query(rg_name,
 'SELECT LIST_DESC, LIST_CODE
 FROM(
 SELECT X.LIST_DESC, X.LIST_CODE
 FROM AM_LIST X
 WHERE X.LIST_NAME = ''ENQ_FOLLOWACTNACTL''
 AND X.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND X.LIST_FLAG IS NULL
 AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NULL
 UNION
 SELECT X.LIST_DESC, X.LIST_CODE
 FROM AM_LIST X
 WHERE X.LIST_NAME = ''ENQ_FOLLOWACTNACTL''
 AND X.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL 
 )ORDER BY LIST_DESC' );
 END IF;
 errcode := Populate_Group(rg_id);
 POPULATE_LIST('B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE', RG_NAME); 
 END; 
 
 /* Closed Added by Priya on 13-MAR-19 for DMSSAL(S)-13301 */ 
 
SP_ADD_BUYER;--- Added by Rameshwar Kumar 24-Aug-2021
 
END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 19-11-2018 aganist the scr no 12450
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='04' THEN
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR');
 END IF;
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='01' THEN
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_OUTLET');
 END IF;
ELSE
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER in ('01','02','03') THEN
 IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 1 THEN --PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD check added by Kanav on 01-May-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD');
 ELSE
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME');
 END IF;
else
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR');
end if;
END IF;

if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.int_autocard='Y' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then
 declare
 lv_card_num gd_loyalty_enrol.card_num%type;
 lv_balance gd_loyalty_enrol.bal_point%type;
 begin
 select card_num,nvl(bal_point, 0)
 into lv_card_num, lv_balance
 from gd_loyalty_enrol x,gm_loyalty_master y
 where reg_mobile=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1 
 and x.card_type=y.card_type 
 and y.channel=:GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE 
 and rownum=1;
 general.disp_text('Card Number: '||lv_card_num||' and Balance Points: '||lv_balance,'Info');
 exception
 when others then
 null;
 end;
end if;
--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (end) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522

 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQEXD',DELETE_allowed,property_false);
 
END IF;

--Added By Shailendra 17.12.12

declare
 lv_outlet_cd number;
begin
 select count(OUTLET_CD)
 into lv_outlet_cd
 from SM_DMSPOC_TV_OUTLET
 where MSIL_DELR_CD = :parameter.p_mul_dlr_cd
 and FOR_CD = :parameter.p_for_cd
 and NVL(DEACTIVE_DATE,SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE -- Added By Shailendra on 14.10.14 (DMSSAL-12133)
 and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; /*Added PMC By Amit on 07-May-2014 For Multi Company Change*/

/* :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL check has been added in if condition by Dp Swain for SMIPL Changes on 10/01/2015*/
--Principal_map_cd =2 has been added by divya on 11-Jan-2018 for poc Sales DMSSAL-12353
 if :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL IN (1,2) and lv_outlet_cd >= 1 and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER = '01' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN = 'Y' THEN
 
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_MAKE := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MAKER;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_MOD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_model;
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQEXD', insert_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQEXD', update_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQEXD', DELETE_allowed, property_true);
 
 elsif :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL IN (1,2) and lv_outlet_cd=0 and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER = '01' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN = 'Y' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('No Mapping Found For TV Outlet','Note');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN := 'N' ; 
 
 --ElsIf Condition added by Dp Swain for avoiding Replacement Buyer check from SMIPL on 10/01/2015
 
 elsif :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL/*!=1*/NOT IN (1,2) and lv_outlet_cd=0 and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER = '01' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN = 'Y' THEN
 
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_MAKE := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MAKER;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_MOD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_model;
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQEXD', insert_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQEXD', update_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQEXD', DELETE_allowed, property_true);
 
 end if;
 end;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE 
 l_lov boolean; 
 cnt number := 0;
BEGIN 
 if :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then --Added by saket as on 13-11-2018 against scr no 12450
 l_lov := show_lov('LV_EVAL_VISIT_OB');
 else
 select count(*) into cnt 
 from gm_emp ge, gm_desg gd
 WHERE ge.DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 and ge.loc_cd = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 and gd.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND ge.EMP_CATEG = 'S'
 and ge.EMP_APPROVE = 'A'
 --divya AND ge.EMP_LEAVING_DATE IS NULL
 and nvl(ge.emp_leaving_date,sysdate+1) >= sysdate--divya
 and ge.EMP_DESG_CD = gd.desg_cd
 and gd.enq_assign_yn in ('E','V')
 AND DECODE(GD.DEALER_CATEGORY, 'DDL', 'NRM', GD.DEALER_CATEGORY) = :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE; 
 
 IF cnt > 0 THEN 
 
 l_lov := show_lov('LV_EVAL');
 else
 
 l_lov := show_lov('LV_EVAL_VISIT'); 
 END IF;
 end if;
END;
