Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' THEN --Added by saket as on 22-11-2018
 DECLARE
 rg_name VARCHAR2(40) := 'MODEL_CD';
 rg_id RecordGroup;
 errcode NUMBER;
 BEGIN
 rg_id := Find_Group(rg_name);
 IF Id_Null(rg_id) THEN
 rg_id := Create_Group_From_Query(rg_name,
 'SELECT DISTINCT MD.MODEL_DESC, MD.MODEL_CD
 FROM MULDMS.GM_MOD MD,
 MULDMS.GM_VAR VR,
 MULDMS.GM_CHANNEL_VARIANT_ALLOW VC
 WHERE MD.MODEL_CAT_CD = VR.MODEL_CAT_CD
 AND MD.MODEL_CD = VR.MODEL_CD
 AND MD.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = VR.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD
 AND VR.CHANNEL = VC.VARIANT_CATEGORY
 AND VR.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = VC.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD
 AND VC.CHANNEL_CATEGORY = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_CHANNEL
 AND VC.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND MD.VALID_YN = ''Y''
 ORDER BY MD.MODEL_DESC');
 END IF;
 errcode := Populate_Group(rg_id);
 POPULATE_LIST('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD', rg_name);
 END;
END IF;
next_item;

IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' THEN --Added by saket as on 22-11-2018
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_OUTLET',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
END IF;

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.CREATED_DATE := SYSDATE;
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.CREATED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;
IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 17-11-2018 by saket against scr 12450
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.DEALER_MAP_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD;--:GLOBAL.DEALER; 
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.COMP_FA := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP;--:GLOBAL.COMP_FA; 
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.LOC_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_LOC;--:GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.PARENT_GROUP := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT;--:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
ELSE
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.DEALER_MAP_CD := :GLOBAL.DEALER; 
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.COMP_FA := :GLOBAL.COMP_FA; 
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.LOC_CD := :GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.PARENT_GROUP := :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
END IF;
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE:=SYSDATE;--Added by Shailendra 05.06.12
IF NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ,'N')='Y' THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_DATE:=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE;
END IF;

-- Added by Shailendra on 13.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
IF :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN 
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE_FLAG :='D';
END IF; 

-- Added by Shailendra on 23.03.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
IF :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE = 'EXC' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE IS NULL THEN 
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE := 'WLK';
END IF; 
/* Added by Anand Raj DMSSAL-12200 */
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER IN ('01', '04') THEN
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.OLD_VEH_ENQ_STATUS := 'H';
END IF;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.MODIFIED_DATE := sysdate;
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.LINK_FLAG := NULL;

IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER IN ('01', '04') AND NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.OLD_VEH_ENQ_STATUS,'X') = 'X' THEN
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.OLD_VEH_ENQ_STATUS := 'H';
END IF;

--Added by saket as on 27-12-2019(start)
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.last_modified_by:='DMS';
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.last_modified_date:=sysdate;
--Added by saket as on 27-12-2019(en)

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

IF :PARAMETER.P_ENQ_NUM = 'Q' THEN
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.start_timer;
 end if;
--IF NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_LOV_CHECK,'Y') <> 'N' THEN


 EXECUTE_QUERY(NO_VALIDATE);

 IF GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY',QUERY_HITS) = 0 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Unable to fetch the enquiry details','Error');
 GO_ITEM('CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
/* GO_BLOCK('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
 EXECUTE_QUERY(NO_VALIDATE);*/
 
 
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.stop_timer('PSS','RT_ENQ','Enquiry Tracking','Query',:global.userid);
 --commit_form;
 end if;
 
 :PARAMETER.P_ENQ_NUM := 'N';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_LOV_CHECK := 'Y';
 
 --Added by saket as on 21-02-2019 (start)
 if :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 --Added by saket as on 21-02-2019 (end)
END IF;


IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COMMOR = 'R' AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 12.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RADDRESS1',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RTEL1',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PRE_RES_PHONE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC:= 'I';
ELSIF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COMMOR = 'R' AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE = 'EXC' THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 12.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC:= 'I';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COMMOR := 'M';
END IF;

-- Added By Shailendra on 16.07.15 
IF :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE = 'EXC' THEN
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.INT_AUTOCARD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE ,'VA_MANDATORY');
ELSE
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.INT_AUTOCARD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE ,'VA_DEFAULT');
END IF;


--Added by saket as on 01-11-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12576(start)
/** Commented by Saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12576
 IF MULDMS.SF_GET_SFDC_ENQ(:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP, :GLOBAL.DEALER, :GLOBAL.LOC_CD, :GLOBAL.COMP_FA, :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO) ='Y' THEN
 general.disp_text('This enquiry is not updatable','Note'); 
 set_block_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY',update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQUIRY',update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQUIRY',insert_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING',update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING',insert_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQUIRYIND',update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQUIRYIND',insert_allowed,property_false);
 END IF;
**/
--Added by saket as on 01-11-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12576(end)

Trigger.Name: KEY-UP
Trigger.TriggerText: PREVIOUS_FIELD;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_LOV_CHECK :='N';
:PARAMETER.P_WORKPLACE_ID:=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID;
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('cb_enquiry.nb_srl_no',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

-----GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('VALUE'||:PARAMETER.P_WORKPLACE_ID,'NOTE');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEMP_WORKPLACE_ID := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID;--Shakti
 :parameter.BUYER_TYPE := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER; /* Added by Anand Raj DMSSAL - 12200 */
begin
 SELECT CP_NAME into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.CORPRT_NAME
 FROM mul_corporate
 WHERE CP_NUMBER=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; ---Added :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL By Amit on 02-May-2014 For Multi Company Changes

exception
 when others then
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.CORPRT_NAME:='Not Found In Master';
end;

--populate state desc neha

 BEGIN
 SELECT state_desc 
 INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.state_desc
 FROM gm_state
 WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
 AND state_Cd = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.state_cd;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 null;
 END;
 
--DMSSAL_12276
begin
 select st.state_desc
 into :b_sh_enquiry.OFF_STATE_DESC
 from gm_state st
 where st.state_Cd =:b_sh_enquiry.OFF_STATE_CD
 and st.principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL;
exception when others then
 null;
end; 

---

--populate tehsil desc neha

 BEGIN
 SELECT tehsil_desc 
 INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.tehsil_name
 FROM gm_tehsil
 WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
 AND tehsil_cd = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.tehsil_cd;
 EXCEPTION
 when no_data_found then
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEHSIL_NAME:='NA';
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 null;
 END;
--populate village desc neha

 BEGIN
 SELECT village_name 
 INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.village_name
 FROM gm_village
 WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
 AND village_Cd = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.village_Cd;
 EXCEPTION
 when no_data_found then
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.village_name:='NA';
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 null;
 END;
/*---Title Population---------------*/
--Added by Dinker Against DMSSAL-12339 on 16-11-17-Start
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_CD IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT LIST_DESC INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_DESC FROM AM_LIST
 WHERE LIST_NAME='TITLE_CD'
 AND LIST_CODE=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_CD
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_DESC:=NULL;
 END ;
END IF;
--Added by Dinker Against DMSSAL-12339 on 16-11-17-Stop
 
 



if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEH_USE_PRE is not null 
 or :B_SH_ENQUIRY.KM_COVER is not null 
 or :B_SH_ENQUIRY.FAM_MEM is not null 
 or :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PUROS_NCAR is not null 
 or :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EXPCTNS_YCAR is not null 
 or :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ANY_PCAR_MIND is not null then
 :PARAMETER.P_QUESTION:='Y';
else
 :PARAMETER.P_QUESTION:='N';
end if; 
--SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUP_ENQ_CHK',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
/*IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC ='I' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_COMPANY',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_INDIVIDUAL',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_INDIVIDUAL',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
-- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_HOBBIES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 

ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_INDIVIDUAL',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_COMPANY',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_COMPANY',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
-- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_HOBBIES',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
END IF;

*/

IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC = 'C' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME',PROMPT_TEXT , 'Firm Name');
END IF;


IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_FINANCE ='Y' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_FINANCE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_FINANCE',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_FINANCE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
END IF;

IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID = 'OT' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
END IF;
 
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.CIN IS NOT NULL THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.CIN',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
END IF;

IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID = 'OT' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
END IF;


/*IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ = 'Y' THEN
 SELECT SALES_MAN_CD,TD_BOOK_NUM
 INTO :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_DSE_CODE,:B_TEST_DRIVE.TDB_NO
 FROM RT_TEST_DRIVE
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND LOC_CD= :global.loc_cd
 AND COMP_FA= :global.COMP_FA
 AND PARENT_GROUP=:global.parent_group 
 AND ENQ_NUM=:cb_enquiry.nb_srl_no
 AND ROWNUM<2;
 
END IF;*/
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_DSE_CODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ------SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE.CUST_FEEDBACK',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); /* COMMENTED ON 31/07/2009*/
 ------SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_TEST_DRIVE.REMARKS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); /* COMMENTED ON 31/07/2009*/
 ------set_item_property('PB_BACK',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); /* COMMENTED ON 31/07/2009*/
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEST_DRIVE_REQ = 'Y' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PB_TEST_DRIVE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
END IF;
 
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE', INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE', UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

-- set_item_property('enq_eventcd',enabled,property_false); 
-- set_item_property('enq_event_date',enabled,property_false); 

--Displaying Source Descripton Added by Hari on 06-11-06

Declare
 v_errcode number;
 v_errmsg varchar2(200);
 flag varchar2(2);
Begin--SSS
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE IS NOT NULL THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 12.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 Begin
 Select RM.ETYPE_DESC Into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE From Rm_Etypes Rm Where Rm.DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 And RM.ETYPE_CD =:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE;
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Invalid Source Code','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 When Too_Many_Rows Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Too Many Rows','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(v_errmsg,'Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End;
 SELECT etype_Flag into flag 
 from rm_etypes 
 where DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 and etype_Cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE;
 if flag='D' then
 /*if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE in ('MUL','MDS','MOB','WEB') then */--neha
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 else 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 end if; 
 
 /*Added by Dp Swain against DMSSAL-12276*/ 
 if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MAIN_SOURCE in ('MOBA','TAB') then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 else
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 end if;
 
 END IF; -- 

 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='01' THEN --AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN = 'Y' then 
 -- set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MAKER',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_MANDATORY');
 -- set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MODEL',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_MANDATORY'); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MAKER',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MODEL',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_MANDATORY'); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',insert_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF; 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='02' THEN 
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MAKER',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_MANDATORY');
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MODEL',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_MANDATORY'); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'DEFAULT'); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',insert_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSif :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='03' THEN 
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MAKER',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'DEFAULT');
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MODEL',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'DEFAULT'); 
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MAKER',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MODEL',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'DEFAULT'); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',insert_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 END IF; 
 --Shakti 
end;--SSS
 
--Displaying Mode Desc
If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MAIN_SOURCE Is Not Null Then
 Declare
 v_errcode number;
 v_errmsg varchar2(200);
 Begin
 Select AM.LIST_DESC Into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE From Am_List Am 
 Where AM.LIST_NAME='ENQUIRY_SOURCE' 
 AND AM.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
 --AND AM.LIST_FLAG !='D'
 And Am.LIST_CODE =:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MAIN_SOURCE;
 
 /* Select AM.LIST_DESC Into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE From Am_List Am,rm_Sou_mode so 
 Where AM.LIST_NAME='ENQUIRY_SOURCE' AND AM.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=1 
 and am.list_code=so.mode_cd
 and so.etype_cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE
 and so.mode_cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MAIN_SOURCE;*/ ---neha
 
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Invalid Mode Code','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 When Too_Many_Rows Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Too Many Rows','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(v_errmsg,'Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End;
End If;

If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MAIN_SOURCE = 'NAV' and :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 1 Then -- Added by Pawan on 18-05-2017 (DMSSAL-12320)
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
End If;

--if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE IN ('EVE','EVT') then
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE IS NOT NULL THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 12.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171) 
IF :cb_enquiry.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE IN ('EVE','EVT') THEN
Declare
 v_errcode number;
 v_errmsg varchar2(200);
Begin
select ENQ_EVENTCD Into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE from rh_enq 
 Where parent_group = :global.parent_group 
 and dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer 
 AND loc_cd =:global.loc_cd 
 and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa 
 and enq_num = :cb_enquiry.NB_SRL_NO; 
Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Invalid Source Code','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 When Too_Many_Rows Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Too Many Rows','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(v_errmsg,'Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
End;
begin
SELECT EVENT_NAME INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_EVENT_DESC
 FROM sm_event
 WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes 
 AND EVENT_CD=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE;

exception
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_EVENT_DESC:=null;
end;

Elsif :cb_enquiry.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE ='ADV' THEN
Declare
 v_errcode number;
 v_errmsg varchar2(200);
Begin
select ENQ_EVENTCD Into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE from rh_enq 
 Where parent_group = :global.parent_group 
 and dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer 
 AND loc_cd =:global.loc_cd 
 and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa 
 and enq_num = :cb_enquiry.NB_SRL_NO; 
Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Invalid Source Code','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 When Too_Many_Rows Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Too Many Rows','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(v_errmsg,'Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
End;
END IF;--
END IF;
-----To display all descriptions
declare
 v_errcode number;
 v_errmsg varchar2(200);

begin
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.start_timer;
 end if;

/* sp_get_employee_name(:GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD ,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_SALESMAN_NAME,
 v_errmsg,
 v_errcode);*/
 
 sp_get_employee_name(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVAL_DLR_MAP_CD, :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVAL_LOC_CD, :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR, :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR_NAME, v_errmsg, v_errcode);
 
SP_GET_PQ_RT_ENQ_MAIN
 (:global.principal,
 :GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD ,
 :GLOBAL.COMP_FA,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_SALESMAN_NAME,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RCITYCD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_RCITY_DESC,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_OCITYCD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_OCITY_DESC,
 v_errmsg
 );
 
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.stop_timer('PSS','RT_ENQ','Enquiry Tracking','Fetch the Enquiry Details',:global.userid);
 end if;
 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(v_errmsg,'PROCEDURE SP_GET_PQ_RT_ENQ_MAIN Failed');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
END; 


DECLARE
 
 LV_ERR_MSG VARCHAR(200);
 LV_ERR_CD NUMBER := 0;
 
BEGIN
 /** Commented by saket as on 17-11-2018 against the scr number 12450
 SP_GET_EMPLOYEE_NAME(:GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.CREATED_BY,
 :CB_ENQUIRY.CREATED_BY_NAME,
 LV_ERR_MSG,
 LV_ERR_CD);
 
 IF(LV_ERR_MSG IS NOT NULL ) THEN
 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(LV_ERR_MSG,'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 
 END IF;
 **/ 
--TO GET THE MSPIN
BEGIN
 SELECT nvl(MSPIN,'MSPIN') INTO :CB_ENQUIRY.MSPIN 
 FROM GM_EMP
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND EMP_CD =:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD
 AND LOC_CD=:GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
EXCEPTION 
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 :CB_ENQUIRY.MSPIN :='MSPIN';
END;
 
END;

--POPULATE THE PINCODE DESCRIPTION
DECLARE
 LV_ERR_MSG VARCHAR2(1000);
 LN_REC_CNT NUMBER;
 LN_ERR_CD NUMBER;
BEGIN
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COMMOR = 'O' THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_ODESC := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MAIN_ZONE_CD;
 SELECT COUNT(1) 
 INTO LN_REC_CNT
 FROM GM_PIN
 WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND PIN_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.OFF_PIN;
 IF LN_REC_CNT > 0 THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_ODESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_DISPLAY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_ODESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_ODESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_TEXT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_ODESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_ODESC',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_ODESC',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_ODESC',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
 ELSE
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MAIN_ZONE_CD;
 SELECT COUNT(1) 
 INTO LN_REC_CNT
 FROM GM_PIN
 WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND PIN_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.RES_PIN;
 IF LN_REC_CNT > 0 THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_DISPLAY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_TEXT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PIN_DESC',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
 --CHECK FOR EVENTS AND ADS
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE IS NOT NULL AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE IN ('EVE','ADV','EVT') AND
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VA_MANDATORY');
 --FETCH THE EVENT/AD DESCRIPTION
 /*SP_GET_EVAD_DESC(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MAIN_SOURCE,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_EVENT_DESC,LV_ERR_MSG,LN_ERR_CD);*/
 SP_GET_EVAD_DESC(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_EVENT_DESC,LV_ERR_MSG,LN_ERR_CD);

 IF LN_ERR_CD > 0 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(LV_ERR_MSG,'Error');
 END IF; 
 --SET THE LOV
 --IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE = 'EVE' THEN
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE IN ('EVE','EVT') AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN ----Added by Shailendra on 18.03.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',LOV_NAME,'LV_EVENTS');
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',LOV_NAME,'LV_ADS');
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
 :PARAMETER.OLD_ENQ_SRC := NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MAIN_SOURCE,'NA');
 :PARAMETER.OLD_ENQ_SRC_CD := NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE,'NA');
 :PARAMETER.OLD_ENQ_MODE := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE;
 :PARAMETER.OLD_ENQUIRER_TYPE := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQUIRER_TYPE;
 :PARAMETER.OLD_DSE := NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD,'NA');
 --set the visual attributes

 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE IN ('EVE','EVT') AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN ----Added by Shailendra on 18.03.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD := '';
 -- :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE := '';
 -- :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_EVENT_DESC := '';
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',LOV_NAME,'LV_EVENTS');
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',PROMPT_TEXT,'Event/Promotion');Campaign/Events 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',PROMPT_TEXT,'Campaign/Events'); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VALIDATE_FROM_LIST, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSIF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE = 'REF' AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN ----Added by Shailendra on 18.03.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY', UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC', UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VALIDATE_FROM_LIST, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_EVENT_DESC := '';

 ELSIF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE = 'DSA' AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN ----Added by Shailendra on 18.03.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VALIDATE_FROM_LIST , PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',PROMPT_TEXT,'DSA/DMA Name');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',LOV_NAME,'LV_DS');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_EVENT_DESC := '';
 Declare
 v_errcode number;
 v_errmsg varchar2(200);
 Begin
 select PARTY_NAME INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_CUST_NAME from gm_party
 where party_type='DM'
 AND party_cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_ref_custcd /*Dinker 270617*/
 AND PARENT_GROUP=:global.parent_group
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD=:global.dealer;
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 /* GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('DSA/DMA Name not Found','Error'); Raise Form_Trigger_Failure; Commented by Rameshwar on SCR - DMSSAL-12468 */ 
 Null;
 When Too_Many_Rows Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Too Many Rows','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(v_errmsg,'Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End;
 ELSIF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE = 'ADV' AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN ----Added by Shailendra on 18.03.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD := '';

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',LOV_NAME,'LV_ADS');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',PROMPT_TEXT,'Advertisement');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VALIDATE_FROM_LIST, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 /* Added BY anand raj 06072015 */
 ELSIF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE = 'REF' AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE = 'EXC' THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); /* Added BY anand raj 06072015 */ 
 else
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC := '';
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD := '';
 --:B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE := '';--Commented By Anand Raj 07092015
 --:B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_EVENT_DESC := '';--Commented By Anand Raj 07092015
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.EVENT_CODE', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 END IF;
 
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE IN ('TCL','TLP') AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN ----Added by Shailendra on 18.03.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SRC_REF',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DISPLAY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SRC_REF', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SRC_REF', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SRC_REF', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SRC_REF',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 END IF;
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE = 'REF' AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN ----Added by Shailendra on 18.03.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
-- IF(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY = 'ACC') THEN Commented by saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number 12522
 IF(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY in ('ACC','ACD')) THEN --Added by saket as on 26-12-2019 against the scr number 12522
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 elsif :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY IN ('EE','CIN','OT','ME') THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD', NAVIGABLE, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSE 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO',VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE , 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;
END IF; 
END; 

-- Added by Shailendra 05.06.12 

Begin
 select ENQ_DATE
 Into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DUMMY_ENQ_DATE
 from rh_enq
 Where parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and enq_num = :cb_enquiry.NB_SRL_NO;
Exception
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
End;


----Added by Shailendra 13.02.13

If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num is not null then
 begin
 select SI.DMS_POC_OUTLET_CD
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_TV_OUTLET
 from MULDMS.SI_DMS_POC_ENQ SI
 where SI.DMS_DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 and SI.DMS_PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 and SI.DMS_LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 and SI.DMS_COMP_FA = :GLOBAL.COMP_FA
 and SI.DMS_ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num;
 exception when no_data_found then 
 begin 
 select SI.POC_TV_OUTLET_CD
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_TV_OUTLET
 from MULDMS.SI_POC_DMS_ENQ SI
 where SI.DMS_DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 and SI.DMS_PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 and SI.DMS_LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 and SI.DMS_COMP_FA = :GLOBAL.COMP_FA
 and SI.DMS_ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num;
 exception
 when others then 
 null;
 end;
 end;
 
begin
 select OUTLET_CD,TV_OUTLET_DESC
 into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.POC_TV_OUTLET,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.TV_OUTLET_DESC
 from SM_DMSPOC_TV_OUTLET
 where MSIL_DELR_CD=:PARAMETER.P_MUL_DLR_CD
 and FOR_CD=:PARAMETER.P_FOR_CD
 and OUTLET_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_TV_OUTLET
 and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
 exception when others then
 null;
End;

end if;

SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.POC_TV_OUTLET',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

 ----Added by Shailendra 03.07.13
 BEGIN
 SELECT LIST_DESC
 INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC
 FROM AM_LIST
 WHERE LIST_NAME = 'REFFERAL_TYPE'
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
 AND LIST_CODE =:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY;
 EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC:=NULL;
 END;
 
 
 ----Added by Shailendra on 18.03.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 DECLARE
 LV_CNT NUMBER;
 BEGIN
 BEGIN
 SELECT COUNT(*)
 INTO LV_CNT
 FROM RD_ENQEXD
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :GLOBAL.COMP_FA
 AND ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 LV_CNT := 0;
 END;
 
 IF LV_CNT = 1 THEN
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD', DELETE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
 END;

-- Added BY Shailendra on 16.07.15 
DECLARE
 LV_ERR_CD NUMBER;
 LV_ERR_MSG VARCHAR2(500); 
BEGIN 
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.INT_AUTOCARD IS NULL THEN 
PKG_MI_EW_AUTOCARD.SP_AC_YN(:GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD,
 :GLOBAL.COMP_FA,
 :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO, 
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.INT_AUTOCARD,
 LV_ERR_CD,
 LV_ERR_MSG);
END IF;
END;
field_color_set_after_fetch;

If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER = '01' and :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 1 Then
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); -- Added by Pawan on 18-05-2017 (DMSSAL-12320)
End If; 

--Added BY Dinker 24-08-17

DECLARE
 LV_SOURCE VARCHAR2(100);
BEGIN
 BEGIN
 SELECT ETYPE_CD INTO LV_SOURCE FROM RH_ENQ
 WHERE PARENT_GROUP=:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND LOC_CD=:GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA=:GLOBAL.COMP_FA
 AND ENQ_NUM=:CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 LV_SOURCE:=NULL;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 LV_SOURCE:=NULL;
 END;
 IF LV_SOURCE in ('EBK','WEB') THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRYIND.ENQ_INDACCCATEG_DESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.MIDDLE_NAME',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.LAST_NAME',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 -- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 -- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 -- SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSIF LV_SOURCE not in ('EBK','WEB') THEN
 /* SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQ.WORKPLACE_ID',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQ.ENQ_WORKPLACE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQ.TYPE_OF_BUYER',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRYIND.ENQ_INDACCCATEG_DESC',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.MIDDLE_NAME',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.LAST_NAME',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);*/
 null;
 END IF;
END;

---DIVYA on DMSSAL-12340 on 12-Dec-2017 for Vehicle ownership START
BEGIN
 select list_desc 
 into :b_sh_enquiry.veh_driver_desc
 from am_list 
where list_name='CAR_OWNER'
AND list_code=:b_sh_enquiry.veh_driver
And principal_map_cd=:global.principal;
EXCEPTION WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :b_sh_enquiry.veh_driver_desc:=NULL;

BEGIN
 select list_desc 
 into :b_sh_enquiry.VEH_FOR_DESC
 from am_list 
where list_name='CAR_OWNER'
AND list_code=:b_sh_enquiry.VEH_FOR 
And principal_map_cd=:global.principal;
EXCEPTION WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :b_sh_enquiry.VEH_FOR_DESC:=NULL;
END; 
---DIVYA on DMSSAL-12340 12-Dec-2017 for Vehicle ownership STOP

BEGIN
select LIST_DESC
 INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_CUST_AGE
 FROM AM_LIST
 WHERE LIST_NAME = 'ENQ_CUST_AGE_GROUP'
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND LIST_CODE = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_CUST_AGE_CD;

EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN 
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_CUST_AGE := NULL;
END;


--Added by saket as on 18-10-2019 against the SCR Number DMSSAL-12587(start)
If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.BUSS_ASSO_TYPE Is Not Null Then
 Declare
 v_errcode number;
 v_errmsg varchar2(200);
 Begin
 Select AM.LIST_DESC Into :B_SH_ENQUIRY.BUSS_ASSO_TYPE_DESC From Am_List Am 
 Where AM.LIST_NAME='BUSS_ASSO_TYPE' 
 AND AM.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL 
 And Am.LIST_CODE =:B_SH_ENQUIRY.BUSS_ASSO_TYPE;
 Exception
 When No_Data_Found Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Invalid Mode Code','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 When Too_Many_Rows Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Too Many Rows','Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(v_errmsg,'Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End;
End If;
--Added by saket as on 18-10-2019 against the SCR Number DMSSAL-12587(end)

--Added by saket as on 27-12-2019 (start)
BEGIN
 select list_desc

 where list_name='LOAN_STAGE' and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL and list_code=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.loan_stage;

 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.loan_stage_desc:=null;

 else

/*Started by Rameshwar Kumar on 02-APRIL-2021 for DMSSAL(S)-13393 ENQ Name Middle name Last Name Non Editable*/

 end if;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin B_COMPANY detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_COMPANY'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_COMPANY'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_COMPANY detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_COMPANY1 detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_COMPANY1'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_COMPANY1'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_COMPANY1 detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQCONS detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_SD_ENQCONS'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_SD_ENQCONS'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQCONS detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQFAMILY detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_SD_ENQFAMILY'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_SD_ENQFAMILY'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQFAMILY detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQFIN detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_SD_ENQFIN'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_SD_ENQFIN'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQFIN detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQHOB detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_SD_ENQHOB'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_SD_ENQHOB'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQHOB detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQUIRYIND detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_SD_ENQUIRYIND'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_SD_ENQUIRYIND'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQUIRYIND detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQVEH detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_SD_ENQVEH'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_SD_ENQVEH'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQVEH detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQCOMP detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_SD_ENQCOMP'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_SD_ENQCOMP'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQCOMP detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQUIRY detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_SD_ENQUIRY'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_SD_ENQUIRY'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQUIRY detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQEXD detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('B_SH_ENQUIRY.B_SH_ENQUIRY_B_SD_ENQEXD'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'B_SD_ENQEXD'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQEXD detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: KEY-DOWN
Trigger.TriggerText: NEXT_FIELD;

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin B_COMPANY detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_COMPANY_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQ_COMP_DET R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_COMPANY detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_COMPANY1 detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_COMPANY1_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQ_COMP_CON R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_COMPANY1 detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQCONS detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_SD_ENQCONS_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQOTH R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQCONS detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQFAMILY detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_SD_ENQFAMILY_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQFAMILY R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQFAMILY detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQFIN detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_SD_ENQFIN_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQFIN R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQFIN detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQHOB detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_SD_ENQHOB_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQHOB R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQHOB detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQUIRYIND detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_SD_ENQUIRYIND_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQIND R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQUIRYIND detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQVEH detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_SD_ENQVEH_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQVEH R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQVEH detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQCOMP detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_SD_ENQCOMP_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQCOMP R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQCOMP detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQUIRY detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_SD_ENQUIRY_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQ R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQUIRY detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQEXD detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR B_SD_ENQEXD_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM RD_ENQEXD R 
 WHERE R.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQEXD detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin B_COMPANY detail program section
 --
 OPEN B_COMPANY_cur; 
 FETCH B_COMPANY_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B_COMPANY_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B_COMPANY_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B_COMPANY_cur;
 --
 -- End B_COMPANY detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_COMPANY1 detail program section
 --
 OPEN B_COMPANY1_cur; 
 FETCH B_COMPANY1_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B_COMPANY1_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B_COMPANY1_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B_COMPANY1_cur;
 --
 -- End B_COMPANY1 detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQCONS detail program section
 --
 OPEN B_SD_ENQCONS_cur; 
 FETCH B_SD_ENQCONS_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B_SD_ENQCONS_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQCONS_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQCONS_cur;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQCONS detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQFAMILY detail program section
 --
 OPEN B_SD_ENQFAMILY_cur; 
 FETCH B_SD_ENQFAMILY_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B_SD_ENQFAMILY_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQFAMILY_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQFAMILY_cur;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQFAMILY detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQFIN detail program section
 --
 OPEN B_SD_ENQFIN_cur; 
 FETCH B_SD_ENQFIN_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B_SD_ENQFIN_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQFIN_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQFIN_cur;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQFIN detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQHOB detail program section
 --
 OPEN B_SD_ENQHOB_cur; 
 FETCH B_SD_ENQHOB_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B_SD_ENQHOB_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQHOB_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQHOB_cur;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQHOB detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQUIRYIND detail program section
 --
 OPEN B_SD_ENQUIRYIND_cur; 
 FETCH B_SD_ENQUIRYIND_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B_SD_ENQUIRYIND_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQUIRYIND_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQUIRYIND_cur;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQUIRYIND detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQVEH detail program section
 --
 OPEN B_SD_ENQVEH_cur; 
 FETCH B_SD_ENQVEH_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B_SD_ENQVEH_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQVEH_cur;

 CLOSE B_SD_ENQVEH_cur;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQVEH detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQCOMP detail program section
 --
 OPEN B_SD_ENQCOMP_cur;

 IF ( B_SD_ENQCOMP_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.');

 END IF;
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQCOMP_cur;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQCOMP detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin B_SD_ENQUIRY detail program section
 --
 OPEN B_SD_ENQUIRY_cur; 
 FETCH B_SD_ENQUIRY_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( B_SD_ENQUIRY_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQUIRY_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE B_SD_ENQUIRY_cur;
 --
 -- End B_SD_ENQUIRY detail program section
 --

 -- Begin B_SD_ENQEXD detail program section

Block.Name: B_SD_ENQUIRY
Block.WhereClause: parent_group = :global.parent_group and dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer AND loc_cd =:global.loc_cd and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa and enq_num = :cb_enquiry.NB_SRL_NO

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
--general.check_null(:b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd,'Model Code');

null;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD := '';
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD := '';
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR := '';
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_ECOLORCD := '';

/*Started by Kanav on 01-May-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311*/
 IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 2 and :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is null THEN --NB_SRL_NO check added by kanav on 21-may-19 for DMSSAL(S)-13314
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_SALESMAN_NAME',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 END IF;
/*Closed by Kanav on 01-May-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311*/

/*Started by Kanav on 29-Apr-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311*/

DECLARE
 LV_LINE_CD VARCHAR2(5);
 LV_COUNT NUMBER;
 LV_MODEL_SEG NUMBER;

BEGIN
 
IF /*:CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is null and*/ :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 2 THEN

BEGIN
 SELECT LINE_CD
 INTO LV_LINE_CD
 FROM GM_MOD
 WHERE MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND LINE_CD = decode(TO_NUMBER(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD),1,LINE_CD,nvl(:CB_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SEGMENT_CD,LINE_CD)); 

EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 if TO_NUMBER(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD) > 1 then
 general.disp_text('Vehicle can only be selected of segment :'|| :CB_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SEGMENT_CD,'Error');
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD := '';
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
END;
 
 /* Started by Kanav on 07-May-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311 because employee with segment 'B is same as 'A2'*/
 IF LV_LINE_CD = 'A2' THEN
 LV_LINE_CD := 'B';
 END IF;
 /* Closed by Kanav on 07-May-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311 because employee with segment 'B is same as 'A2'*/

if :CB_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SEGMENT_CD is null or TO_NUMBER(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD) = 1 then
:CB_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SEGMENT_CD := LV_LINE_CD;
end if;


BEGIN
 SELECT COUNT(*)
 INTO LV_COUNT
 FROM GM_EMP
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND SEGMENT = LV_LINE_CD;

 IF LV_COUNT = 0 THEN
 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('There is no DSE with segment : '|| LV_LINE_CD||'. Please update segment in employee master and then generate the enquiry','Note'); 
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD := '';
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
END;

END IF;
END;

/*Ended by Kanav on 29-Apr-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311*/

IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM='Y' THEN /* ADDED ON 15/09/2009 IF PRIMARY MODEL*/
:PARAMETER.P_DEL_YN:='Y'; /* PASSING PARAMETER FOR DELETION added on 17/09/2009*/ 
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.NB_TEMP_SCHEME_YN:='N'; /* added on 15/09/2009 */
POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND.DELETE; /* added on 15/09/2009 */
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM:='N'; 
GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Model chnged! So primary model selection and schemes will be detached,if attached','Warning');
END IF;

/* IF GENERAL.DUP_REC_CHECK('B_SD_ENQUIRY', 'ENQ_SUFFIXCD', :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD, TO_NUMBER(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD)) THEN

 END IF;
END;

DECLARE

BEGIN

 END IF;
 
 IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD IS NOT NULL AND :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS IN ('O','C','L','D') AND GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY',STATUS) IN ('QUERY','CHANGED') THEN
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD',V_NUM,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD',V_NUM,UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 -- NULL;
 ELSE
 V_BOOL := SHOW_LOV('LV_VAR'); 
 IF V_BOOL THEN
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR := '';
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_ECOLORCD := '';
/* IF GENERAL.DUP_REC_CHECK('B_SD_ENQUIRY', 'ENQ_SUFFIXCD', :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD, TO_NUMBER(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD)) THEN
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD := '';
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD := '';
 END IF;*/
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD',V_NUM,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD',V_NUM,UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 RG_ID RECORDGROUP;
 GC_ID GROUPCOLUMN;
 TOT_ROWS NUMBER := 0;
 REC_NUM NUMBER; 
 CUR_VAL VARCHAR2(500);
-- lv_value varchar2(500);
BEGIN
 CUR_VAL := TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD) || TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD) || TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_ECOLORCD);
 REC_NUM := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
 
 -- check for the record group ( rg_name ) existance 
 rg_id := find_group('B_SD_ENQUIRY'); 
 
 -- if the record group ( rg_name ) does not exist CREATE it & add
 -- COLS else find the group column id ( gc_id ).
 -- 
 IF Id_Null(rg_id) THEN
 rg_id := create_group('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
 gc_id := add_group_column(rg_id,'ENQ_COLOR',CHAR_COLUMN,500);
 ELSE
 gc_id := find_column('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR');
 END IF;
 
 --
 -- Store the number of records exist in that record group ( rg_name ).
 --
 tot_rows := get_group_row_count( rg_id );
 
 -- 
 -- for every record( exept the current record ) in the record group ( rg_name )
 -- compare the key field ( gc_ id ) with the present record key field .
 -- If any match is found then give the error message and stop , else , 
 -- update or insert the record in to the record with the values from current block 
 --
 IF ( nvl(tot_rows,0 ) != 0 ) THEN
 FOR i in 1..tot_rows
 LOOP
 IF ( rec_num != i ) THEN -- if rec-grp rec_num != currentblock rec_num
-- IF ( get_group_char_cell(gc_id, i) = cur_val ) -- if key flds are eql

 IF upper( get_group_char_cell(gc_id, i)) = upper(cur_val ) 
 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Variant ' || :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD || ' and color ' || :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR ||
 ' already selected','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;
 
 IF ( nvl(tot_rows,0) < rec_num ) THEN
 add_group_row(rg_id,rec_num);
 END IF;
 set_group_char_cell(gc_id, rec_num, cur_val);
 
 --general.check_null(:b_sd_enquiry.enq_ecolorcd,'Exterior Color');
 /*IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR IS NOT NULL THEN
 SP_CALC_APPROX_AVAIL(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_ECOLORCD,
 :GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.APPROX_AVAIL,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD);
 END IF;
 
 */
END;

DECLARE
 V_BOOL BOOLEAN;

 V_NUM NUMBER := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
BEGIN
 --pop_lov_color;
-- IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR IS NULL THEN -- Commented by Shailendra on 27.04.15 (NEHA mail on 25.04.15)
 IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR IS NULL AND :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD IS NOT NULL THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 27.04.15 (NEHA mail on 25.04.15)
 V_BOOL := SHOW_LOV('LV_ECLR');

 --SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.COLOR',V_NUM,UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

 :GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,
 :GLOBAL.COMP_FA,
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.APPROX_AVAIL,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD);
 ENTER;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR',V_NUM,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR',V_NUM,UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 END IF;

END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 V_BOOL BOOLEAN;
 v_char varchar2(100);
 V_REC_BOOL BOOLEAN;
 V_NUM NUMBER := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
BEGIN
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.start_timer;
 end if;

 /*IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD IS NOT NULL THEN
 SET_LOV_PROPERTY('LV_VAR',GROUP_NAME,'RG_VAR');
 LV_STR := TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD) || TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD) || TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_ECOLORCD);
 GENERAL.CREATE_RECGRP_ROW('B_SD_ENQUIRY','ENQ_COLOR',LV_STR);
 END IF;*/
 
 IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR IS NOT NULL AND :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS IN ('O','C','L','D') AND GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY',STATUS) IN ('QUERY','CHANGED') THEN
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR',V_NUM,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR',V_NUM,UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 -- NULL;
 ELSE
 V_BOOL := SHOW_LOV('LV_ECLR'); 
 IF V_BOOL THEN
 SP_CALC_APPROX_AVAIL(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_ECOLORCD,
 :GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,
 :GLOBAL.COMP_FA,
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.APPROX_AVAIL,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD);
 
 ENTER;
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR',V_NUM,INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR',V_NUM,UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;
END IF; 
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.stop_timer('PSS','RT_ENQ','Enquiry Tracking','Calculation of the Approximately Available Vehicle',:global.userid);
 end if;
--END IF;
END;

DECLARE

BEGIN

 
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.NB_TEMP_SCHEME_YN:='N'; /* added on 15/09/2009 */

 FIRST_RECORD;

 ELSE

 End if; 
 END; 
 
 ----END kanhaiya ---02-may-2016------
 */
