Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 LV_ERR_MSG VARCHAR2(1000);
 LV_SCH_VLD VARCHAR2(10);
 LN_ERR_CD NUMBER;
 V_MSG VARCHAR2(500);
 LV_SCHEME_TYPE VARCHAR2(10);
BEGIN
 
 if :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD is null or :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD is null then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Please select Model/Variant First!!!!','Error');
 go_item('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD'); 
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 end if;
 
 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
--IF GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY',STATUS) IN('NEW','CHANGED') THEN
 if :B_SD_ENQUIRY.enq_model_cd is not null AND GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY',STATUS) IN('NEW','CHANGED') then
 
IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM='Y' THEN /* ADDED ON 15/09/2009 to ALLOW ONLY PRIMARY MODELS*/ 

 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN /* added on 15/09/2009 */ 

 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.start_timer;
 end if;
 
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT','D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL','D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE','D');
 SHOW_VIEW('C_SCHEMES');
 go_item('PB_SCHEMES_OK');
 
 
 IF NVL(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.NB_TEMP_SCHEME_YN,'N') = 'N' THEN
 
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.NB_TEMP_SCHEME_YN := 'Y';
 
 GO_BLOCK('B_SCHEME');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 
-------------------------------COMMENTED ON 31/07/2009------------------------------- 
 /* SP_GET_SCHEMES(:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,:GLOBAL.DEALER,:GLOBAL.COMP_FA,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL,NVL(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM,'AA'),
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD,NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE,SYSDATE),
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID,'I',POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND,POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM);*/
-------------------------------COMMENTED ON 31/07/2009------------------------------- 
 /* Procedure name changed from SP_GET_SCHEMES to SP_GET_SCHEMES_NEW on 15/09/09 for new scheme logic*/
 SP_GET_SCHEMES_NEW(:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,:GLOBAL.DEALER,:GLOBAL.COMP_FA,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL,NVL(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM,'AA'),
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD,NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE,SYSDATE),
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID,'I',POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND,POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM,
 :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE,--DMSSAL-12315
 'IND' --Added by saket as on 25-01-2021 against the scr number 12747
 );

 --:CB_ENQUIRY.V_CHAR := V_CHAR;
 
 
 


 FOR I IN 1..POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND.COUNT
 LOOP
 :B_SCHEME.SL_NO := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_CODE := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL1;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_DESC := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL2;
 :B_SCHEME.FROM_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL3;
 :B_SCHEME.TO_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL4;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_SEL := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL6;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_ENQVARIANTCD := :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD; /*modified on 15/09/09*/ 
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_MODEL :=Sf_Get_Model_Desc(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD,:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL); ---Added PMC By Amit on 07-May-2014 For Multi Company Changes /*added on 15/09/09*/ /* :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD;*/
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_AMT := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL5;
 -----:B_SCHEME.SCHEME_TYPE := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL7; /*commented on 15/09/09*/
 LV_SCHEME_TYPE:= POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL7; /*added on 15/09/09*/
 LV_SCH_VLD := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL8;
 :B_SCHEME.CREATED_BY := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL11;
 :B_SCHEME.CREATED_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND(I).COL12;
 -----SP_GET_LIST_DESC(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,'SCHEME_VALIDITY',LV_SCH_VLD,:B_SCHEME.SCHEME_VALIDITY,LV_ERR_MSG,LN_ERR_CD); /*commented on 15/09/09*/
 SP_GET_LIST_DESC(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,'ISL_SCH_TYPE',LV_SCHEME_TYPE,:B_SCHEME.SCHEME_TYPE,LV_ERR_MSG,LN_ERR_CD); /*added on 15/09/09*/
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 IF :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_CODE IS NULL THEN
 DELETE_RECORD;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 ---FOR INDIVIDUAL SCHEMES
 GO_BLOCK('B_SCHEME');
 CLEAR_BLOCK; 
 FOR I IN 1..POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND.COUNT
 LOOP
 
 IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL = POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL1 THEN 
 -- :B_SCHEME.ENQ_VAR_SRL := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL1;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_CODE := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL2;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_DESC := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL3;
 :B_SCHEME.FROM_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL4;
 :B_SCHEME.TO_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL5;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_MODEL := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL6;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_AMT := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL7;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_SEL := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL8;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_TYPE := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL9;
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_ENQVARIANTCD:=POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL10; /* added on 15/09/09*/
 -----:B_SCHEME.SCHEME_VALIDITY := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL10; /*commented on 15/09/09*/
 :B_SCHEME.CREATED_BY := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL11;
 :B_SCHEME.CREATED_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL12;
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 IF :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_CODE IS NULL THEN
 DELETE_RECORD;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 
 ELSE /*added on 15/09/2009 ELSE FOR WORKPLACE ID IF */
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Corporate Code can not be empty','Error');
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER');/*Added by Dpswain*/
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 set_item_property('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID',navigable,property_true);
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 /*Above statements commented BY KANAV ON 16-Mar-2020 for DMSSAL-12642*/
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF; 
 
ELSE /* ADDED ON 15/09/2009 ELSE FOR PRIMARY MODEL IF */
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Not a primary model','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF; 
 
 
 
/* COMMENTED ON 15/09/2009 START*/

/* IF NVL(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.NB_TEMP_SCHEME_COM_YN,'N') = 'N' THEN
 
-------------------------------COMMENTED ON 31/07/2009------------------------------- 
 SP_GET_SCHEMES(:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,:GLOBAL.DEALER,:GLOBAL.COMP_FA,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL,NVL(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM,'AA'),
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD,NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE,SYSDATE),
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID,'C',POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_IND,POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM);
-------------------------------COMMENTED ON 31/07/2009------------------------------- 
 
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.NB_TEMP_SCHEME_COM_YN := 'Y';
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.TAB_COM_YN := 'N';
 GO_BLOCK('B_SCHEME1');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 
 FOR I IN 1..POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM.COUNT
 LOOP
 :B_SCHEME1.SL_NO := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_CODE := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM(I).COL1;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_DESC := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM(I).COL2;
 :B_SCHEME1.FROM_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM(I).COL3;
 :B_SCHEME1.TO_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM(I).COL4;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_SEL := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM(I).COL6;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_MODEL := :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_AMT := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM(I).COL5;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_TYPE := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM(I).COL7;
 LV_SCH_VLD := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM(I).COL8;
 :B_SCHEME1.CREATED_BY := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM(I).COL11;
 :B_SCHEME1.CREATED_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.PV_SCHEME_COM(I).COL12;
 SP_GET_LIST_DESC(:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL,'SCHEME_VALIDITY',LV_SCH_VLD,:B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_VALIDITY,LV_ERR_MSG,LN_ERR_CD);
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 IF :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_CODE IS NULL THEN
 DELETE_RECORD;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 
 --SET_FORM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM,VALIDATION,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ---FOR CORPORATE SCHEMES
 GO_BLOCK('B_SCHEME1');
 CLEAR_BLOCK; 
 
 FOR I IN 1..POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM.COUNT
 LOOP
 
 IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL = POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL1 THEN 
 
 -- :B_SCHEME.ENQ_VAR_SRL := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_IND(I).COL1;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_CODE := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL2;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_DESC := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL3;
 :B_SCHEME1.FROM_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL4;
 :B_SCHEME1.TO_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL5;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_MODEL := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL6;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_AMT := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL7;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_SEL := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL8;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_TYPE := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL9;
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_VALIDITY := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL10;
 :B_SCHEME1.CREATED_BY := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL11;
 :B_SCHEME1.CREATED_DATE := POPULATE_ERRORS.V_SCHEME_COM(I).COL12;
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 IF :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_CODE IS NULL THEN
 DELETE_RECORD;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 -- Application Logging*/
 
/* COMMENTED ON 15/09/2009 END*/ 

 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.stop_timer('PSS','RT_ENQ','Enquiry Tracking','Fetching the Schemes',:global.userid);
 end if;
/* ELSE
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME1',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME1',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);*/
 end if; 
 GO_ITEM('PB_SCHEMES_OK');
--END IF; 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
LV_STR VARCHAR2(500);
BEGIN
 
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.enq_var_srl := TO_NUMBER(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD);
 
if get_block_property('b_sd_enquiry',status) = 'QUERY' THEN

 IF ( :B_SD_ENQUIRY.enq_var_srl = 1 AND :PARAMETER.P_NEW = 'N' ) THEN
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM := 'Y';
 :PARAMETER.P_NEW := 'Y';
 END IF;
 IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD IS NULL THEN
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD := 'A';
 END IF;
 SET_LOV_PROPERTY('LV_VAR',GROUP_NAME,'RG_VAR');
 LV_STR := TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD) || TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD) || TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_ECOLORCD);
 GENERAL.CREATE_RECGRP_ROW('B_SD_ENQUIRY','ENQ_COLOR',LV_STR);
 
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS:='P';
 --:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
end if; 

if :b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd is not null AND :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS = 'O' and get_block_property('b_sd_enquiry',status) in ('QUERY','CHANGED') THEN
 set_item_instance_property('b_sd_enquiry.enq_variant_cd',current_record,insert_allowed,property_false);
 set_item_instance_property('b_sd_enquiry.enq_variant_cd',current_record,update_allowed,property_false);
 set_item_instance_property('b_sd_enquiry.pb_schemes',current_record,navigable,property_false);
 set_item_instance_property('b_sd_enquiry.pb_schemes',current_record,insert_allowed,property_false);
 set_item_instance_property('b_sd_enquiry.pb_schemes',current_record,update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('b_scheme',insert_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('b_scheme',update_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('b_scheme1',insert_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('b_scheme1',update_allowed,property_false);
elsif :b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd is not null AND (:B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS <> 'O' or :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS is null) and get_block_property('b_sd_enquiry',status) = ('CHANGED') THEN 
 set_item_instance_property('b_sd_enquiry.enq_variant_cd',current_record,insert_allowed,property_true);
 set_item_instance_property('b_sd_enquiry.enq_variant_cd',current_record,update_allowed,property_true);
elsif :b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd is null and get_block_property('b_sd_enquiry',status) = 'CHANGED' then
 set_item_instance_property('b_sd_enquiry.pb_schemes',current_record,navigable,property_true);
 set_item_instance_property('b_sd_enquiry.pb_schemes',current_record,insert_allowed,property_true);
 set_item_instance_property('b_sd_enquiry.pb_schemes',current_record,update_allowed,property_true);
 set_block_property('b_scheme',insert_allowed,property_true);
 set_block_property('b_scheme',update_allowed,property_true);
 set_block_property('b_scheme1',insert_allowed,property_true);
 set_block_property('b_scheme1',update_allowed,property_true);
end if;
END;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 Old_car_enq_status varchar2(1);
begin
 :PARAMETER.P_NEW := 'Y';
 :b_sd_enquiry.key_val := :b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd || :b_sd_enquiry.enq_suffixcd || :b_sd_enquiry.enq_ecolorcd;
 
 GENERAL.CREATE_RECGRP_ROW('B_SD_ENQUIRY', 'ENQ_COLOR', :B_SD_ENQUIRY.enq_suffixcd);

 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.enq_var_srl := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY', CURRENT_RECORD);
 
 :global.no_of_models := :global.no_of_models + 1;
 
 :global.g_query := 'Y';
 
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.NB_QUERIED := 'Y';
 
 IF (:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL = 1) THEN
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM := 'Y';
 END IF;
 
 begin
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.start_timer;
 end if;
 
 -----To display Descriptions 
 set_block_property('b_sd_enquiry', insert_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('b_sd_enquiry', update_allowed, property_true);
 SP_GET_PQ_RT_ENQ_VEHENQUIRED(:GLOBAL.DEALER, :GLOBAL.Principal, :GLOBAL.LOC_CD, :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD, :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD, :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_ECOLORCD, :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR);
 
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD := :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD || ' - ' || :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD;
 
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.stop_timer('PSS', 'RT_ENQ', 'Enquiry Tracking', 'Fetch the Enquired Vehicles Details', :global.userid);
 end if;
 
 Exception
 When Others then
 General.Disp_Text(sqlerrm,
 'Procedure SP_GET_PQ_RT_ENQ_VEHENQUIRED Failed');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 End;

Property_set_after_fetch;
 
 /*Added By Dp Swain*/
 
 /*IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN 
 IF NEW_CAR_ENQ_STATUS = 'C' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('NEW VEHICLE ENQUIRY HAS BEEN INVOICED.NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'Error');
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 ELSIF OLD_CAR_ENQ_STATUS = 'B' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('OLD VEHICLE ENQUIRY HAS BEEN BOUGHT. NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'Error');
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 ELSIF OLD_CAR_ENQ_STATUS = 'E' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('OLD VEHICLE ENQUIRY HAS BEEN EVALUATED. NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'Error');
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 END IF;*/

 DECLARE
 V_NUM NUMBER := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
 BEGIN
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD', V_NUM, INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD', V_NUM, UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END;

 set_block_property('B_ENQ_FOLLOW', insert_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('B_ENQ_FOLLOW', update_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW', insert_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW', update_allowed, property_true);
 
 begin
 select ENQ_ACTIONPLN,
 ENQ_FOLLOWACTNPLN,
 to_number(TO_CHAR(enq_followdate, 'HH24MI')) * 36,
 enq_followdate
 into :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN,
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE,
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_TIME,
 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE
 from RD_ENQFOLLOW
 where parent_group = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.parent_group
 and dealer_map_cd = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.dealer_map_cd
 and loc_cd = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.loc_cd
 and comp_fa = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.comp_fa
 and enq_num = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num
 and enq_Var_srl = 1
 AND enq_followslno =
 (select max(z.enq_followslno)
 from muldms.rd_enqfollow z
 where z.PARENT_GROUP = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.parent_group
 and z.DEALER_MAP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.dealer_map_cd
 and z.LOC_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.loc_cd
 and z.COMP_FA = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.comp_fa
 and z.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num
 and z.ENQ_VAR_SRL = 1);
 exception
 when others then
 null;
 end;

 begin
 select ENQ_ACTIONPLN,
 ENQ_FOLLOWACTNPLN,
 to_number(TO_CHAR(enq_followdate, 'HH24MI')) * 36,
 enq_followdate
 into :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN,
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE,
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_TIME,
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE
 from RD_old_ENQFOLLOW
 where parent_group = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.parent_group
 and dealer_map_cd = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.dealer_map_cd
 and loc_cd = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.loc_cd
 and comp_fa = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.comp_fa
 and enq_num = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num
 AND enq_followslno =
 (select max(z.enq_followslno)
 from muldms.RD_old_ENQFOLLOW z
 where z.PARENT_GROUP = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.parent_group
 and z.DEALER_MAP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.dealer_map_cd
 and z.LOC_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.loc_cd
 and z.COMP_FA = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.comp_fa
 and z.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num);
 exception
 when others then
 null;
 end;

 set_block_property('B_ENQ_FOLLOW', insert_allowed, property_false);
 set_block_property('B_ENQ_FOLLOW', update_allowed, property_false);
 set_block_property('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW', insert_allowed, property_false);
 set_block_property('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW', update_allowed, property_false);

end;

DECLARE
 V_CNT NUMBER(1);
 BEGIN
 SELECT COUNT(*) INTO V_CNT 
 from rd_enq
 where PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD =:GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :GLOBAL.COMP_FA
 AND ENQ_NUM = :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO
 and ENQ_STATUS IN ('O','C','L','D');
 
 IF V_CNT > 0 THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 else
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 end if;
 
 end;
 

/*Added by Saket on 22-May-19 for DMSSAL(S)-13314 (start)*/
 IF :GLOBAL.Principal = 2 THEN
 BEGIN
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD IS NOT NULL THEN
 SELECT SEGMENT
 INTO :CB_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SEGMENT_CD
 FROM GM_EMP
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND EMP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD;
 
 END IF;
 IF :CB_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SEGMENT_CD IS NULL THEN
 SELECT DECODE(LINE_CD,'A2','B',LINE_CD)
 INTO :CB_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SEGMENT_CD
 FROM GM_MOD
 WHERE MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL;
 END IF;
 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN Others THEN
 NULL;
 END; 
 END IF;
/*Added by Saket on 22-May-19 for DMSSAL(S)-13314 (end)*/

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE:=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.CREATED_DATE := sysdate;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.CREATED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;
IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 17-11-2018 by saket against scr 12450
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.DEALER_MAP_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD;--:GLOBAL.DEALER; 
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.COMP_FA := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP;--:GLOBAL.COMP_FA; 
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.LOC_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_LOC;--:GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.PARENT_GROUP := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT;--:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
ELSE
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.DEALER_MAP_CD := :GLOBAL.DEALER;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.LOC_CD := :GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.COMP_FA :=:GLOBAL.COMP_FA;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.PARENT_GROUP := :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
END IF;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ORG_EMP_CD := :b_sh_enquiry.enq_salesman_cd;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ASSG_EMP_CD := :b_sh_enquiry.enq_salesman_cd;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.MODIFIED_DATE := sysdate;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;
:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ASSG_EMP_CD := :b_sh_enquiry.enq_salesman_cd;

Trigger.Name: ON-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL IS NOT NULL AND :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD IS NOT NULL AND :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_ECOLORCD IS NOT NULL THEN
 INSERT_RECORD;
 IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 17-11-2018 by saket against scr 12450
 INSERT INTO RD_ENQFOLLOW(DEALER_MAP_CD,LOC_CD,EMP_CD,COMP_FA,ENQ_NUM,ENQ_FOLLOWSLNO,PARENT_GROUP,ENQ_FOLLOWDATE,ENQ_FOLLOWSTATUS,
 ENQ_ACTIONPLN,ENQ_FOLLOWACTNPLN,ENQ_VAR_SRL,REMARKS,CREATED_BY,CREATED_DATE)
 VALUES (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_LOC,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM,1,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT,(:B_ENQ_FOLLOW.Next_DATE + (:B_ENQ_FOLLOW.Next_TIME/(24*60*60))),
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS, :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN,:B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL,:B_ENQ_FOLLOW.REMARKS,:GLOBAL.USER_NAME
 , SYSDATE);
 ELSE
 INSERT INTO RD_ENQFOLLOW(DEALER_MAP_CD,LOC_CD,EMP_CD,COMP_FA,ENQ_NUM,ENQ_FOLLOWSLNO,PARENT_GROUP,ENQ_FOLLOWDATE,ENQ_FOLLOWSTATUS,
 ENQ_ACTIONPLN,ENQ_FOLLOWACTNPLN,ENQ_VAR_SRL,REMARKS,CREATED_BY,CREATED_DATE)
 VALUES (:GLOBAL.DEALER,:GLOBAL.LOC_CD,:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD,:GLOBAL.COMP_FA,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM,1,:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,(:B_ENQ_FOLLOW.Next_DATE + (:B_ENQ_FOLLOW.Next_TIME/(24*60*60))),
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS, :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN,:B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE,:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL,:B_ENQ_FOLLOW.REMARKS,:GLOBAL.USER_NAME
 , SYSDATE);
 END IF;
 END IF;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(SQLERRM,'ERR');
END;

Trigger.Name: PRE-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText: :global.no_of_models := 0;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
Trigger.TriggerText:
/*IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD IS NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Please Select a Model','ERROR');
 GO_ITEM('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF;

IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD IS NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Please Select a Variant','ERROR');
 GO_ITEM('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF; 

IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR IS NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Please Select a Color','ERROR');
 GO_ITEM('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF; 
*/
NULL;

Block.Name: B_ENQ_FOLLOW
Block.WhereClause:
parent_group = :global.parent_group 
and dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer 
AND loc_cd =:global.loc_cd 
and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa 
AND enq_num = :cb_enquiry.NB_SRL_NO
AND ROWID = (SELECT MIN(ROWID) FROM RD_ENQFOLLOW WHERE ENQ_FOLLOWACTNACTL IS NULL 
AND parent_group = :global.parent_group 
and dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer 
AND loc_cd =:global.loc_cd 
and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa 
and enq_num = :cb_enquiry.NB_SRL_NO)

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE < :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is null THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Follow up date should be greater than enquiry date', 'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
--general.check_null(:b_sd_enquiry.enq_modelcd,'Model Code');
null;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:

--shailendra 06.03.12
begin 
 select am.list_DESC into :enq_indacccateg_DESC from am_list am
 where 
 am.list_name='NATURE_OF_PROF_NEW' 
 and am.list_code=:ENQ_INDACCCATEGCD
 and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; ---Added :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL By Amit on 02-May-2014 For Multi Company Changes 
exception 
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 end;
/*
begin 
 select am.list_DESC into :ENQ_ACTPROFESSION from am_list am
 where 
 am.list_name='NATURE_OF_PROF' 
 and am.list_code=:ENQ_ACTPROFESSION_CD; 
exception 
 When No_Data_Found Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Invalid Actual Profession','Error');
 When Too_Many_Rows Then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Too Many Rows','Error');
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Invalid Actual Profession ' || sqlerrm,'Error');
end;
*/
begin 
 select gm.act_profession_desc into :ENQ_ACTPROFESSION from gm_act_prof gm
 where gm.profession_cd=:ENQ_INDACCCATEGCD
 and gm.act_profession_cd=:ENQ_ACTPROFESSION_CD
 and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; ---Added :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL By Amit on 02-May-2014 For Multi Company Changes
exception 
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 end;

begin 
 select am.list_DESC into :DESIGNATION_DESC from am_list am
 where 
 am.list_name='DESIGNATION' 
 and am.list_code=:DESIGNATION
 and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; ---Added :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL By Amit on 02-May-2014 For Multi Company Changes 
exception 
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 end;


:ENQ_INDACCCATEGCD1:=:ENQ_INDACCCATEGCD;


 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='02' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_date >'08-SEP-2021' then 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_MFG', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_VAR_DESC', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.USAGE', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 END IF;

Trigger.Name: ON-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SD_ENQFIN.ENQ_FINCD IS NULL THEN
 IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 17-11-2018 by saket against scr 12450
 DELETE FROM RD_ENQFIN 
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD--:GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND LOC_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_LOC--:GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP--:GLOBAL.COMP_FA
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT--:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND ENQ_NUM = :B_SD_ENQFIN.ENQ_NUM;
 ELSE
 DELETE FROM RD_ENQFIN 
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :GLOBAL.COMP_FA
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND ENQ_NUM = :B_SD_ENQFIN.ENQ_NUM;
 END IF;
ELSE
 UPDATE_RECORD;
END IF;

Trigger.TriggerText:
/* added on 15/09/2009 to allow user to select only one scheme */
declare
 l_n_Rec number;
begin 
-- :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_SEL := Null;
 --Checking The Check Box Values
 l_n_Rec := :System.Cursor_Record;
 Go_Block('B_SCHEME');
 --Next_Record; 
 First_record;
 Loop
 Set_Item_Instance_Property('B_SCHEME.SCHEME_SEL',Current_Record,Update_Allowed,Property_True);
 if :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_SEL = 'Y' and l_n_Rec <> :System.Cursor_Record then
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_SEL := 'N';
 end if; 
 Exit When :System.Last_Record = 'TRUE';
 Next_Record;
 End Loop;
end;

:B_SCHEME.CREATED_DATE := sysdate;

IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 17-11-2018 by saket against scr 12450
:B_SCHEME.DEALER_MAP_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD;--:GLOBAL.DEALER; 
:B_SCHEME.COMP_FA := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP;--:GLOBAL.COMP_FA;

:B_SCHEME.PARENT_GROUP := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT;--:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
ELSE

--:B_SCHEME.CCY_CD := :GLOBAL.CURRENCY;

Trigger.TriggerText:

END IF;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SCHEME.SL_NO := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;

 
-- TO FETCH MODEL DESCRIPTION. 
BEGIN 
 SELECT MODEL_DESC 
 INTO :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_MODEL 
 FROM GM_MOD
 WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD
 AND VALID_YN='Y';
 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Model Description Not Found. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('More than one Model Description found for Model Code. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN VALUE_ERROR THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Width problem /Incompatible data. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Execution Failed while fetching Model Description. '||SQLERRM,'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
END;
-- TO FETCH SCHEME DETAILS.
BEGIN 
 SELECT SCHEME_NAME,SCHEME_START,SCHEME_END,AMOUNT 
 INTO :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_DESC,:B_SCHEME.FROM_DATE,:B_SCHEME.TO_DATE,
 :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_AMT
 FROM SM_SCHEME_DEFINITION
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND SCHEME_NUM = :B_SCHEME.SCHEME_CODE
 AND LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Scheme Details Not Found. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('More than one Scheme Details found for Scheme Number. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN VALUE_ERROR THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Width problem /Incompatible data. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Execution Failed while fetching Scheme Details. '||SQLERRM,'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
END;

Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SCHEME.SL_NO := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
--:B_SD_ENQEXD.ENQ_NUM := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
:B_SD_ENQEXD.CREATED_DATE := sysdate;
:B_SD_ENQEXD.CREATED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;
IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 17-11-2018 by saket against scr 12450
:B_SD_ENQEXD.DEALER_MAP_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD;--:GLOBAL.DEALER; 
:B_SD_ENQEXD.COMP_FA := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP;--:GLOBAL.COMP_FA; 
:B_SD_ENQEXD.LOC_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_LOC;--:GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
:B_SD_ENQEXD.PARENT_GROUP := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT;--:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
ELSE
:B_SD_ENQEXD.DEALER_MAP_CD := :GLOBAL.DEALER;
:B_SD_ENQEXD.LOC_CD := :GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
:B_SD_ENQEXD.COMP_FA := :GLOBAL.COMP_FA;
:B_SD_ENQEXD.PARENT_GROUP := :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SD_ENQEXD.MODIFIED_DATE := sysdate;
:B_SD_ENQEXD.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;

if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='01' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN ='Y' then 
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_make := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_make;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_mod := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_mod;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_var := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_var;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_mfg := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_mfg;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_kms := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_kms;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_col := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_col;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_exp_price := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_exp_price;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_undr_tv := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_undr_tv;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_auto_card := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_auto_card;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_ofer_value := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_ofer_value;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_exh_bons := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_exh_bons;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_tot_ofer := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_tot_ofer;
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_buy_type := :B_SD_ENQEXD.ex_buy_type;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD',STATUS)='NEW' THEN
 EXECUTE_QUERY(NO_VALIDATE);
END IF;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
begin
 
 begin
 select list_desc into :B_SD_ENQEXD.OLD_CAR_STATUS from am_list
 where principal_map_cd=:global.principal
 and list_code=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.OLD_VEH_ENQ_STATUS
 and list_name='ENQ_OLD_FOLLOWSTATUS';
 exception
 when others then
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.OLD_VEH_ENQ_STATUS:=NULL;
 end;
 
 begin
 select MAKE_DESCRIPTION
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANF_DESC
 from SM_DMSPOC_MAKE
 where PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and MAKE_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE;
 exception
 when others then

 :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANF_DESC := null;
 end;
----added by divya on 11-Jan-2018 for poc Sales DMSSAL-12353 START
IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=2 THEN
 begin
 select model_desc
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC
 from SM_DMSPOC_MAKE_MODEL_MAS x
 where x.make_cd=:B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE
 and x.principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and x.model_cd = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL
 -- and :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE <> 'SUZ'
 ;
 exception
 when others then
 begin
 select y.model_desc
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC
 from gm_mod y
 where y.principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and y.model_cd = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL;
 exception
 when others then
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC := null;
 end;
 end;
 begin
 select x.variant_desc
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_VAR_DESC
 from gm_var x
 where x.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND x.MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL
 and x.variant_cd = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_SUB_MODEL;
 exception
 when others then
 begin
 select SUBMODELNAME
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_VAR_DESC
 from SM_DMSPOC_SUBMODEL_MAST y
 WHERE MAKE_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE
 AND MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and y.submodelno = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_SUB_MODEL;
 exception
 when others then
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_VAR_DESC := null;
 end;
 end;
ELSE
 begin
 select model_desc
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC
 from SM_DMSPOC_MAKE_MODEL_MAS x
 where x.make_cd = 'N'
 and x.principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and x.model_cd = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL
 and :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE = 'N';
 exception
 when others then
 begin
 select y.model_desc
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC
 from gm_mod y
 where y.principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and y.model_cd = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL;
 exception
 when others then
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC := null;
 end;
 end;
 begin
 select x.variant_desc
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_VAR_DESC
 from gm_var x
 where x.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND x.MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL
 and x.variant_cd = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_SUB_MODEL;
 exception
 when others then
 begin
 select SUBMODELNAME
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_VAR_DESC
 from SM_DMSPOC_SUBMODEL_MAST y
 WHERE MAKE_CD = 'N'
 AND MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and y.submodelno = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_SUB_MODEL;
 exception
 when others then
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_VAR_DESC := null;
 end;
 end;
END IF; 
----added by divya on 11-Jan-2018 for poc Sales DMSSAL-12353 STOP
 

 begin
 select x.ecolor_desc
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_COL_DESC
 from GM_ECLR x
 where x.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and x.ecolor_cd = :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_COL;
 exception
 when others then
 begin
 select decode(:B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_COL,
 'M',
 'Metalic',
 'NM',
 'Non-Metalic',
 NULL)
 into :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_COL_DESC
 from dual;
 exception
 when others then
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_COL_DESC := null;
 end;
 end;

 /*if :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS in ('L', 'D', 'C') then
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQEXD', insert_allowed, property_false);
 set_block_property('B_SD_ENQEXD', update_allowed, property_false);
 end if;*/
 
 if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='04' and :global.principal = 1 then
 
 Property_set_after_fetch;
 
 end if;
 
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SD_ENQEXD_TWO_WLR.POC_MANUFACTURE IS NULL THEN
GENERAL.DISP_TEXT ('Please enter Maker Name', 'Error');
GO_ITEM ('B_SD_ENQEXD_TWO_WLR.POC_MANUFACTURE');
RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
ELSIF :B_SD_ENQEXD_TWO_WLR.POC_MODEL IS NULL THEN
GENERAL.DISP_TEXT ('Please enter Model Name', 'Error');
GO_ITEM ('B_SD_ENQEXD_TWO_WLR.POC_MODEL');
RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
ELSIF :B_SD_ENQEXD_TWO_WLR.POC_REGN_NUM IS NULL THEN
GENERAL.DISP_TEXT ('Please enter registration number', 'Error');
GO_ITEM ('B_SD_ENQEXD_TWO_WLR.POC_REGN_NUM');
RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
else 
GO_ITEM('PB_EXCH_DTL');
HIDE_VIEW('CN_STK_EXCH_TWO_WLR');
GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT','E');
GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL','E');
GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE','E');
END IF;
--added by divya on 11-Jan-2018 for poc Sales DMSSAL-12353 START
:B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE:=:B_SD_ENQEXD_TWO_WLR.POC_MANUFACTURE;

Block.Name: B_SCHEME1
Block.WhereClause:
dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer AND loc_cd=:global.loc_cd AND enq_num = :cb_enquiry.nb_srl_no
AND ENQ_VAR_SRL = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.enq_var_srl
AND SCHEME_CD IN (SELECT SCHEME_NUM FROM SM_SCHEME_COMP
 WHERE dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer AND loc_cd=:global.loc_cd)

Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SCHEME1.CREATED_DATE := SYSDATE;
:B_SCHEME1.CREATED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;
--:B_SCHEME.CCY_CD := :GLOBAL.CURRENCY;
IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 17-11-2018 by saket against scr 12450
:B_SCHEME1.DEALER_MAP_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD;--:GLOBAL.DEALER; 
:B_SCHEME1.COMP_FA := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP;--:GLOBAL.COMP_FA; 
:B_SCHEME1.LOC_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_LOC;--:GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
:B_SCHEME1.PARENT_GROUP := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT;--:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
ELSE
:B_SCHEME1.PARENT_GROUP :=:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
:B_SCHEME1.DEALER_MAP_CD := :GLOBAL.DEALER;
:B_SCHEME1.LOC_CD := :GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
:B_SCHEME1.COMP_FA := :GLOBAL.COMP_FA;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: ON-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_SEL <> 'N' THEN
 INSERT_RECORD;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SCHEME1.SL_NO := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;

-- TO FETCH MODEL DESCRIPTION.

BEGIN
 
 SELECT MODEL_DESC 
 INTO :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_MODEL 
 FROM GM_MOD
 WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD
 AND VALID_YN='Y';
 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Model Description Not Found. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('More than one Model Description found for Model Code. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN VALUE_ERROR THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Width problem /Incompatible data. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Execution Failed while fetching Model Description. '||SQLERRM,'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
END;


-- TO FETCH SCHEME DETAILS.

BEGIN 
 SELECT SCHEME_NAME,SCHEME_START,SCHEME_END,AMOUNT 
 INTO :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_DESC,:B_SCHEME1.FROM_DATE,:B_SCHEME1.TO_DATE,
 :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_AMT
 FROM SM_SCHEME_DEFINITION
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER 
 AND SCHEME_NUM = :B_SCHEME1.SCHEME_CODE
 AND LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Scheme Details Not Found. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('More than one Scheme Details found for Scheme Number. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN VALUE_ERROR THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Width problem /Incompatible data. ','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Execution Failed while fetching Scheme Details. '||SQLERRM,'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; 
END;

 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(v_errmsg,'Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 end if;
---- ELSE
---- NULL;
 END IF;
 
end; 

*/

IF :PARAMETER.P_PRIMARY_MODEL IS NOT NULL THEN--Added by sanjay on 22-sep-14. SCR: DMSSAL-12131
 SELECT model_cd,
 model_desc
 INTO :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_MODEL_CODE,
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_MODEL_DESC
 FROM gm_mod
 WHERE model_cd = :PARAMETER.P_PRIMARY_MODEL;

END IF;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 SELECT EMP_NAME INTO :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_DSE_NAME
 FROM gm_emp
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND EMP_CD= :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_DSE_CODE
 AND LOC_CD=:GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_DSE_NAME:=NULL;
END; 

BEGIN-----sanjay 
 SELECT model_desc INTO :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_MODEL_DESC
 FROM gm_mod
 WHERE MODEL_CD = :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_MODEL_CODE
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_MODEL_DESC:=NULL;
END; --------sanjay 


set_block_property('B_TEST_DRIVE',INSERT_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
set_block_property('B_TEST_DRIVE',UPDATE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
set_block_property('B_TEST_DRIVE',DELETE_ALLOWED,PROPERTY_FALSE);

 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL;
EXCEPTION

 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_MODEL_CODE_DESC:=NULL;
END;

BEGIN
 SELECT variant_desc INTO :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_VARIANT_DESC

END;

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 TEST_DRIVE_START_TIME NUMBER(5,2);
 TEST_DRIVE_END_TIME NUMBER (5,2);
BEGIN 
 SELECT NVL(PRE_TD_FROM_TIME,2), NVL(PRE_TD_FROM_TIME||'.'||PRE_TD_SLOT,2.30)
 INTO TEST_DRIVE_START_TIME,TEST_DRIVE_END_TIME
 FROM am_dealer_loc_param
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND PARENT_GROUP= :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND LOC_CD=:GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
 
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.BK_TDFROM_TIME:=TEST_DRIVE_START_TIME;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.BK_TDTO_TIME:=TEST_DRIVE_END_TIME;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TD_TDFROM_TIME:=TEST_DRIVE_START_TIME;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TD_TDTO_TIME:=TEST_DRIVE_END_TIME;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.ACT_FROM_TIME:=TEST_DRIVE_START_TIME;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.ACT_TO_TIME:=TEST_DRIVE_END_TIME;
 
 /*Started by Kanav on 07-Feb-2019 for DMSSAL-12480*/
 IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 1 THEN
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TD_MODE:='DMS';
 END IF; 
 /*Ended by Kanav on 07-Feb-2019 for DMSSAL-12480*/
 

EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.BK_TDFROM_TIME:=9;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.BK_TDTO_TIME:=9.45;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TD_TDFROM_TIME:=9;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TD_TDTO_TIME:=9.45;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.ACT_FROM_TIME:=9;
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.ACT_TO_TIME:=9.45;
 
 /*Started by Kanav on 07-Feb-2019 for DMSSAL-12480*/
 IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 1 THEN
 :B_TEST_DRIVE.TD_MODE:='DMS';
 END IF; 
 /*Ended by Kanav on 07-Feb-2019 for DMSSAL-12480*/
END;
:B_TEST_DRIVE.CREATED_DATE := SYSDATE;
:B_TEST_DRIVE.CREATED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;
IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 17-11-2018 by saket against scr 12450
:B_TEST_DRIVE.DEALER_MAP_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD;--:GLOBAL.DEALER; 
:B_TEST_DRIVE.COMP_FA := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP;--:GLOBAL.COMP_FA; 
:B_TEST_DRIVE.LOC_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_LOC;--:GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
:B_TEST_DRIVE.PARENT_GROUP := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT;--:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
ELSE
:B_TEST_DRIVE.DEALER_MAP_CD := :GLOBAL.DEALER; 
:B_TEST_DRIVE.COMP_FA := :GLOBAL.COMP_FA; 
:B_TEST_DRIVE.LOC_CD := :GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
:B_TEST_DRIVE.PARENT_GROUP := :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
END IF;
/*:B_TEST_DRIVE.BK_TD_DATE:=:B_TEST_DRIVE.TDB_DT;
:B_TEST_DRIVE.BOOKED_BY:=:B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_DSE_CODE;
:B_TEST_DRIVE.CONFIRM_BY:=:B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_DSE_CODE;*/
:B_TEST_DRIVE.ENQ_DSE:=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD; 
:B_TEST_DRIVE.BK_TD_DATE:=:B_TEST_DRIVE.TDB_DT_NEW;-- Added by Shailendra on 09.02.15 (DMSSAL-121)

:B_TEST_DRIVE.STATUS:='T';
/*
GO_BLOCK('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
FIRST_RECORD;
:B_TEST_DRIVE.MODEL_CD := :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD;
:B_TEST_DRIVE.VARIANT_CD := :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD;
 */

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 LV_ENQ_MOB VARCHAR2(30);
 LV_ENQ_MOB1 VARCHAR2(30);
BEGIN

 BEGIN
 select /*+index (rh IDX_RH_ENQ_M_PHONE) */
 rh.MOBILE
 INTO LV_ENQ_MOB
 from rh_enq rh, rd_enq rd
 where rh.MOBILE = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 and rd.parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and rd.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and rd.loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and rd.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_VAR_SRL = 1
 and rh.etype_cd not in ('CRM', 'MUL', 'MDS', 'WEB', 'EXM', 'TCL')
 and rd.PARENT_GROUP = rh.PARENT_GROUP
 and rd.DEALER_MAP_CD = rh.dealer_map_cd
 and rd.LOC_CD = rh.loc_cd
 and rd.COMP_FA = rh.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_NUM = rh.enq_num
 and nvl(rd.enq_status, 'P') in ('P', 'W', 'H', 'O', 'E');
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 BEGIN
 select /*+index (rh IDX_RH_ENQ_M_PHONE) */
 rh.MOBILE
 INTO LV_ENQ_MOB1
 from rh_enq rh, rd_enq rd
 where rh.MOBILE = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 and rd.parent_group = :global.parent_group
 and rd.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 and rd.loc_cd = :global.loc_cd
 and rd.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_VAR_SRL = 1
 and rh.etype_cd in ('CRM', 'MUL', 'MDS', 'WEB', 'EXM', 'TCL')
 and rd.PARENT_GROUP = rh.PARENT_GROUP
 and rd.DEALER_MAP_CD = rh.dealer_map_cd
 and rd.LOC_CD = rh.loc_cd
 and rd.COMP_FA = rh.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_NUM = rh.enq_num
 and nvl(rd.enq_status, 'P') in ('P', 'W', 'H', 'O', 'E');
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;

 IF LV_ENQ_MOB IS NOT NULL THEN
 HIDE_VIEW('CN_DUPLICATE_ENQ');
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.PRE_OFF_PHONE');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_INSERT','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_DEL','E');
 ELSE
 do_key('clear_form');
 When_new_form;
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_INSERT','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_DEL','E');
 end if;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
begin
CLEAR_BLOCK; 
 -- GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(:global.parent_group ||:global.dealer||:global.loc_cd ||:global.comp_fa||:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1||:CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO,'Error');

/* hint of mob no index added by avinash on 05-JUNE-2009 b'coz to avoid high buffer gets */ 
for i in (select /*+index (rh IDX_RH_ENQ_M_PHONE) */
 rh.enq_num,rh.enq_date,rh.enq_name,
 decode(nvl(rd.enq_status,'P'),'P','Cold','W','Warm','H','Hot','O','Ordered','E','Postpone') enq_status
 from rh_enq rh, rd_enq rd
 where rh.MOBILE = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 and rd.parent_group = :global.parent_group 
 and rd.dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer
 AND rd.loc_cd =:global.loc_cd 
 and rd.comp_fa = :global.comp_fa 
 and rd.ENQ_VAR_SRL=1
 and rd.PARENT_GROUP=rh.PARENT_GROUP
 and rd.DEALER_MAP_CD=rh.dealer_map_cd
 and rd.LOC_CD=rh.loc_cd
 and rd.COMP_FA=rh.comp_fa
 and rd.ENQ_NUM=rh.enq_num
 and nvl(rd.enq_status,'P') in ('P','W','H','O','E'))
loop
IF :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NULL THEN
 :B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.enq_num:=i.enq_num;
 :B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.enq_date:=i.enq_date;
 :B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.enq_name:=i.enq_name;
 :B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.enq_status:=i.enq_status;
NEXT_RECORD;
ELSIF :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO!=i.enq_num THEN
 :B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.enq_num:=i.enq_num;
 :B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.enq_date:=i.enq_date;
 :B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.enq_name:=i.enq_name;
 :B_DUPLICATE_ENQ.enq_status:=i.enq_status;
NEXT_RECORD;
END IF;
end loop;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-CHECKBOX-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF (:B_VEH_REG_NUM.VEH_REG_NUM_CHECK = 'Y') THEN
 :PARAMETER.P_MOB_PM := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD; 
 Go_Block ('B_VEH_REG_NUM');
 First_Record;
 LOOP
 :B_VEH_REG_NUM.VEH_REG_NUM_CHECK := 'N';
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 Next_Record;
 END LOOP;
 Go_Record(:PARAMETER.P_MOB_PM);
 :B_VEH_REG_NUM.VEH_REG_NUM_CHECK := 'Y';
 ELSE
 :B_VEH_REG_NUM.VEH_REG_NUM_CHECK := 'N';
 END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
:DUMMY_CHK:=0;
GO_BLOCK('B_VEH_REG_NUM');
FIRST_RECORD;
LOOP
 
IF :B_VEH_REG_NUM.VEH_REG_NUM_CHECK='Y' THEN
 :DUMMY_CHK:=:DUMMY_CHK+1;
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.CUST_NAME:=:B_VEH_REG_NUM.CUST_NAME;
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.CUST_CD:=:B_VEH_REG_NUM.CUST_CD;
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.MOBILE_NUM:=:B_VEH_REG_NUM.MOBILE_NUM;
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_CUST_NAME:=:B_VEH_REG_NUM.CUST_NAME;
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD:=:B_VEH_REG_NUM.CUST_CD; 
END IF;
 
EXIT WHEN :B_VEH_REG_NUM.VEH_REG_NUM_CHECK='Y';
 exit when :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record;
END LOOP;

IF :DUMMY_CHK=0 THEN
general.disp_text('Please Select at least One Customer', 'Error');
END IF; 
IF :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NULL THEN
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_INSERT','E');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_DEL','E');
 
 IF :B_VEH_REG_NUM.MOBILE_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SELECT LIST_DESC, LIST_CODE
 INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC, :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY
 FROM AM_LIST
 WHERE LIST_NAME = 'REFFERAL_TYPE'
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
 AND LIST_CODE = 'ECD';
 ELSIF :B_VEH_REG_NUM.MOBILE_NUM IS NULL THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SELECT LIST_DESC, LIST_CODE
 INTO :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC, :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY
 FROM AM_LIST
 WHERE LIST_NAME = 'REFFERAL_TYPE'
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL ---Added By Amit For Multi Company Changes
 AND LIST_CODE = 'EMC';
 END IF;
 
 
END IF;
 HIDE_VIEW('CN_REG_NUM');
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER');

END;

EXIT WHEN :B_MOB_NUM.MOB_NUM_CHECK='Y';

END IF;
 HIDE_VIEW('CN_MOB_NUM');
 GO_ITEM('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER');

END;

Block.Name: B_SD_MGA_BOOKING
Block.WhereClause: parent_group = :global.parent_group and dealer_map_cd = :global.dealer and loc_cd = :global.loc_cd and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa and enq_num = :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 lv_catg_cd pm_part.catg_cd%type;
 lv_tag_cd pm_part.tag_cd%type;
 lv_part_cnt number;
BEGIN
 IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT tag_cd,part_desc, mrp_1
 INTO lv_tag_cd,:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_DESC,:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.MRP
 FROM pm_part
 WHERE dealer_map_cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL 
 AND part_num = :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM
 AND catg_cd = 'AA' 
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; 
 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN no_data_found THEN
 general.disp_text('Enter a valid MGA','Error');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 WHEN too_many_rows THEN
 general.disp_text('More than one part detail found for - '||:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM,'Error');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 WHEN value_error THEN
 general.disp_text('Width problem/Incompatible Data while fetching part detail(MRP,description)', 'Error');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 general.disp_text('Execution failed while fetching part detail - '|| SQLERRM, 'Error');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END;
 
 IF lv_tag_cd = 5 THEN
 general.disp_text('Part already closed','Error');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;
 
 IF dup_rec_check ('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING',:SYSTEM.cursor_item,:SYSTEM.cursor_value,:SYSTEM.cursor_record,'Part Number')THEN
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;

:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER := 0;
:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_AMT := 0;
:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.NET_AMT := 0;
:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID := 0;

IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY',insert_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY',update_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER',insert_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER',update_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID',insert_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID',update_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY',current_record,insert_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY',current_record,update_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER',current_record,insert_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER',current_record,update_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID',current_record,insert_allowed,property_true);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID',current_record,update_allowed,property_true);
ELSIF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM IS NULL THEN
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY',current_record,insert_allowed,property_false);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY',current_record,update_allowed,property_false);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER',current_record,insert_allowed,property_false);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER',current_record,update_allowed,property_false);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID',current_record,insert_allowed,property_false);
 SET_ITEM_INSTANCE_PROPERTY('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID',current_record,update_allowed,property_false);
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM IS NOT NULL AND :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY IS NULL THEN
 general.check_null(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY,'Booking Quantity');
END IF;

IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY <= 0 THEN
 general.disp_text('Enter a valid Quantity','Error');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END IF;

:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_AMT := ((nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.MRP,0) * nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER,0)) / 100) * nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY,0);
:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.NET_AMT := round( (( nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.MRP,0) * nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY,0) ) - nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_AMT,0)) ,2);
:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID := round( (( nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.MRP,0) * nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY,0) ) - nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_AMT,0)) ,2);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM IS NOT NULL AND :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER IS NULL THEN
 general.check_null(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER,'Discount Percentage');
END IF;

IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER > 100 OR :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER < 0 THEN
 general.disp_text('Enter a Valid Discount Percentage','Error');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END IF;

IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_AMT := ((nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.MRP,0) * nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER,0)) / 100) * nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY,0);
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.NET_AMT := round( (( nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.MRP,0) * nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY,0) ) - nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_AMT,0)) ,2);
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID := round( (( nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.MRP,0) * nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY,0) ) - nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_AMT,0)) ,2);
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM IS NOT NULL AND :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID IS NULL THEN
 general.check_null(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID,'Amount Paid');
END IF;

IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.AMT_PAID < 0 THEN
 general.disp_text('Enter a Valid Paid Amount','Error');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_DEL',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
first_record;
 LOOP
 IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM IS NULL THEN
 DELETE_RECORD;
 END IF;
 
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
first_record;

set_form_property(:system.current_form,validation,property_false);
go_block('B_SH_ENQUIRY');
set_form_property(:system.current_form,validation,property_true);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-BLOCK-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_QUERY(NO_VALIDATE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_DEL',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_block_property('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING',insert_allowed,property_false);
 set_block_property('B_SD_MGA_BOOKING',update_allowed,property_false);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('PB_BLK.PB_DEL',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-CREATE-RECORD
Trigger.TriggerText: :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.SRL_NUM := :system.trigger_record;

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 17-11-2018 by saket against scr 12450
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DEALER_MAP_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD;--:GLOBAL.DEALER; 
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.COMP_FA := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP;--:GLOBAL.COMP_FA; 
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.LOC_CD := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_LOC;--:GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PARENT_GROUP := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT;--:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
 ELSE
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DEALER_MAP_CD := :GLOBAL.DEALER;
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.COMP_FA := :GLOBAL.COMP_FA;
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.LOC_CD := :GLOBAL.LOC_CD;
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PARENT_GROUP := :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP;
 END IF;
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.CREATED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.CREATED_DATE := SYSDATE;
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.ENQ_NUM := :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 END;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: PRE-UPDATE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.MODIFIED_DATE := SYSDATE;
 :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.MODIFIED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;
END;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.SRL_NUM := :system.trigger_record;
BEGIN
 SELECT part_desc
 INTO :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_DESC
 FROM pm_part
 WHERE dealer_map_Cd = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND part_num = :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM
 AND catg_cd = 'AA' 
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; 
EXCEPTION
 when others then
 general.disp_text('Error while fetching Part Description','Error');
END;

:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_AMT := ((nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.MRP,0) * nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.DISCOUNT_PER,0)) / 100) * nvl(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.BOOK_QTY,0);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM IS NULL THEN
 general.check_null(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM,'Part Number');
 go_item(:B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM);
END IF;

ProgramUnit.Name: L_POPULATE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE L_POPULATE(P_LIST_NAME VARCHAR2,P_LIST_FIELD VARCHAR2) IS



/* group_id RecordGroup;
 list_id Item := Find_Item(P_LIST_FIELD); 
 status NUMBER; 
 lv_principal varchar2(5);
 BEGIN 
 lv_principal := '1';
 group_id := find_group('list'); 
 if not id_null(group_id) then
 delete_group(group_id);
 end if;
 group_id := Create_Group_From_Query('list','SELECT 
 Am_list.list_desc,Am_list.list_code FROM Am_List
 WHERE list_name = '||''''||P_LIST_NAME||''' and 
 principal_map_cd = '''||lv_principal||'''');
 status := Populate_Group(group_id); 
 Populate_List(list_id,group_id); 
 END; */
 
 
 
 v_count number := 1;
 V_NUM NUMBER;
begin

 DELETE_LIST_ELEMENT(P_LIST_FIELD,1);
 
 --V_NUM := POP_LIST.AM_TAB.COUNT;

 FOR I IN 1..POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_LIST.COUNT
 LOOP
 IF POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_LIST(I).COL1 = P_LIST_NAME THEN
 ADD_LIST_ELEMENT(P_LIST_FIELD,V_COUNT,POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_LIST(I).COL3,POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_LIST(I).COL2);
 V_COUNT := V_COUNT + 1;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: UPDATE_ZONE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/*PROCEDURE update_zone IS

LN_TAR NUMBER := 0;
LN_ACH NUMBER := 0;
LN_TEMP NUMBER := 0;
LV_ROWID VARCHAR2(40);
LOCK_FOUND EXCEPTION ;

PRAGMA EXCEPTION_INIT(LOCK_FOUND,-54);

BEGIN

 SELECT NVL(TARGET,0),NVL(ACHIEVED,0),ROWID
 INTO LN_TAR,LN_ACH,LV_ROWID
 FROM ST_ZONESTSET
 WHERE ZONE_CD = :ENQ_ZONE_CD
 AND MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODELCD 
 AND TO_CHAR(TARGET_MONTH,'MM-YYYY') = TO_CHAR(:ENQ_DATE,'MM-YYYY')
 FOR UPDATE OF ZONE_CD,MODEL_CD NOWAIT; 
 
 LN_ACH := LN_ACH + 1;
 
IF LN_TAR <> 0 THEN
 LN_TEMP := (LN_ACH/LN_TAR)*100;
ELSE
 LN_TEMP := 0;
END IF;
UPDATE ST_ZONESTSET
 SET ACHIEVED = LN_ACH,
 CONV_PA = LN_TEMP
 WHERE ROWID = LV_ROWID; 
 

EXCEPTION
 WHEN LOCK_FOUND THEN
 GENERAL.RAISE_ERROR('E0033');
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 INSERT INTO ST_ZONESTSET (
 ZONE_CD, 
 TARGET_MONTH, 
 MODEL_CD, 
 TARGET, 
 ACHIEVED, 
 CONV_PA, 
 CREATED_BY, 
 CREATED_DATE )
 VALUES ( 
 :ENQ_ZONE_CD,
 TRUNC(:ENQ_DATE,'MM'),
 :ENQ_MODELCD,
 0,
 1,
 0,
 :GLOBAL.USER_NAME,
 SYSDATE );
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(SQLERRM,'ERROR');
 Raise Form_trigger_failure;

END;*/

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATE_CN_MAIN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Validate_Cn_Main Is
 Mobile_str varchar2(20);
 LV_TEH_CHK NUMBER :=0;
 cnt varchar2(10);
Begin
 
 If :B_Sh_Enquiry.Enq_Finance ='Y' Then
 Set_Item_Property('Pb_Finance',Enabled,Property_True);
 Else
 Set_Item_Property('Pb_Finance',Enabled,Property_False);
 End If; 
 
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER IS NULL /*AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC'*/ THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 07.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Buyer Type cannot be Empty'; 
 END IF; --
 
 -- Added by Shailendra on 16.07.15
 IF :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE = 'EXC' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.INT_AUTOCARD IS NULL and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER <> '04' THEN 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Customer Interested in Loyalty card cannot be Empty'; 
 END IF; --
 
 -- Added by Shailendra 06.03.12
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC ='I' AND :B_SD_ENQUIRYIND.ENQ_INDACCCATEGCD IS NULL AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 07.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171) 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Nature of Profession cannot be Empty'; 
 END IF;
 --- end

 /*if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='01' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN is null then 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT( 'Buyer Type is Replacement,Trade-In Field is cannot be Empty','Error'); 
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 end if;
 
 if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER in ('02') then 
 if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MAKER is null then 
 -- POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'If Buyer Type is Addition/Replacement Make cannot be Empty';
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'If Buyer Type is Addition Make cannot be Empty';
 end if;
 
 if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MODEL is null then 
 -- POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'If Buyer Type is Addition/Replacement Model cannot be Empty';
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'If Buyer Type is Addition Model cannot be Empty';
 end if;
 end if; */---Commented by anand raj DMSSAL - 12200 
 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<<<<Shakti 
 
 if :global.principal = 2 then 
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_IC <> 'I' then 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Corporate Field cannot be Empty'; 
 end if;
 
 else
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID IS NULL AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER!='04' THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 07.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Corporate Field cannot be Empty'; 
 END IF; 
 
 end if;
 
 --CHECK FOR OTHERS IN CORPORATE
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID = 'OT' AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE IS NULL THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 07.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 POPULATE_ERRORS.V_TAB(POPULATE_ERRORS.V_TAB.COUNT + 1) := 'Enter a valid Corporate Name';
 END IF; 
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TITLE_CD IS NULL AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 12.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Please select Title'; 
 END IF; 
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NAME IS NULL THEN
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Please enter Enquiry Name'; 
 END IF;

 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE IS NULL AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' OR :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SOURCE IS NULL AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 12.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Please enter Enquiry Source'; 
 END IF;
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE IS NULL THEN
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Please enter a Valid Enquiry DATE'; 
 END IF;
 

 
 ---------Mobile Phone No. Check
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1 IS NULL THEN
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Mobile Number cannot be Null'; 
END IF;


IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1 IS NOT NULL THEN
 Mobile_str:=REPLACE(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1,' ','');
 FOR j IN 1 .. LENGTH(Mobile_str) LOOP
 IF (ascii(substr(Mobile_str ,j,1)) NOT BETWEEN 48 AND 57) THEN 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Mobile Number cannot be Alphanumeric';
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
END IF;

 

 /*--------------------Other Checkings ----------------------------------------------*/
 
 If Trunc(:B_Sh_Enquiry.Enq_Date) > sysdate Then
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Prospect Date cannot be greater than todays date';
 end if;
if :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is null then

 
 /*If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDAYS IS NULL AND :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE != 'EXC' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER!='04' THEN -- Added by Shailendra on 07.02.15 (DMSSAL-12171)
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Likely Purchase Days cannot be null';
 END IF;*/--end
 --commented by Dp Swain against DMSSAL-12294
 
 If nvl(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_LIKELYPURDATE,trunc(sysdate)) < Trunc(:B_Sh_Enquiry.Enq_Date) THEN
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Likely Purchase Date cannot be less than Enquiry Date';
 END IF;
end if; 
 
 ------:Enq_Ref_Custcd
 If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE ='REF' then
 If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY IN ('CIN','DD') AND :ENQ_REF_CUSTCD Is Null Then
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Valid Reference Customer';
 Elsif :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY = 'OT' and :enq_ref_custcd is null then
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Valid Reference name';
 Elsif :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY = 'ACC' and :enq_ref_custcd is null AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Loyalty Card Customer name'; -- Added as on 27-11-2019 against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
 Elsif :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY in ('ACC','ACD') and :enq_ref_custcd is null then --ACD is added by saket as on 16-01-2020
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Autocard Customer name';
 Elsif :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY = 'ACC' and :REF_AUTOCARD_NO is null then
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Customer Autocard Number';
 End if;
 End If; 


If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE ='REF' And :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY is null then
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Valid Reference';
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY_DESC');
 -- raise form_trigger_failure;
End If; 

If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE ='EVE' And :B_SH_ENQUIRY.event_code is null then
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Please Select an Event';
end if;

If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE ='ADV' And :B_SH_ENQUIRY.event_code is null then
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'You have selected advertisement in enquiry source, So Please Select type of Ads';
end if;
 
 
 /* Commented by Rameshwar on SCR - DMSSAL-12468 on 21-12-2018 
 
 If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE ='DSA' And :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_REF_CUSTCD is null then
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Please Select an DSA/DMA';
 end if;
 
 */ 

--Added by Manish On 14-feb-2017
--general.disp_text('Buyer'||'-'||:B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER,'note');
IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER in ('01','02','03') THEN
 
 IF :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE is null THEN 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Next Followup Date for new Vehicle';
 END IF;
 
 IF :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.Next_TIME is null THEN 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Next Followup Time for new Vehicle';
 END IF;
 
 IF :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN is null THEN 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Next Followup Action Plan for new Vehicle';
 END IF;
 
 IF :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE is null THEN 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Next Followup Pupose for new Vehicle';
 END IF;
END IF;

IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER in ('01','04') and :global.principal IN (1,2) THEN--added by divya on 11-Jan-2018 for poc Sales DMSSAL-12353 =1 THEN --Dinker(04-10-17)
 --- general.disp_text('Buyer2'||'-'||:B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER,'note'); 
 IF :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE is null THEN

 END IF;
 
 IF :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.Next_TIME is null THEN 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Next Followup Time for old Vehicle';
 END IF;
 
 IF :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN is null THEN 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Next Followup Action Plan for old Vehicle';
 END IF;
 
 IF :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE is null THEN 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Enter Next Followup Pupose for old Vehicle';
 END IF;
 

END IF;


IF (:B_ENQ_FOLLOW.Next_DATE + (:B_ENQ_FOLLOW.Next_TIME/(24*60*60))) < :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is null THEN
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Followup Date cannot be less than Enquiry Date';
end if;


--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (start) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522
if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY='ACC' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE='REF' and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0 is null AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then

end if;
if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY='ACC' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE='REF' and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_AUTOCARD_NO is null AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then 
 POPULATE_ERRORS.v_tab(populate_errors.v_tab.count + 1) := 'Pls. Enter Card Number.';
end if;
--Added by saket as on 18-11-2019 (end) against the scr number DMSSAL-12522


---SPL_CHR_CHEK;

------:B_Sh_Enquiry.Enq_Custcd

 Set_Item_Property('B_Sh_Enquiry.Enq_Name',Enabled,Property_True);
 Set_Item_Property('B_Sh_Enquiry.Enq_Name',Insert_Allowed,Property_True);
 Set_Item_Property('B_Sh_Enquiry.Enq_Name',Update_Allowed,Property_True);
End If;

 

 
 select count(*) into cnt
 from gm_schem gs,gm_mod gd
 where trunc(sysdate) BETWEEN SCHEM_STAR_DT AND SCHEM_END_DT
 and SCHEM_TYPE='RL' 
 and (schem_corp_grp_Cd=(select grop_Code from gm_gropd gm 
 where gm.cp_code=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID
 and cp_Actv_yn='Y'
 and principal_map_cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL)
 or schem_corp_Cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID)
 and gs.schem_model_cd=gd.model_cd
 and gd.principal_map_cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL; /*Changed by Dp Swain for multi org*/



if cnt > 0 and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EMAIL1 is null then

*/

ProgramUnit.Name: POP_LOV_VARIANT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE POP_LOV_VARIANT IS
 rg_id RecordGroup; 
 V_COUNT NUMBER := 1;
 v_bool boolean;
 V_CAHR VARCHAR2(100);
 rg_name VARCHAR2(40) := 'VARIANT'; 
 gc_id1 GroupColumn;
 gc_id2 GroupColumn; 
 errcode NUMBER; 
BEGIN
 SET_LOV_PROPERTY('LV_VAR',GROUP_NAME,'RG_VAR');
 rg_id := Find_Group('VARIANT'); 
 IF not Id_Null(rg_id) THEN 
 delete_group(rg_id);
-- Delete_Group_Row( rg_id, ALL_ROWS ); 
 end if;
 rg_id := Create_Group(rg_name);
 gc_id1 := Add_Group_Column(rg_id, 'VARIANT_DESC', CHAR_COLUMN,60); 
 gc_id2 := Add_Group_Column(rg_id, 'VARIANT_CD', CHAR_COLUMN,8); 

 FOR I IN 1..POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_VAR.COUNT
 LOOP
 IF POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_VAR(I).COL3 = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD THEN
 Add_Group_Row( rg_id,v_count); 
 Set_Group_Char_Cell( gc_id1, V_COUNT, rtrim(POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_VAR(I).COL1)||' - '||rtrim(POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_VAR(I).COL2)); 
 Set_Group_Char_Cell( gc_id2, V_COUNT, rtrim(POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_VAR(I).COL2)); 
 V_COUNT := V_COUNT + 1;
 end if;
 END LOOP;

 SET_LOV_PROPERTY('LV_VAR',GROUP_NAME,rg_id);
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POP_LOV_COLOR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE pop_lov_color IS
 rg_id RecordGroup; 
 V_COUNT NUMBER := 1;
 v_bool boolean;
 V_CHAR VARCHAR2(100);
 rg_name VARCHAR2(40) := 'ECOLOR'; 
 gc_id1 GroupColumn;
 gc_id2 GroupColumn; 
 errcode NUMBER; 
BEGIN
 SET_LOV_PROPERTY('LV_ECLR',GROUP_NAME,'RG_ECLR');
 rg_id := Find_Group('ECOLOR'); 
 IF not Id_Null(rg_id) THEN 
 Delete_Group(rg_id); 
 end if;
 rg_id := Create_Group(rg_name);
 gc_id1 := Add_Group_Column(rg_id, 'ECOLOR_DESC', CHAR_COLUMN,30); 
 gc_id2 := Add_Group_Column(rg_id, 'ECOLOR_CD', CHAR_COLUMN,8); 

 FOR I IN 1..POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_COLOR.COUNT
 LOOP
 
 IF POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_COLOR(I).COL3 = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD OR POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_COLOR(I).COL3 = 'ALL' THEN
 Add_Group_Row(rg_id,v_count);
 Set_Group_Char_Cell( gc_id1, V_COUNT, rtrim(POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_COLOR(I).COL1)); 
 Set_Group_Char_Cell( gc_id2, V_COUNT, rtrim(POPULATE_LISTS.TAB_AM_COLOR(I).COL2)); 
 V_COUNT := V_COUNT + 1;
 end if;
 END LOOP;
-- V_COUNT := POPULATE_GROUP(rg_id);
 SET_LOV_PROPERTY('LV_ECLR',GROUP_NAME,rg_id);
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query(NO_COMMIT);
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: PG_RECORDGROUP
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE PG_RECORDGROUP IS

/*****************************************************************************
NAME : RAMA KRISHNA.M
DATE : 11-06-2004
REQUIREMENT REFERENCE : 
PURPOSE : This package spec is used to declare the prototype for all the procedures 
 which is used in manuplating record group "RG_PRICE".
SEARCH FOR : 
/*****************************************************************************/
-- For Creating a new Recordgroup 
 PROCEDURE CREATE_RG(p_grpname IN VARCHAR2,p_col1 IN VARCHAR2,p_col2 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col3 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col4 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col5 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col6 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col7 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col8 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL);
-- For Inserting a Record in the Recordgroup 
 PROCEDURE INSERT_RG(p_grpname IN VARCHAR2,p_col1 IN VARCHAR2,p_col2 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col3 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col4 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col5 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col6 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col7 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col8 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL); 
-- For Deleting rows from Recordgroup based on the parameter passed 
 PROCEDURE DELETE_RG(p_grpname IN VARCHAR2,p_col1 IN VARCHAR2,p_col2 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col3 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col4 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col5 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col6 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col7 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col8 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL); 
-- For Fetching and Displaying in the Current block 
 PROCEDURE FETCH_RG (p_grpname IN VARCHAR2, p_col1 IN VARCHAR2,p_col2 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col3 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col4 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,
 p_col5 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_col6 IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL,

 p_col3 IN OUT VARCHAR2 , p_col4 IN OUT VARCHAR2 ,
 p_col5 IN OUT VARCHAR2 , p_col6 IN OUT VARCHAR2 ,

 PROCEDURE CLEAR_RG(p_grpname IN VARCHAR2);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: WHEN_NEW_FORM
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE When_new_form IS
BEGIN
--GO_BLOCK('B_SD_ENQUIRYIND');
BEGIN
 
 select nvl(PRV_MTH_PSS_ALLOW,'N'),nvl(NOBAK_PSS_ALLOW,0)
 INTO :PARAMETER.P_PRV_MTH_ALLOW,:PARAMETER.P_NO_BAK_DAY
 from am_mul_param
 where principal_map_cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL;
EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('MSIL parameter has not been set', 'Error');
 EXIT_FORM(NO_VALIDATE);
END; 

:PARAMETER.P_QUESTION:='N';
GO_BLOCK('B_enq_follow');


--GO_ITEM('NB_SRL_NO');
:CB_ENQUIRY.CREATED_BY := :GLOBAL.USER_NAME;
:global.no_of_models := 0;
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM',NAVIGABLE,PROPERTY_TRUE);
set_item_property('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM',insert_allowed,property_true);
set_item_property('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM',update_allowed,property_true);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('cb_enquiry.nb_srl_no',ENABLED,PROPERTY_true);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('cb_enquiry.nb_srl_no',navigable,PROPERTY_true);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('cb_enquiry.nb_srl_no',insert_allowed,property_true);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('cb_enquiry.nb_srl_no',update_allowed,property_true);
SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('cb_enquiry.nb_srl_no',navigable,property_true);
 --Added by saket as on 21-02-2019 (start)
 if :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 end if;
 --Added by saket as on 21-02-2019 (end)

GO_ITEM('NB_SRL_NO');

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_HEADER
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE check_header IS
BEGIN
 if :b_sh_enquiry.enq_name is null and :PARAMETER.P_ENQ_NUM <> 'Q' then
 general.disp_text('Please enter Enquiry Details Like Name and Address...','Error');
 go_item('b_sh_enquiry.enq_name');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;

END;

BEGIN
 null;
