ProgramUnit.Name: UPDATE_ENQUIRER_TYPE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE UPDATE_ENQUIRER_TYPE IS
 lv_trd_fnd NUMBER := 0;
BEGIN
 go_block('B_SD_ENQVEH');
 first_record;
 IF :b_sd_enqveh.enq_vehmodelcd IS NULL THEN
 --New car
 :b_sh_enquiry.enquirer_type := 'N';
 return;
 ELSIF :b_sd_enqveh.enq_vehmodelcd IS NOT NULL THEN
 LOOP
 IF :b_sd_enqveh.tradein_yn = 'Y' THEN
 lv_trd_fnd := 1;
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record;
 END LOOP; 
 IF lv_trd_fnd = 1 THEN
 --Exchange car
 :b_sh_enquiry.enquirer_type := 'E';
 ELSE
 --Second car
 :b_sh_enquiry.enquirer_type := 'S';
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: P_ENABLE_DISBLE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
--Procedure For Enable & Disable Items in block
PROCEDURE P_ENABLE_DISBLE(P_BNAME VARCHAR2) IS
cur_itm VARCHAR2(80); 
cur_block VARCHAR2(80) :=P_BNAME; --:System.Cursor_Block; 
BEGIN 
 cur_itm := Get_Block_Property( cur_block, FIRST_ITEM ); 
 WHILE ( cur_itm IS NOT NULL ) LOOP 
 cur_itm := cur_block||'.'||cur_itm; 
 If cur_itm <>P_BNAME||'.ENQ_RCITYCD' Then 
 message(cur_itm);message(cur_itm);
 Set_Item_Property( cur_itm, Insert_Allowed,Property_True); 
 Set_Item_Property( cur_itm, Update_Allowed,Property_True);
 Elsif cur_itm <>P_BNAME||'.RES_PIN' Then
 message(cur_itm);message(cur_itm);
 Set_Item_Property( cur_itm, Insert_Allowed,Property_True); 
 Set_Item_Property( cur_itm, Update_Allowed,Property_True);
 Else
 Set_Item_Property( cur_itm, Insert_Allowed,Property_False); 
 Set_Item_Property( cur_itm, Update_Allowed,Property_False);
 --Set_Item_Instance_Property( cur_itm, CURRENT_RECORD, VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'My_Favorite_Named_Attribute'); 
 End If;
 cur_itm := Get_Item_Property( cur_itm, NEXTITEM ); 
 END LOOP; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: UPDATE_PRIM_MODEL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE UPDATE_PRIM_MODEL IS
BEGIN
IF :PARAMETER.CUR_PM <> 1 THEN
 DECLARE
 LV_ERR_MSG VARCHAR2(2000);
 LV_ERR_CD NUMBER;
 BEGIN
 SP_UPDATE_PRIM_MODEL ( :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP, 
 :GLOBAL.DEALER, 
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD, 
 :GLOBAL.COMP_FA, 
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM, 
 :PARAMETER.CUR_PM, 
 LV_ERR_MSG, 
 LV_ERR_CD,'Y' ); 
 IF LV_ERR_MSG IS NULL THEN
 COMMIT; --if we remove this commit primary model cannot update
 END IF; 
 END; 
END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: POP_LIST_QUESTIONNAIRE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE pop_list_QUESTIONNAIRE IS
BEGIN
/* 1. Which Vehicle are you using presently */
DECLARE 
 rg_name VARCHAR2(40) := 'VEH_USE_PRE'; 
 rg_id RecordGroup; errcode NUMBER; 
BEGIN 
 rg_id := Find_Group( rg_name ); 
 IF Id_Null(rg_id) THEN 
 rg_id := Create_Group_From_Query( rg_name, 'SELECT CMODEL_DESC MODEL_DESC,CMODEL_CD MODEL_CD FROM GH_CMOD WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL 
 UNION
 SELECT MODEL_DESC,MODEL_CD FROM GM_MOD WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL 
 AND VALID_YN=''Y''
 UNION 
 SELECT ''Others'',''O'' FROM DUAL
 UNION 
 SELECT ''None'',''NONE'' FROM DUAL
 UNION 
 SELECT ''Two wheeler'',''2W'' FROM DUAL'); 
 END IF; 
 errcode := Populate_Group( rg_id ); 
 POPULATE_LIST('B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEH_USE_PRE',RG_NAME);
END;

/* 5. What are your expectations from your car 2 ? */

/* 5. What are your expectations from your car 3 ? */

ProgramUnit.Name: PIN_DESC
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE pin_desc (p_principal in number,p_pin_cd in varchar2,p_city_cd in varchar2, p_pin_desc out varchar2,
p_errmsg out varchar2, p_error_cd out number) is
BEGIN
 select location into p_pin_desc
 from gm_pin
 where pin_cd = p_pin_cd
 and city_cd =p_city_cd
 and principal_map_cd = p_principal;
 p_error_cd := 0;
exception
 when no_data_found then
 if p_city_cd is null then
 p_errmsg:='City code is empty';
 else 
 p_errmsg:='Pin Not found for the respect of City';
 end if; 
 when others then
 p_errmsg := 'Pin Not found for the respect of City';
 p_error_cd := 1;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: UPD_RD_ENQEXD
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE upd_RD_ENQEXD IS
cnt number;
BEGIN
 ------- Shakti
 begin
 select count(*) into cnt from RD_ENQEXD
 where parent_group = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.parent_group 
 and dealer_map_cd= :B_SH_ENQUIRY.dealer_map_cd 
 and loc_cd= :B_SH_ENQUIRY.loc_cd 
 and comp_fa = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.comp_fa 
 and enq_num = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num ;
 end;
 
 if :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is not null AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01'
 and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TRADEIN_YN = 'N' then 
 delete from RD_ENQEXD
 where parent_group = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.parent_group 
 and dealer_map_cd= :B_SH_ENQUIRY.dealer_map_cd 
 and loc_cd= :B_SH_ENQUIRY.loc_cd 
 and comp_fa = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.comp_fa 
 and enq_num = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num ; 
 elsif 
 :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is not null AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER in ('02','03')
 and cnt>0 then 
 delete from RD_ENQEXD
 where parent_group = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.parent_group 
 and dealer_map_cd= :B_SH_ENQUIRY.dealer_map_cd 
 and loc_cd= :B_SH_ENQUIRY.loc_cd 
 and comp_fa = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.comp_fa 
 and enq_num = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num ; 
 end if;
 ------- Shakti
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: UPD_CORPORATE_CD1
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE upd_corporate_cd1 IS
cnt number;

BEGIN
 ---Shakti
 begin
 if :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is not null then 
 select count(*) into cnt from 
 sh_ordbook
 WHERE ENQ_NUM = :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DEALER_map_cd
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PARENT_GROUP
 AND LOC_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COMP_FA;
 
 If cnt>0 then
 Update sh_ordbook
 set corporate = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID,
 workplace = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_WORKPLACE,
 modified_by = :GLOBAL.USER_NAME,---added by anand raj 19092015
 modified_date = sysdate ---added by anand raj 19092015
 WHERE ENQ_NUM = :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DEALER_map_cd
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PARENT_GROUP
 AND LOC_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COMP_FA;
 end if; 
 end if;
 end ;
 ---Shakti 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DELETE_CORPORATE_CODE1
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE delete_corporate_code1 IS
cnt number;
ord varchar2(12);
cnt1 number;
BEGIN

 if :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO is not null and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.WORKPLACE_ID <> :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TEMP_WORKPLACE_ID then 
 
 select count(*),order_num into cnt, ord from 
 sh_ordbook
 WHERE PARENT_GROUP = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PARENT_GROUP
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DEALER_map_cd
 AND LOC_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COMP_FA
 and ENQ_NUM = :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO
 group by order_num ;
 
 select count(*) into cnt1 from SH_ORD_INV_SCHEME 
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DEALER_map_cd
 AND LOC_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COMP_FA
 and order_num = ord
 and PARENT_GROUP = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PARENT_GROUP;
 
 if cnt>0 and ord is not null 
 and cnt1>0 then 
 delete from SH_ORD_INV_SCHEME
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.DEALER_map_cd
 AND LOC_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COMP_FA
 and order_num = ord
 and PARENT_GROUP = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.PARENT_GROUP;
 end if;
 end if; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: FETCH_CUSTOMER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
--Added By Shailendra 26.06.13
PROCEDURE fetch_customer_details IS
 CURSOR C1 IS
SELECT (rh.enq_name || ' ' || rh.middle_name || ' ' || rh.last_name)enq_name,rh.enq_num
 FROM rh_enq rh
WHERE dealer_map_cd =:global.dealer
 AND parent_group =:global.parent_group
 AND loc_cd =:global.loc_cd
 AND comp_fa =:global.comp_fa
 AND mobile =:b_sh_enquiry.ref_mobile_no;
 
BEGIN 
 go_block('B_MOB_NUM');
 clear_block;
 first_record;
 for i in C1 loop
 :B_MOB_NUM.cust_name := i.enq_name;
 :B_MOB_NUM.enq_number := i.enq_num; 
 exit when c1%notfound;
 next_record;
 END LOOP;
 first_record;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 general.disp_text('Unable to Fetch Customer Details' || SQLERRM, 'Error');
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: MODEL_COMBINATION_CHECK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE MODEL_COMBINATION_CHECK IS
 val1 VARCHAR2(5);
 val2 VARCHAR2(5);
 rec_no NUMBER;
 check_yn VARCHAR2(1) := 'Y';
 lv_model gm_mod.model_cd%TYPE;
 lv_model1 gm_mod.model_cd%TYPE;

BEGIN
 GO_BLOCK('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
 FIRST_RECORD;
 IF :b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd IS NOT NULL THEN
 LOOP
 val1 := :b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd;
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT list_from_range
 INTO lv_model
 FROM am_list_range
 WHERE list_from_range = val1
 AND list_name = 'ENQ_MODEL_CHECK'
 AND NVL(close_date,SYSDATE) >= sysdate
 AND principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.principal;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 lv_model := NULL;
 END;
 
 REC_NO := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
 NEXT_RECORD;
 LOOP
 IF :b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd IS NOT NULL THEN
 val2 := :b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd;
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT list_from_range
 INTO lv_model1
 FROM am_list_range
 WHERE list_from_range = val2
 AND list_name = 'ENQ_MODEL_CHECK'
 AND NVL(close_date,SYSDATE) >= sysdate
 AND principal_map_cd = :GLOBAL.principal;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 lv_model1 := NULL;
 END;
 
 IF (lv_model IS NOT NULL OR lv_model1 IS NOT NULL) AND
 val1 != val2 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Ciaz and other model can not be in same enquiry. Create a new enquiry for this ....', 'Note');
 check_yn := 'N';
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE' AND :b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd IS NULL;
 next_record;
 END LOOP;
 IF check_yn = 'N' THEN
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE' AND :b_sd_enquiry.enq_model_cd IS NULL;
 GO_RECORD(rec_no + 1);
 END LOOP;
 END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DUP_REC_CHECK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION dup_rec_check (
 p_block_name IN VARCHAR2,
 p_item_name IN VARCHAR2,
 p_value IN VARCHAR2,
 p_rec_num IN NUMBER,
 item_name IN VARCHAR2
)
 RETURN BOOLEAN
IS
--

 -- Declare variables to store current record number and key field values.

 -- store the record group name .
--rg_name VARCHAR2(15) := name_in('system.trigger_block');
 rg_name VARCHAR2 (25) := p_block_name;
 cur_item VARCHAR2 (30) := p_item_name; -- to store current item name
--cur_val varchar2(15) := name_in(name_in('system.trigger_item')); -- To store current item value.
 cur_val VARCHAR2 (50) := p_value; -- To store current item value.
 rec_num NUMBER (5) := p_rec_num;
 rg_id recordgroup; -- to Store rec-grp id.
 gc_id groupcolumn; -- to store group column id.
 tot_rows NUMBER := 0; -- to identify the number of rows in
 -- the record group.
BEGIN
 -- check for the record group ( rg_name ) existance
 rg_id := FIND_GROUP (rg_name);

 -- if the record group ( rg_name ) does not exist CREATE it & add
 -- COLS else find the group column id ( gc_id ).
 --
 IF ID_NULL (rg_id) THEN
 rg_id := CREATE_GROUP (rg_name);
 gc_id := ADD_GROUP_COLUMN (rg_id, cur_item, char_column, 50);
 ELSE
 gc_id := FIND_COLUMN (rg_name || '.' || cur_item);
 END IF;

 
 --
 -- Store the number of records exist in that record group ( rg_name ).
 --
 tot_rows := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT (rg_id);
 
 
 --
 -- for every record( exept the current record ) in the record group ( rg_name )
 -- compare the key field ( gc_ id ) with the present record key field .
 -- If any match is found then give the error message and stop , else ,
 -- update or insert the record in to the record with the values from current block
 --
 IF (NVL ( tot_rows, 0) != 0) THEN
 FOR i IN 1 .. tot_rows
 LOOP
 IF (rec_num != i) THEN
 -- if rec-grp rec_num != currentblock rec_num
-- IF ( get_group_char_cell(gc_id, i) = cur_val ) -- if key flds are eql
 IF UPPER (GET_GROUP_CHAR_CELL (gc_id, i)) = UPPER (cur_val) THEN
 general.disp_text ('Duplicate ' || item_name, 'Error');
 RETURN (TRUE);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;

 IF (NVL ( tot_rows, 0) < rec_num) THEN
 ADD_GROUP_ROW (rg_id, rec_num);
 END IF;

 SET_GROUP_CHAR_CELL (gc_id, rec_num, cur_val);
 RETURN (FALSE);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CALL_REPORT_ENQUIRY_DETAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE CALL_REPORT_ENQUIRY_DETAIL (p_principal varchar2,p_parent varchar2,p_dealer varchar2,
 p_loc varchar2, p_comp_fa varchar2, p_enqnum varchar2)IS
 
 repid REPORT_OBJECT;
 lv_rep VARCHAR2(100);
 lv_report_name VARCHAR2(50);
 lv_server VARCHAR2(20) := :global.rep_server;
 lv_alert VARCHAR2(20);
 l_v_Param VARCHAR2(50);
 l_AlertId ALERT;
 lv_param VARCHAR2(100);
 lv_report VARCHAR2(2000);
 lv_print VARCHAR2(2000);
Begin
 --Checking The Alert Button
 repid := Find_Report_Object('REPORT_CALL');
 lv_report_name := 'rr_enq_veh_exch_smil';
 l_AlertId := Find_Alert('AL_REPORT_TWLR');
 lv_alert := Show_Alert(l_AlertId);
 If lv_alert = Alert_Button1 Then
 Clear_Message;
 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid,REPORT_DESFORMAT,'PDF'); 
 Set_Report_Object_Property(repid,Report_Other,'P_PARENT='||p_parent||
 ' P_PRINCIPAL='||to_number(p_principal)||
 ' P_COMP_FA='||p_comp_fa||
 ' P_DEALER='||to_number(p_dealer)||
 ' P_LOC='||p_loc||
 ' P_ENQNUM='||p_enqnum||
 ' MODE=BITMAP blankpages=NO');

 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid,REPORT_SERVER,lv_server);
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid,REPORT_FILENAME,lv_report_name);

 lv_rep := RUN_REPORT_OBJECT(repid);
 
 -- If get_report_object_property(repid,REPORT_DESTYPE) != 'PRINTER' Then

 web.show_document('/reports/rwservlet/getjobid'||substr(lv_rep,instr(lv_rep,'_',-1)+1)||'?'||'server='||lv_server,'_blank');

 -- End If;
/* Elsif lv_alert = Alert_Button2 Then
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid,REPORT_FILENAME,lv_report_name);
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid,REPORT_DESFORMAT,'wided');
 Set_Report_Object_Property(repid,Report_Other,'P_PARENT='||p_parent||
 ' P_PRINCIPAL='||to_number(p_principal)||
 ' P_COMP_FA='||p_comp_fa||
 ' P_DEALER='||to_number(p_dealer)||
 ' P_LOC='||p_loc||
 ' P_pinum='||p_pinum||
 ' REPORT_DESTYPE =PRINTER'||
 ' MODE=CHARACTER BLANKPAGES=NO');
 
 SET_REPORT_OBJECT_PROPERTY(repid,REPORT_SERVER,lv_server);
 general.PROC_REPORT_CALL (REPID,lv_report,lv_print);
 :global.reporthandle := lv_report;
 :global.printoutput := lv_print;
 general.PROC_TIMER; */
 Else
 --Message('Alert Button3');
 Clear_Message;
 End If;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: DUP_MODEL_VAR_CHECK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE dup_model_var_check IS
BEGIN
 
 DECLARE
 RG_ID RECORDGROUP;
 GC_ID GROUPCOLUMN;
 TOT_ROWS NUMBER := 0;
 REC_NUM NUMBER; 
 CUR_VAL VARCHAR2(500);

BEGIN
 CUR_VAL := TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD) || TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SUFFIXCD) || TRIM(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_ECOLORCD);
 REC_NUM := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
 

 rg_id := find_group('B_SD_ENQUIRY'); 
 

 IF Id_Null(rg_id) THEN
 rg_id := create_group('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
 gc_id := add_group_column(rg_id,'ENQ_COLOR',CHAR_COLUMN,500);
 ELSE
 gc_id := find_column('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR');
 END IF;
 
 
 tot_rows := get_group_row_count( rg_id );
 

 IF ( nvl(tot_rows,0 ) != 0 ) THEN
 FOR i in 1..tot_rows
 LOOP
 IF ( rec_num != i ) THEN 

 IF upper( get_group_char_cell(gc_id, i)) = upper(cur_val ) 
 THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Variant ' || :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD || ' and color ' || :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR ||
 ' already selected','Error');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;
 
 IF ( nvl(tot_rows,0) < rec_num ) THEN
 add_group_row(rg_id,rec_num);
 END IF;
 set_group_char_cell(gc_id, rec_num, cur_val);
 

END;
 
 
END;

 :B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_TIME := NULL;
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_ENQ_FOLLOW', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_ENQ_FOLLOW', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANF_DESC', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_VAR_DESC', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');--DMSSAL-12276
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_COL_DESC', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');--DMSSAL-12276
 --SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_REG_NO', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_TIME', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_TIME', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.APPROX_AVAIL', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 
 
 END IF;
 end if;
 

 set_block_property('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW', insert_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW', update_allowed, property_true);

begin
 select ENQ_ACTIONPLN,
 ENQ_FOLLOWACTNPLN,
 to_number(TO_CHAR(enq_followdate, 'HH24MI')) * 36,
 enq_followdate
 into :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN,
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE,
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_TIME,
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE
 from RD_old_ENQFOLLOW
 where parent_group = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.parent_group
 and dealer_map_cd = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.dealer_map_cd
 and loc_cd = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.loc_cd
 and comp_fa = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.comp_fa
 and enq_num = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num
 AND enq_followslno =
 (select max(z.enq_followslno)
 from muldms.RD_old_ENQFOLLOW z
 where z.PARENT_GROUP = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.parent_group
 and z.DEALER_MAP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.dealer_map_cd
 and z.LOC_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.loc_cd
 and z.COMP_FA = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.comp_fa
 and z.ENQ_NUM = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_num);
 exception
 when others then
 null;
 end;

 set_block_property('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW', insert_allowed, property_false);
 set_block_property('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW', update_allowed, property_false);
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATION_FOR_OLD_VEH
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE VALIDATION_FOR_OLD_VEH IS
 cnt number := 0;
BEGIN
 If :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE ='ADV' And :B_SH_ENQUIRY.event_code is null then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('You have selected advertisement as enquiry source, So Please Select type of Ad', 'Error');
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.NB_EVENT_DESC');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 end if;
 
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER IN ('01', '04') AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 1 and nvl(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.OLD_VEH_ENQ_STATUS,'H') not in ('B', 'E', 'L', 'D') THEN
 /* IF :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANF_DESC IS NULL OR
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC IS NULL OR
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_VAR_DESC IS NULL OR :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_COL_DESC IS NULL THEN*/--DMSSAL-12276 
 /*OR
 :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_REG_NO IS NULL THEN*/
 
 IF :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANF_DESC IS NULL OR :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC IS NULL THEN
 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Please Enter Old Vehicle Detail, (Eg. Maker, Model, Variant, Color)', 'Error');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 
 END IF;
 END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: INSERT_OLD_VEH_FOLLOW
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE INSERT_OLD_VEH_FOLLOW IS
 CNT NUMBER := 0;
BEGIN
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER IN ('01', '04') 
 AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL IN (1,2)--added by divya on 11-Jan-2018 for poc Sales DMSSAL-12353 = 1 
 THEN
 IF :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV' AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 THEN --Added as on 17-11-2018 by saket against scr 12450
 SELECT COUNT(*)
 INTO CNT
 FROM MULDMS.RD_OLD_ENQFOLLOW
 WHERE PARENT_GROUP = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT--:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD--:GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND LOC_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_LOC--:GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP--:GLOBAL.COMP_FA
 AND ENQ_NUM = :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO;
 
 IF CNT = 0 THEN
 BEGIN
 INSERT INTO MULDMS.RD_OLD_ENQFOLLOW
 (DEALER_MAP_CD,
 LOC_CD,
 EMP_CD,
 COMP_FA,
 ENQ_NUM,
 ENQ_FOLLOWSLNO,
 PARENT_GROUP,
 ENQ_FOLLOWDATE,
 ENQ_FOLLOWSTATUS,
 ENQ_ACTIONPLN,
 ENQ_FOLLOWACTNPLN,
 CREATED_BY,
 CREATED_DATE,
 ENQ_VAR_SRL)
 VALUES
 (:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_DLR_CD,--:GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_LOC,--:GLOBAL.LOC_CD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_COMP,--:GLOBAL.COMP_FA,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM,
 1,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_PARENT,--:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE +
 (:B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_TIME / (24 * 60 * 60)),
 'P',
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN,
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE,
 :GLOBAL.USER_NAME,
 SYSDATE,
 1);
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 message('Unable to insert old vehicle followup detail');
 message('Unable to insert old vehicle followup detail');
 END;
 
 END IF;
 ELSE
 SELECT COUNT(*)
 INTO CNT
 FROM MULDMS.RD_OLD_ENQFOLLOW
 WHERE PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND COMP_FA = :GLOBAL.COMP_FA
 AND ENQ_NUM = :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO;
 
 IF CNT = 0 THEN
 BEGIN
 INSERT INTO MULDMS.RD_OLD_ENQFOLLOW
 (DEALER_MAP_CD,
 LOC_CD,
 EMP_CD,
 COMP_FA,
 ENQ_NUM,
 ENQ_FOLLOWSLNO,
 PARENT_GROUP,
 ENQ_FOLLOWDATE,
 ENQ_FOLLOWSTATUS,
 ENQ_ACTIONPLN,
 ENQ_FOLLOWACTNPLN,
 CREATED_BY,
 CREATED_DATE,
 ENQ_VAR_SRL)
 VALUES
 (:GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_EVALUATOR,
 :GLOBAL.COMP_FA,
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM,
 1,
 :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP,
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_DATE +
 (:B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_TIME / (24 * 60 * 60)),
 'P',
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.ACTION_PLAN,
 :B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW.NEXT_STAGE,
 :GLOBAL.USER_NAME,
 SYSDATE,
 1);
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 message('Unable to insert old vehicle followup detail');
 message('Unable to insert old vehicle followup detail');
 END;
 
 END IF;
 END IF;-- TV
 END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: MODEL_ENQ_CHK_NEW
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE MODEL_ENQ_CHK_NEW IS
 VAL1 VARCHAR2(5);
 VAL2 VARCHAR2(5);
 REC_NO1 NUMBER;
 REC_NO NUMBER;
 CHECK_YN VARCHAR2(1) := 'Y';
 LV_MODEL GM_MOD.MODEL_CD%TYPE;
 LV_MODEL1 GM_MOD.MODEL_CD%TYPE;

BEGIN
 GO_BLOCK('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
 FIRST_RECORD;
 LOOP
 IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD IS NOT NULL THEN
 
 REC_NO := :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD;
 BEGIN
 SELECT LIST_FROM_RANGE
 INTO LV_MODEL
 FROM AM_LIST_RANGE
 WHERE LIST_FROM_RANGE = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD
 AND LIST_NAME = 'ENQ_MODEL_CHECK'
 AND NVL(CLOSE_DATE, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 LV_MODEL := NULL;
 END;
 
 IF LV_MODEL IS NOT NULL THEN
 GO_BLOCK('B_SD_ENQUIRY');
 FIRST_RECORD;
 LOOP
 
 IF REC_NO <> :SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD THEN
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT LIST_FROM_RANGE
 INTO LV_MODEL1
 FROM AM_LIST_RANGE
 WHERE LIST_FROM_RANGE = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD
 AND LIST_NAME = 'ENQ_MODEL_CHECK'
 AND NVL(CLOSE_DATE, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 LV_MODEL1 := NULL;
 END;
 
 IF LV_MODEL IS NOT NULL AND LV_MODEL1 IS NULL AND
 :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD IS NOT NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Ciaz and other model can not be in same enquiry. Create a new enquiry for this ....',
 'Note');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;
 
 
 GO_RECORD(REC_NO);
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD = 'TRUE';
 
 NEXT_RECORD;
 
 END LOOP;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PROPERTY_SET_AFTER_FETCH
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PROPERTY_SET_AFTER_FETCH IS

 OLD_CAR_ENQ_STATUS MULDMS.RH_ENQ.OLD_VEH_ENQ_STATUS%TYPE;
 NEW_CAR_ENQ_STATUS MULDMS.RD_ENQ.ENQ_STATUS%TYPE;
 OLD_CAR_EXCH_STATUS MULDMS.SH_TV_EVAL.EXCH_FLAG%TYPE;
 
BEGIN
 IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 2 THEN
 
 IF ( NVL(:B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS,'X') IN ('C', 'L', 'D', 'R')) THEN
 
 IF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS = 'C' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('ENQUIRY HAS BEEN INVOICED.NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'NOTE');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 ELSIF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS = 'L' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('ENQUIRY HAS BEEN LOST.NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'NOTE');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 ELSIF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS = 'D' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('ENQUIRY HAS BEEN DROPPED.NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'NOTE');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 ELSIF :B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS = 'R' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('ENQUIRY HAS BEEN TRANSFER.NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'NOTE');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 END IF;
 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_ENQ_FOLLOW', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_ENQ_FOLLOW', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQVEH', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQVEH', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQHOB', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQHOB', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQCONS', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQCONS', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQCOMP', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQCOMP', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRYIND', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRYIND', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQFAMILY', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQFAMILY', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_COMPANY', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_COMPANY', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_COMPANY1', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_COMPANY1', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME1', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);

 ELSE

 IF NVL(NEW_CAR_ENQ_STATUS,'X') = 'C' OR NVL(OLD_CAR_EXCH_STATUS,'X') = 'Y' THEN

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.PB_SCHEMES', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);*/ --Changed by Dp Swain
 
 --Changed by Dp Swain
 
 IF NVL(NEW_CAR_ENQ_STATUS,'X') = 'C' THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('NEW VEHICLE ENQUIRY HAS BEEN INVOICED.NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'Error');

 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');

 ELSIF NVL(OLD_CAR_ENQ_STATUS,'X') IN ('B', 'E') AND NVL(OLD_CAR_EXCH_STATUS,'X') = 'N' THEN

 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME1', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 /*SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.PB_SCHEMES', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);*/ --Changed by Dp Swain
 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('BOTH NEW/OLD VEHICLE ENQUIRY HAS BEEN LOST/DROPPED. NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'ERROR');
 
 ELSIF NVL(NEW_CAR_ENQ_STATUS,'X') IN ('L', 'D', 'R') THEN
 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);

 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME1', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER in ('02', '03') then

 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('ENQUIRY HAS BEEN LOST/DROPPED. NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'ERROR');
 end if;
 
 /*SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.CB_PM', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VAR_SRL', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_VARIANT_CD', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_COLOR', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.STATUS', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.APPROX_AVAIL', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQUIRY.PB_SCHEMES', ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);*/ --Changed by Dp Swain
 
 ELSIF NVL(OLD_CAR_ENQ_STATUS,'X') IN ('L', 'D') THEN
 
 if :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER = '04' then
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);

 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SCHEME1', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE', 'D');
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(INITCAP('ENQUIRY HAS BEEN LOST/DROPPED. NO MORE FOLLOW UPS CAN BE DONE'), 'ERROR');
 end if;
 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_OLD_ENQ_FOLLOW', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 /*Added By Dp Swain*/
 ELSE
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SH_ENQUIRY', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDATION_FOR_COMM_VEH
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE VALIDATION_FOR_COMM_VEH IS
 cnt number := 0;
BEGIN
 IF :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE = 'COM' then
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_CUST_PROFILE IS NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Customer Profile Cannot Be Blank!!!!', 'Error');
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_CUST_PROFILE');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_USAGE_AREA IS NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Usage Area Cannot Be Blank!!!!', 'Error');
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_USAGE_AREA');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_LICENSE_AVL IS NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('License Availability Cannot Be Blank!!!!', 'Error');
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_LICENSE_AVL');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_PRIM_USAGE IS NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Customer Primary Usage Cannot Be Blank!!!!', 'Error');
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_PRIM_USAGE');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure; --By Kanav on 26-Jul-2018 for CRM
 END IF;
 
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_LOAD_CARRY IS NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Average Load Carrried Cannot Be Blank!!!!', 'Error');
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_LOAD_CARRY');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure; --By Kanav on 31-Jul-2018 for CRM
 END IF;
 
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_AVG_RUN IS NULL THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Average Run per Day Cannot Be Blank!!!!', 'Error');
 go_item('B_SH_ENQUIRY.COM_AVG_RUN');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure; --By Kanav on 31-Jul-2018 for CRM
 END IF;
 
 END IF;

END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SP_ADD_BUYER
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE SP_ADD_BUYER IS
BEGIN
 
 --Added by Rameshwar Kumar 24_Augest 2021 (Start)
 IF :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER='02' AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL=1 and :B_SH_ENQUIRY.enq_date >'08-SEP-2021' then 
 
 GO_BLOCK('B_SD_ENQEXD');
 GO_ITEM('B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANF_DESC');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE); 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_MFG', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL_DESC', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_VAR_DESC', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.USAGE', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_MANDATORY');
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_MFG', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('B_SD_ENQEXD.USAGE', VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE, 'VA_DEFAULT');
 END IF; 
--Added by Rameshwar Kumar 24_Augest 2021 (End) 
END;

RecordGroup.Name: RG_VEH_FOR
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select list_desc,list_code from am_list 
where list_name='CAR_OWNER'
AND list_code<>'DRV'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_PROF
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
Select LIST_DESC,LIST_CODE FROM AM_LIST 
WHERE ((LIST_NAME = 'NATURE_OF_PROF_NEW' AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL) OR (LIST_NAME = 'NATURE_OF_PROF_NEW' AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NULL))
AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
AND NVL(LIST_FLAG,'X')<>'D' ORDER BY LIST_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_ACT_PROF
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT ALL GM_ACT_PROF.ACT_PROFESSION_DESC, GM_ACT_PROF.ACT_PROFESSION_CD
FROM AM_LIST, GM_ACT_PROF
WHERE AM_LIST.LIST_NAME='NATURE_OF_PROF' 
AND AM_LIST.LIST_CODE = GM_ACT_PROF.PROFESSION_CD 
AND GM_ACT_PROF.PROFESSION_CD=:B_SD_ENQUIRYIND.ENQ_INDACCCATEGCD
AND GM_ACT_PROF.Principal_Map_Cd=AM_LIST.Principal_Map_Cd
AND AM_LIST.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL

RecordGroup.Name: RG_DS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT PARTY_CD, PARTY_NAME FROM GM_PARTY WHERE PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP AND
DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER AND
PARTY_TYPE ='DM'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_CIN
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select cust_name||' '||middle_name||' '||last_name Name, cust_cd from gm_cin
where PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL

RecordGroup.Name: RG_ECLR
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT ECOLOR_DESC, ECOLOR_CD FROM GM_ECLR
WHERE ECOLOR_CD IN (SELECT ECOLOR_CD FROM GM_VAR_ECLR WHERE VARIANT_CD IN (:B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_suffixCD,'ALL') AND VALID_YN='Y'
and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL)
and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL

RecordGroup.Name: RG_VAR
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT VR.VARIANT_DESC, VR.VARIANT_CD
 FROM MULDMS.GM_MOD MD,
 MULDMS.GM_VAR VR,
 MULDMS.GM_CHANNEL_VARIANT_ALLOW VC
 WHERE MD.MODEL_CAT_CD = VR.MODEL_CAT_CD
 AND MD.MODEL_CD = VR.MODEL_CD
 AND MD.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = VR.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD
 AND VR.CHANNEL = VC.VARIANT_CATEGORY
 AND VR.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = VC.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD
 AND VC.CHANNEL_CATEGORY = :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE
 AND VC.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND VR.MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD
 AND NVL(VR.ENQ_YN, 'N') = 'Y'
 AND VR.VALID_YN = 'Y'
/*added by saket as on 29-11-2018 against the scrno 12450 */
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT VR.VARIANT_DESC, VR.VARIANT_CD
 FROM MULDMS.GM_MOD MD,
 MULDMS.GM_VAR VR,
 MULDMS.GM_CHANNEL_VARIANT_ALLOW VC
 WHERE MD.MODEL_CAT_CD = VR.MODEL_CAT_CD
 AND MD.MODEL_CD = VR.MODEL_CD
 AND MD.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = VR.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD
 AND VR.CHANNEL = VC.VARIANT_CATEGORY
 AND VR.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = VC.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD
 AND VC.CHANNEL_CATEGORY = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.REPB_CHANNEL
 AND :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV'
 AND :B_SH_ENQUIRY.TYPE_OF_BUYER ='01' 
 AND VC.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND VR.MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MODEL_CD
 AND NVL(VR.ENQ_YN, 'N') = 'Y'
 AND VR.VALID_YN = 'Y'
order by 1
 /*ORDER BY VR.VARIANT_DESC*/

RecordGroup.Name: RG_DSE1
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select Name, emp_cd, MSPIN, desg_cd, desg_desc
 from (select ge.emp_Name Name, ge.emp_cd, MSPIN, desg_cd, desg_desc
 from gm_emp ge, gm_desg gd
 WHERE ge.DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND ge.EMP_CATEG = 'S'
 and ge.EMP_APPROVE = 'A'
 AND ge.EMP_LEAVING_DATE IS NULL
 and ge.loc_cd = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 and ge.EMP_DESG_CD = gd.desg_cd
 and gd.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and gd.enq_assign_yn = 'Y'
 AND DECODE(GD.DEALER_CATEGORY, 'DDL', 'NRM', GD.DEALER_CATEGORY) = :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE
 AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 1
 union
 select ge.emp_Name Name, ge.emp_cd, MSPIN, desg_cd, desg_desc
 from gm_emp ge, gm_desg gd
 WHERE ge.DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND ge.EMP_CATEG = 'S'
 and ge.EMP_APPROVE = 'A'
 AND ge.EMP_LEAVING_DATE IS NULL
 and ge.loc_cd = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 and ge.EMP_DESG_CD = gd.desg_cd
 and gd.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and gd.enq_assign_yn = 'Y'
 AND DECODE(GD.DEALER_CATEGORY, 'DDL', 'NRM', GD.DEALER_CATEGORY) = :GLOBAL.CHANNEL_TYPE
 AND ge.SEGMENT = :CB_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SEGMENT_CD
 AND :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 2)
 GROUP BY Name, emp_cd, MSPIN, desg_cd, desg_desc
/* PMC check added by kanav on 02-May-2019 for DMSSAL(S)-13311*/

RecordGroup.Name: RG_EVAL
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select ge.emp_Name Name,
 ge.emp_cd,
 MSPIN,
 desg_cd,
 desg_desc,
 ge.dealer_map_cd,
 ge.loc_cd
 from gm_emp ge, gm_desg gd,AM_LIST AL
 WHERE ge.DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND ge.EMP_CATEG = 'S'
 and ge.EMP_APPROVE = 'A'
 and nvl(ge.emp_leaving_date,sysdate+1) >= sysdate
 and ge.loc_cd = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 and ge.EMP_DESG_CD = gd.desg_cd
 and gd.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND AL.LIST_NAME='ENQ_TRACK_EVAL'
 AND gd.enq_assign_yn=AL.LIST_CODE
 union
select ge.emp_Name Name,
 ge.emp_cd,
 MSPIN,
 desg_cd,
 desg_desc,
 ge.dealer_map_cd,
 ge.loc_cd
 from gm_emp ge, gm_desg gd,am_list al
 WHERE ge.EMP_DESG_CD = gd.desg_cd
 and gd.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND ge.EMP_CATEG = 'S'
 and ge.EMP_APPROVE = 'A'
 AND nvl(ge.emp_leaving_date,sysdate+1) >= sysdate
 AND AL.LIST_NAME='ENQ_TRACK_EVAL'
 and gd.enq_assign_yn = al.list_code
 and (ge.DEALER_MAP_CD, ge.loc_cd) in
 (select dl.dealer_map_cd, dl.loc_cd
 from am_dealer_loc dl
 where dl.parent_group = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 and dl.sales_stock_yard_yn = 'Y'
 and dl.dealer_type in ('S', '3S')
 and dl.region_cd =
 (select distinct dlr.region_cd
 from am_dealer_loc dlr
 where dlr.parent_group = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 and dlr.dealer_map_cd = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 and dlr.loc_cd = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 ))

RecordGroup.Name: RG_EVAL_VISIT
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select ge.emp_Name Name,
 ge.emp_cd,
 MSPIN,
 desg_cd,
 desg_desc,
 ge.dealer_map_cd,
 ge.loc_cd
 from gm_emp ge, gm_desg gd ,am_list al
 WHERE ge.EMP_DESG_CD = gd.desg_cd
 and gd.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND ge.EMP_CATEG = 'S'
 and ge.EMP_APPROVE = 'A'
 AND nvl(ge.emp_leaving_date,sysdate+1) >= sysdate
 and al.list_name='ENQ_TRACK_EVAL'
 and al.list_code=gd.enq_assign_yn 
 and (ge.DEALER_MAP_CD, ge.loc_cd) in
 (select dl.dealer_map_cd, dl.loc_cd
 from am_dealer_loc dl
 where dl.parent_group = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 and dl.sales_stock_yard_yn = 'Y'
 and dl.dealer_type in ('S', '3S')
 and dl.region_cd =
 (select distinct dlr.region_cd
 from am_dealer_loc dlr
 where dlr.parent_group = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 and dlr.dealer_map_cd = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 and dlr.loc_cd = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 ))

RecordGroup.Name: RG_PINO
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT LOCATION , PIN_CD 
FROM GM_PIN 
WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
AND CITY_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_OCITYCD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_PINR
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT LOCATION , PIN_CD 
FROM GM_PIN 
WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
AND CITY_CD = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RCITYCD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_EVENTS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT SM.EVENT_CD,AM.LIST_DESC,SM.EVENT_NAME
FROM SM_EVENT SM,SM_EVENT_DEALERS SMD, AM_LIST AM
WHERE AM.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
AND SM.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = AM.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD
AND TRUNC(SM.EVENT_REL_DATE) > TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-2))
AND TRUNC(SM.EVENT_REL_DATE) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE)
AND NVL(SM.EVENT_STATUS,'N') <> 'C'
AND SM.EVENT_TYPE = AM.LIST_CODE
AND AM.LIST_NAME = 'EVENT_TYPE'
AND SMD.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=SM.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD
AND SMD.EVENT_CD=SM.EVENT_CD
AND SMD.DEALER_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.DEALER

RecordGroup.Name: RG_ADS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT(AD_CD),AD_DESC
FROM SM_AD
WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
AND TRUNC(AD_REL_DATE) > TRUNC(SYSDATE - 30)
AND TRUNC(AD_REL_DATE) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE)
AND AD_STATUS='R'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_SOURCE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT RM.ETYPE_DESC,RM.ETYPE_CD,RM.ETYPE_FLAG FROM RM_ETYPES RM WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER AND ETYPE_FLAG <>'D'
ORDER BY ETYPE_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_MODE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT so.mode_cd,AM.LIST_DESC FROM rm_Sou_mode so,AM_LIST AM
WHERE so.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL 
AND so.mod_flag=1
and so.etype_cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_TYPE
and AM.LIST_NAME='ENQUIRY_SOURCE' 
and AM.Principal_Map_Cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL 
and so.mode_cd=am.list_code



/*SELECT AM.LIST_CODE,AM.LIST_DESC,LIST_FLAG FROM AM_LIST AM
WHERE AM.LIST_NAME='ENQUIRY_SOURCE' 
AND AM.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=1 AND AM.LIST_FLAG !='D'*/

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TDSE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select ge.emp_Name Name, ge.emp_cd
from gm_emp ge,gm_desg gd
WHERE ge.DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER 
AND ge.EMP_CATEG = 'S'
and ge.EMP_APPROVE='A'

and ge.loc_cd=:GLOBAL.LOC_CD

and emp_cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_SALESMAN_CD

/*select emp_Name Name, emp_cd from gm_emp
WHERE DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER

select city_desc,city_cd ,state_cd 
from muldms.gm_city
where principal_map_cd = :global.principal and
nvl(state_cd,null)
=decode(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.STATE_cD,
null,nvl(state_cd,null),:B_SH_ENQUIRY.STATE_cD)

from gm_city
where principal_map_cd = :global.principal
order by city_desc
*/

RecordGroup.Name: RG_OCITY
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select city_desc,city_cd ,state_cd 
from gm_city
where principal_map_cd = :global.principal
order by city_desc

RecordGroup.Name: RG_CORPRT

SELECT mul_corporate.CP_NAME,mul_corporate.CP_NUMBER
FROM mul_corporate
WHERE To_date(nvl(CP_CLOSE_DATE,sysdate),'dd-mm-yyyy')>=To_date(NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE,SYSDATE),'dd-mm-yyyy')

ORDER BY CP_NAME
*/

FROM mul_corporate
WHERE TRUNC(CP_CLOSE_DATE)>=TRUNC(NVL(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_DATE,SYSDATE))
ORDER BY CP_NAME*/

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TYPE_OF_BUYER
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT list_desc,list_code 
FROM MULDMS.am_list 
WHERE LIST_NAME='TYPE_OF_BUYER'
and list_name_desc='TYPE_OF_BUYER'
and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
order by dealer_map_cd

RecordGroup.Name: RG_BUYER_MAKE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT distinct LIST_NAME_DESC 
FROM MULDMS.am_list 
WHERE LIST_NAME='BUYER_MAKE_MODEL'
AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
ORDER BY LIST_NAME_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_BUYER_MAKE_NEW
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT distinct LIST_NAME_DESC 
FROM MULDMS.am_list 
WHERE LIST_NAME='BUYER_MAKE_MODEL'
AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
ORDER BY LIST_NAME_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_BUYPER_MODEL
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT distinct LIST_DESC 
FROM MULDMS.am_list 
WHERE LIST_NAME='BUYER_MAKE_MODEL'
and list_name_desc = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.VEHICLE_MAKER
and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
ORDER BY LIST_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_BUYER_MODEL_NEW
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT distinct LIST_DESC 
FROM MULDMS.am_list 
WHERE LIST_NAME='BUYER_MAKE_MODEL'
and list_name_desc = :B_SD_ENQEXD.EX_MAKE
and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
ORDER BY LIST_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_DESG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
Select LIST_DESC,LIST_CODE FROM AM_LIST
 WHERE LIST_NAME = 'DESIGNATION' AND 
 PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL ORDER BY LIST_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_STATE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct st.state_Cd,st.state_desc from gm_city gm,gm_state st
where 
 nvl(gm.city_Cd,null) =decode(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RCITYCD,null,nvl(gm.city_cd,null),:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_RCITYCD)
 and gm.principal_map_Cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
and gm.state_Cd=st.state_Cd
and gm.principal_map_Cd=st.principal_map_Cd
order by st.state_desc

RecordGroup.Name: RG_OFF_STATE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct st.state_Cd,st.state_desc from gm_city gm,gm_state st
where 
 nvl(gm.city_Cd,null) =decode(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_OCITYCD,null,nvl(gm.city_cd,null),:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_OCITYCD)
 and gm.principal_map_Cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
and gm.state_Cd=st.state_Cd
and gm.principal_map_Cd=st.principal_map_Cd
order by st.state_desc

RecordGroup.Name: RG_DISTRICT
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct district_name from gm_tehsil where state_Cd=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.STATE_CD
and active_yn='Y'
and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
order by 1

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TEHSIL
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select 'Not Applicable' tehsil_Cd,'Not Applicable' tehsil_desc,1 srl from dual
union all
select tehsil_Cd,tehsil_desc ,2 srl
from gm_tehsil
where PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL and district_name=:b_sh_enquiry.district
and active_yn='Y'
order by srl,tehsil_desc



/*select tehsil_Cd,tehsil_desc from gm_tehsil where PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=1 and district_name=:b_sh_enquiry.district*/

RecordGroup.Name: RG_VILLAGE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select 'Not Applicable' village_Cd,'Not Applicable' village_name,1 srl from dual
union all
select village_Cd village_Cd ,village_name village_name,2 srl
from gm_village where PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL and tehsil_Cd=:b_sh_enquiry.tehsil_cd
and active_yn='Y'
order by srl,village_name


/*select village_Cd,village_name from gm_village where 
PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=1
and tehsil_Cd=:b_sh_enquiry.tehsil_cd*/

RecordGroup.Name: RG_CUSTTYPE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select CTYPE_CD,CTYPE_DESC 
from SM_DMSPOC_CUS_TYPE
WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL 
AND NVL(FLAG,'N')='N'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_MANF
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select MAKE_CD,
 MAKE_DESCRIPTION,
 null model_cd,
 null model_desc,
 null var_cd,
 null var_desc,
 null clr_cd,
 null clr_desc
 from SM_DMSPOC_MAKE
 where PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 order by MAKE_CD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_SUBMOD
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select SUBMODELNO, SUBMODELNAME, null clr_cd, null clr_desc
 from SM_DMSPOC_SUBMODEL_MAST
 WHERE decode(MAKE_CD, 'M', 'M', 'N') = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE
 AND MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL
 AND NVL(ACTIVE_FLAG, 'N') = 'N'
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE = 'N'
union
select variant_cd, variant_desc, null clr_cd, null clr_desc
 from gm_var
 where PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE = DECODE(:global.principal,2,'SUZ','M')
 AND MODEL_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MODEL
 and model_cat_cd = :B_SD_ENQEXD.model_catg
 order by 2

RecordGroup.Name: RG_EX_CLR
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT ECOLOR_CD, ECOLOR_DESC
 FROM GM_ECLR
WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE = 'M'
 and ECOLOR_CD IN
 (SELECT ECOLOR_CD
 FROM GM_VAR_ECLR
 WHERE VARIANT_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_SUB_MODEL
 and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL)
AND :global.principal<>2
union 
SELECT ECOLOR_CD, ECOLOR_DESC
 FROM GM_ECLR
WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
AND :global.principal=2
/*union
select 'M' cd, 'Metalic' descrip
 from dual
where :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL<>2
union
select 'NM' cd, 'Non-Metalic' descrip
 from dual
where :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL<>2*//*Commented by Kanav on 29-Apr-2020 for DMSSAL-12653*/
order by 2

RecordGroup.Name: RG_PMOD
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select MODEL_CD,
 MODEL_DESC,
 null model_cat,
 null var_cd,
 null var_desc,
 null clr_cd,
 null clr_desc
 from SM_DMSPOC_MAKE_MODEL_MAS
 WHERE decode(MAKE_CD, 'M', 'M', 'N') = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE
 /*AND NVL(ACTIVE_FLAG, 'N') = 'N' Commented by saket as on 29-10-2022*/
 AND NVL(ACTIVE_FLAG,'Y')='Y' /*Added by saket as on 29-10-2022*/
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE = 'N'
 and 1= :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
union all
select model_cd,
 model_desc,
 model_cat_cd,
 null var_cd,
 null var_desc,
 null clr_cd,
 null clr_desc
 from gm_mod
 where PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE = 'M'
 and 1= :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 UNION ALL
 select MODEL_CD,
 MODEL_DESC,
 null model_cat,
 null var_cd,
 null var_desc,
 null clr_cd,
 null clr_desc
 from SM_DMSPOC_MAKE_MODEL_MAS
 WHERE MAKE_CD = :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE
 AND NVL(ACTIVE_FLAG, 'N') = 'N'
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE <>'SUZ'
 and 2= :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
union all
select model_cd,
 model_desc,
 model_cat_cd,
 null var_cd,
 null var_desc,
 null clr_cd,
 null clr_desc
 from gm_mod
 where PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 and :B_SD_ENQEXD.POC_MANUFACTURE ='SUZ'
 and 2= :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 order by 2

RecordGroup.Name: RG_PMOD_TWLR
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select MODEL_CD,MODEL_DESC
from SM_DMSPOC_MAKE_MODEL_MAS
WHERE MAKE_CD=:B_SD_ENQEXD_TWO_WLR.POC_MANUFACTURE
 /*AND NVL(ACTIVE_FLAG, 'N') = 'N' Commented by saket as on 29-10-2022*/
 AND NVL(ACTIVE_FLAG,'Y')='Y' /*Added by saket as on 29-10-2022*/
AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
order by MODEL_CD

RecordGroup.Name: RG_POUT
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select OUTLET_CD,TV_OUTLET_DESC 
from SM_DMSPOC_TV_OUTLET where MSIL_DELR_CD=:parameter.p_mul_dlr_cd and FOR_CD=:parameter.p_for_cd 
and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
order by TV_OUTLET_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_BUYER_TYPE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select list_desc,list_code from 
( 
SELECT list_desc,list_code ,dealer_map_cd 
FROM MULDMS.am_list 
WHERE LIST_NAME='TYPE_OF_BUYER'
and list_name_desc='TYPE_OF_BUYER'
and :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE<>'TV' 
and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL 
union all
SELECT list_desc,list_code ,dealer_map_cd
FROM MULDMS.am_list 
WHERE LIST_NAME='TYPE_OF_BUYER'
and list_name_desc='TYPE_OF_BUYER'
and :PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE='TV'
and list_code in ('01','04') 
and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL 
) 
order by dealer_map_cd asc

RecordGroup.Name: RG_REFERRED_BY
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT LIST_DESC, LIST_CODE FROM AM_LIST 
WHERE LIST_NAME='REFFERAL_TYPE'
AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL 
AND NVL(LIST_FLAG,'X')<>'D'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TEST_MODEL
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT model_cd, model_desc 
 FROM gm_mod gm
WHERE NVL(TEST_DRIVE_YN,'Y') <>'N' 
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND EXISTS (SELECT 'X' 
 FROM GLB_TEST_DRIVE_MODEL
 WHERE model_cd = gm.model_cd)

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TD_VARIANT
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT VARIANT_DESC, VARIANT_CD
 FROM GM_VAR
 WHERE VALID_YN = 'Y'
 AND MODEL_CD = :B_TEST_DRIVE.TEST_MODEL_CODE_NEW
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND NVL(ENQ_YN, 'N') = 'Y'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_MGA_PART
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT part_num,part_desc,mrp_1
FROM pm_part 
WHERE catg_cd = 'AA'
AND tag_cd <> 5 
AND DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
AND part_num like :B_SD_MGA_BOOKING.PART_NUM||'%'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_CAR_OWNER
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select list_desc,list_code from am_list 
where list_name='CAR_OWNER'

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TITLE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
Select LIST_DESC,LIST_CODE FROM AM_LIST 
WHERE ((LIST_NAME = 'TITLE_CD' AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NOT NULL) OR (LIST_NAME = 'TITLE_CD_NEW' AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NULL))
AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
--AND NVL(LIST_FLAG,'X')<>'D' 
ORDER BY LIST_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_PRIM_USAGE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT X.LIST_DESC,X.LIST_CODE
 FROM AM_LIST X
 WHERE X.LIST_NAME = 'COM_PRIM_USAGE'
 AND X.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 ORDER BY X.LIST_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_EVAL_VISIT_OB
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select ge.emp_Name Name,
 ge.emp_cd,
 MSPIN,
 desg_cd,
 desg_desc,
 ge.dealer_map_cd,
 ge.loc_cd
 from gm_emp ge, gm_desg gd ,am_list al
 WHERE ge.EMP_DESG_CD = gd.desg_cd
 and gd.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND ge.EMP_CATEG = 'S'
 and ge.EMP_APPROVE = 'A'
 AND nvl(ge.emp_leaving_date,sysdate+1) >= sysdate
 and al.list_name='ENQ_TRACK_EVAL'
 and desg_desc='Evaluator (Visiting)'
 and al.list_code=gd.enq_assign_yn 
 and (ge.DEALER_MAP_CD, ge.loc_cd) in
 (select dl.dealer_map_cd, dl.loc_cd
 from am_dealer_loc dl
 where dl.parent_group = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 and dl.sales_stock_yard_yn = 'Y'
 and dl.dealer_type in ('S', '3S')
 and dl.region_cd =
 (select distinct dlr.region_cd
 from am_dealer_loc dlr
 where dlr.parent_group = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 and dlr.dealer_map_cd = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 and dlr.loc_cd = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 ))
union
select ge.emp_Name Name,
 ge.emp_cd,
 MSPIN,
 desg_cd,
 desg_desc,
 ge.dealer_map_cd,
 ge.loc_cd
 from gm_emp ge, gm_desg gd 
 WHERE ge.EMP_DESG_CD = gd.desg_cd
 and gd.PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND ge.EMP_CATEG = 'S'
 and ge.EMP_APPROVE = 'A'
 AND nvl(ge.emp_leaving_date,sysdate+1) >= sysdate
 and ge.dealer_map_cd = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 and gd.desg_cd in (select list_code from am_list where list_name='EVAL_OB_DESG' and nvl(list_flag,'Y')='Y') 
 and (ge.DEALER_MAP_CD, ge.loc_cd) in
 (select dl.dealer_map_cd, dl.loc_cd
 from am_dealer_loc dl
 where dl.parent_group = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 and dl.sales_stock_yard_yn = 'Y'
 and dl.dealer_type in ('TV'))

RecordGroup.Name: RG_OB_OUTLET
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select AM.MUL_DEALER_CD||'-'||AM.FOR_CD OUTLET_CD,AM.LOC_DESC OUTLET_DESC,am.dealer_map_cd,am.loc_cd,am.parent_group,tvm.comp_fa,am.channel 
 from AM_TV_DEALER_MAPPING tvm,am_dealer_loc am
where tvm.tv_dealer_map_cd=:GLOBAL.DEALER
 and tvm.tv_loc_cd=:GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 and tvm.tv_parent_group=:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 and tvm.tv_comp_fa=:global.comp_fa
 and tvm.dealer_map_cd=am.dealer_map_cd
 and tvm.loc_cd=am.loc_cd
 and tvm.parent_group=am.parent_group

RecordGroup.Name: RG_CUST_ENQ_AGE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select LIST_DESC, LIST_CODE
 FROM AM_LIST
 WHERE LIST_NAME = 'ENQ_CUST_AGE_GROUP'
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL

RecordGroup.Name: RG_BASST
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
Select LIST_DESC,LIST_CODE FROM AM_LIST WHERE LIST_NAME = 'BUSS_ASSO_TYPE' AND
 PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = 1 AND NVL(LIST_FLAG,'Y')='Y' ORDER BY LIST_DESC

RecordGroup.Name: RG_ACARD
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select x.card_num 
, x.cust_name 
 from gd_loyalty_enrol x, gd_loyalty_card_vin_map vmap,am_dealer_loc am
where reg_mobile=:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REF_PHONE_N0 and card_status='P'
and vmap.card_num=x.card_num and vmap.mapped_yn='Y'
and vmap.created_date = (select min(vmap1.created_date) 
 from gd_loyalty_card_vin_map vmap1
 where vmap.card_num=vmap1.card_num
 and vmap.mapped_yn=vmap1.mapped_yn)
and am.dealer_map_Cd=card_issu_dlr_map_cd
and am.loc_cd=card_issu_loc_cd
and am.parent_group=card_issu_parent
and am.principal_map_cd=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL

RecordGroup.Name: LOAN_STAGE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
/* Added by saket as on 27-12-2019 */
select list_desc,list_code from am_list where list_name='LOAN_STAGE' and nvl(list_flag,'Y')='Y' and PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL

Trigger.Name: ON-ERROR
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE 
 errnum NUMBER := ERROR_CODE; 
 errtxt VARCHAR2(200) := ERROR_TEXT; 
 errtyp VARCHAR2(3) := ERROR_TYPE; 
 derrnum number := DBMS_ERROR_CODE; 
 derrtxt VARCHAR2(200) := DBMS_ERROR_TEXT; 
 --derrtyp VARCHAR2(3) := DBMS_ERROR_TYPE; 
 
 BEGIN 
 --GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('my message'|| error_code ,'Error'); 
 IF errnum in (50004) THEN 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Entered Date is not valid Date' ,'Error'); 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF; 

 IF errnum in (50025,50026) THEN 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Enter the Date in the proper format (DD-MM-YYYY)','Error'); 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 
 IF errnum in (40209,50016) THEN 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Characters/Special Characters are not allowed here, enter the numeric value','Error'); 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 IF errnum in (40207) THEN 
 -- GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(errtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(errnum)||': '||errtxt,'Error'); 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(errtxt,'Error'); 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF; 
 
 
 IF Derrnum = -02292 THEN 
 GENERAL.RAISE_ERROR('E0088');
 END IF;
 
 IF ERROR_CODE IN (40654,40655,40656,40657,40659) THEN
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Record Has been Updated by other User, Please Requery the Record to do the Changes and then Save','Error');
 RollBack;
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 if sqlcode <> 0 then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(sqlerrm,'Error');
 Rollback;
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 if error_code in (40401,40405) then
 null;
 end if;
END;

Trigger.Name: ON-MESSAGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE 
 errnum NUMBER := ERROR_CODE; 
 errtxt VARCHAR2(80) := ERROR_TEXT; 
 errtyp VARCHAR2(3) := ERROR_TYPE; 

 BEGIN 
 
 
 IF errnum in (40209,40207) THEN 
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(errtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(errnum)||': '||errtxt,'Error'); 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 elsif errnum in (40405,40401) then
 clear_message;
 null;
 END IF; 
 
 END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-EXIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
dbms_application_info.set_client_info(null); 
DBMS_APPLICATION_INFO.SET_MODULE(module_name => '', action_name => '');
 EXIT_FORM(NO_VALIDATE);

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 l_name VARCHAR2(30) ; -- To store LOV name
 l_flag boolean ; -- To store LOV suceess flag
 
BEGIN
 
 l_name := get_item_property(:system.cursor_item, LOV_NAME ) ;

 IF ( l_name IS NOT null ) AND :system.cursor_item <> 'CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO' THEN
 
 IF l_name IN ('LOV_DS') THEN--,'LV_RCITY','LV_OCITY','LV_PINR','LV_PINO' ) THEN
 --IF(:B_SH_ENQUIRY.REFFERED_BY = 'DD') THEN 
 IF ( show_lov(l_name,200,120) )THEN
 do_key('next_item');
 END IF;
 --END IF;
 ELSE
 IF (show_lov(l_name,200,120) )THEN
 do_key('next_item');
 END IF; 
 END IF;
 END IF; 
END ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 enter;
-- GENERAL.CHECK_FORM_FAILURE;
/* commit_form;
 GENERAL.CHECK_FORM_FAILURE;
 clear_message;*/
 -- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.stop_timer('PSS','RT_ENQ','Enquiry Tracking','Submit',:global.userid);
 end if;
-- DO_KEY('CLEAR_FORM');
END ;

DECLARE
 
 LV_ERR_MSG VARCHAR(200);
 LV_ERR_CD NUMBER := 0;
 
BEGIN
 SP_GET_EMPLOYEE_NAME(:GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD,
 :GLOBAL.USER_NAME,
 :CB_ENQUIRY.CREATED_BY_NAME,

 LV_ERR_CD);

 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: PRE-FORM
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- Application Logging
 If :global.app_log = 'Y' then
 stop_watch.start_timer;
 end if; 
dbms_application_info.set_client_info('rt_enq');
DBMS_APPLICATION_INFO.SET_MODULE(module_name => 'rt_enq', action_name => '');

Trigger.Name: FT_NUM
Trigger.TriggerText:
SHOW_VIEW('CN_ENQ_NUM');
GO_BLOCK('B_SHOW_ENQ_TEST_NUM');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_EXIT','D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_CANCEL','D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_SAVE','D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_INSERT','D');
 GENERAL.ENABLE('PB_DEL','D');

Trigger.Name: POST-DATABASE-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 lv_err_msg varchar2(2000); 
 Begin 
if nvl(:PARAMETER.P_DEALER_TYPE,'X')<>'TV' then --Added by saket as on 13-11-2018 against scr no 12450
 if :Parameter.p_int_cal='Y' then
 PSS_INT_DATA_POPULATION (:GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP ,
 :GLOBAL.DEALER,
 :GLOBAL.LOC_CD ,
 :GLOBAL.COMP_FA ,
 'ENQ',
 :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM ,
 NULL,
 lv_err_msg);
 if lv_err_msg is not null then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT(lv_err_msg,'Error'); 
 end if;
 end if; 
end if;
 Exception When Others then
 GENERAL.DISP_TEXT('Error Occurred while Calling of MSIL Link-','Error');
 End;
--do_key('CLEAR_FORM');

/*Added by Dp Swain for message generation*/
 BEGIN
IF :Parameter.p_int_cal='Y' then
 SP_PUSH_DMS_MESSAGE('DMS_ENQUIRY',:global.parent_group,:global.dealer,:global.loc_cd,:global.comp_fa,'ENQ',:B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM,:GLOBAL.USERID);
ELSE
 NULL;
END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
END;
 
/*Started by Kanav on 03-Apr-2021 for DMSSAL(S)-13394*/
declare
 lv_cust_name varchar2(50);
 lv_trade_name varchar2(50);
 lv_model_desc varchar2(50);
 lv_loc_desc varchar2(50);
 lv_dse varchar2(50);
 lv_dse_mob varchar2(50);
 lv_cnt number;
 LV_TEXT_FORMAT varchar2(1000);
 lv_error_cd number;
 lv_error_msg varchar2(500);
BEGIN
 
 /*BEGIN
 SELECT COUNT(*)
 INTO LV_CNT
 FROM AM_LIST
 WHERE LIST_NAME = 'ENQUIRY_SMIPL'
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL
 AND LIST_DESC = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND LIST_NAME_DESC = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 LV_CNT := 0;
 END;*/
 
 /*Commented above and added below by Kanav on 05-Aug-2021 for DMSSAL(S)-13407*/
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT COUNT(*)
 INTO LV_CNT
 FROM AM_DEALER_LOC
 WHERE PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD = 2
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :GLOBAL.PARENT_GROUP
 AND LOC_CD = :GLOBAL.LOC_CD
 AND DEALER_MAP_CD = :GLOBAL.DEALER
 AND NVL(MSIL_TERMINATED_DATE, SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE
 AND DEALER_TYPE IN ('S','3S','ASSC');
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 LV_CNT := 0;
 END;
 
 IF :GLOBAL.PRINCIPAL = 2 and :parameter.P_PARAM = 1 and LV_CNT>0 AND :CB_ENQUIRY.NB_SRL_NO IS NULL THEN
 
 begin
 select RE.ENQ_NAME, RE.Enq_Salesman_Cd
 into lv_cust_name, lv_dse
 FROM RH_ENQ RE
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_cD = :global.dealer
 AND LOC_cD = :global.loc_cd
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :global.parent_group
 and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 AND ENQ_num = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM;
 exception
 when others then
 lv_cust_name := ' ';
 end;
 
 begin
 select MODEL_DESC
 into lv_model_desc
 FROM RD_ENQ RE, GM_MOD GM
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_cD = :global.dealer
 AND LOC_cD = :global.loc_cd
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :global.parent_group
 and comp_fa = :global.comp_fa
 AND ENQ_num = :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_NUM
 AND ENQ_VAR_SRL = '1'
 AND RE.MODEL_CD = GM.MODEL_CD 
 AND PRINCIPAL_MAP_CD=:global.principal;
 exception
 when others then
 lv_model_desc := ' ';
 end;
 
 begin
 select substr(trade_name,1,30)
 into lv_trade_name
 FROM am_dealer_loc_param
 WHERE DEALER_MAP_cD = :global.dealer
 AND LOC_cD = :global.loc_cd
 AND PARENT_GROUP = :global.parent_group;
 exception
 when others then
 lv_trade_name := ' ';
 end;
 
 begin
 select MOBILE
 into lv_dse_mob
 from gm_emp
 where DEALER_MAP_cD = :global.dealer
 and emp_Cd = lv_dse;
 exception
 when others then
 lv_dse_mob := ' ';
 end; 
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT replace(replace(replace(replace(PRM.TEXT_FORMAT, '<CUST_NAME>', lv_cust_name),'<MODEL_DESC>',lv_model_desc),'<TRADE_NAME>',lv_trade_name),'<MOB_NO>',lv_dse_mob)
 INTO LV_TEXT_FORMAT
 FROM GM_PROCESS_MASTER PRM
 WHERE PRM.PROCESS_CODE = 'DMS_ENQUIRY_2W';
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 LV_TEXT_FORMAT := NULL;
 END; 
 
 sp_send_sms_sales_smipl(p_mobile => :B_SH_ENQUIRY.ENQ_MOBILE1
 ,p_message => LV_TEXT_FORMAT
 ,p_process_code => 'DMS_ENQUIRY_2W'
 ,p_dealer => :global.dealer
 ,p_loc_Cd => :global.loc_cd
 ,p_parent_group => :global.parent_group
 ,p_error_cd => lv_error_cd
 ,p_error_msg => lv_error_msg
 );
 
 END IF;
 
EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
END;
:parameter.P_PARAM := :parameter.P_PARAM+ 1;
/*Ended by Kanav on 03-Apr-2021 for DMSSAL(S)-13394*/
